K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171a-1: a'arya saddharma smri tyu pa sth'a na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171a-3: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171a-8: 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171a-9: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171a-10: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na la ti'i grong gi bram ze'i grong na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171a-11: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-0: de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba dag @171b ga la ba der dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-1: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-2: yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi gtam byas nas gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba dag gis dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-4: khyed cag gi dge sbyong goo ta ma lus kyi chad pa mi dge ba mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-5: gzhan dag gi la'ang rjes su yid rang bar mi byed pa bden nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-6: nged cag kyang lus kyi chad pa mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-7: gzhan dag gi la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-8: kye khyed cag gi dge sbyong goo ta ma ngag gi chad pa mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-9: gzhan dag gi la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-10: nged cag kyang ngag gi chad pa mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-11: gzhan dag gi la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-12: khyed cag gi dge sbyong goo ta ma yid kyi chad pa mi 'dod pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-13: gzhan dag gi la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-14: nged kyang yid kyi chad pa mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-15: gzhan dag gi la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-16: khyed kyi dge sbyong goo ta ma'i chos 'dul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:171b-17: nged kyi tha dad du bya ba ci yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-0: gang gis na dge sbyong goo ta ma'i chos 'dul ba ni nged kyi las khyad par du @172a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-2: dge sbyong goo ta ma de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no zhes bdag nyid sgrogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-3: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba dag gis de skad dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-4: dge slong gsar du rab tu byung ba dag tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu dang bral bas rjes su yi rang bar yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-6: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu dang bral ba dag bsod snyoms kyi bya ba byas nas na la ti'i grong ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-7: dge slong rab tu mang po dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu phyi zhig na bsod snyoms blangs te na la ti'i grong ga la ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-9: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu la bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bus dge slong rab tu mang po dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-11: gal te bdag tshe dang ldan pa khyed dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab kyi lam srang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-13: sum mdo gcig tu rim gyis dong ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-14: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams dang phrad par gyur na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-15: des na bdag gis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba de dag chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad zin pa zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172a-16: kye ma bdag kyang lam srang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-0: @172b sum mdo gzhan nas bsod snyoms la rgyu rgyu nas 'dir phyin te gang tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams dang lhan cig gtam byas pa'i dri ba'i tshul de ni bdag gis tshor yang ma tshor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-2: bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan mnga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-5: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa de ha cang mi ring ba zhig na mu stegs kyi lta ba can thams cad zil gyis mnan nas nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-9: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i chos ston gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-10: khyed de la zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-12: rnam par smin pa thams cad ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-17: bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dag gi ma mthong ba de khyed la ston par mdzad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-18: gang bdag cag gi mngon sum du ma gyur pa de'ang khyod la bcom ldan 'das shin tu mngon sum du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-20: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mkhyen par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-21: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-22: de nas dge slong de dag gi bcom ldan 'das nyin mo'i gnas pas bzhugs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-23: ri rab ltar rang gi 'od kyi dra bas mngon par 'bar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-24: nyin mo'i nyi ma ltar snang bas rab tu gsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:172b-25: mtshan mo'i zla ba ltar zhi bas rab tu sim par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-3: ri rab ltar mi g-yo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-5: pha ma ltar 'byung po thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i thugs sems can thams cad kyi gnyen gcig par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-9: btang snyoms kyi rten du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-10: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos chen po sum cu rtsa bdun gyis sku brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-11: rab tu dang bas lus can thams cad kyi mig mgu bar mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-13: nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-14: sh'a kya'i rgyal po'i sras kun tu spyan mnga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-15: spyan dri ma gsum dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-18: bsgom pa gnyis bsgoms shing mngon sum du mdzad pa; lam gyi 'bras bu mngon du mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-20: khams gsum mngon sum du mdzad pa'i spyan mnga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-21: khams gsum gzhan yang dag par ston pa; khams bco brgyad kyi de nyid mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-22: mos pa yid la byed pa'i de nyid mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-23: yon tan gyi klung rang gi yon tan bco brgyad dag dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-24: srid pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-26: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhis mi bsnyengs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173a-27: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-0: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang rtag tu ldan pa @173b de mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-1: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag chos gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas dul bas mgo btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-3: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis dge slong gcig cig bsgo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der shin tu nye bar phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-5: yang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-7: 'dir bdag snga dro'i dus su lhung bzed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-8: chos gos 'tshal nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la mchi mchi na zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-9: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams dang lhan cig lus kyi chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-11: yid kyi chad pa sngon du 'gro ba'i gtam 'dri ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-12: de dag bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe dge slong de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-14: na la ti'i grong gi bram ze la sogs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-16: khyed cag la chos bshad par bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:173b-18: dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar dge ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-2: yang dag par rab tu bstan pa bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-3: de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-5: de ltar 'chal lo zhes gsol to /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-6: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-8: dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de gang yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-11: chos ma yin pa la'ang chos ma yin pa nyid du mthong ba'i dran pa rtag tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur zhing 'di la the tshom yang mi skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-12: chos nyan pa la mngon par dga' bar yang 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-13: rgan rabs la'ang rim gro byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-14: de ni lus kyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-16: yid kyi las gsum gyi las kyi 'bras bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-18: skye ba'i rnam par smin pa shes par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-19: lta ba ma log pa yin zhing gzhan gyis kha mi phyin par 'gyur ro; ;dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-20: de la lus kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-22: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174a-24: de la srog gcod pa ji lta bu yin zhe na; sems can pha rol la sems can du 'du shes shing bsams bzhin du srog chags bsad de srog dang bral bar byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-2: de la chen po ni dgra bcom pa la sogs pa bsad pa ste mnar med par 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-3: 'bring ni lam la gnas pa bsad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-5: tshul khrims 'chal pa spyad pa bsad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-12: zhe sdang gis byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-14: de la 'dod chags kyis byas pa ni ri dvags la sogs pa la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-15: zhe sdang gis byas pa ni sprul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-16: ne'u le la sogs pa la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-17: gti mug gis byas pa ni mchod sbyin la sogs pa la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-22: rgyu lngas srog gcod pa byas kyang kha na ma tho bas gos par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-24: lam du 'gro bar zhugs pa mi shes pas srog chags phra mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-25: grog sbur la sogs pa srog dang bral bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-26: gzhan la mtshon cha gzas pa las bsams pa dang mi ldan par gzhan la phog ste de srog dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-27: nad pa la sman pa phan par 'dod pas nyes par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-28: sman byin pa las de shi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:174b-29: de bzhin du mas bu 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir brdeg pa las de srog dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-0: me 'bar ba'i nang du srog chags mi 'dod bzhin du lhung ba ste rgyu rnam pa de lngas srog bcad par gyur kyang @175a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-2: yang srog gcod pa rnam pa gsum ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-7: ma byin par len par rdzogs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-8: rnal 'byor spyod pa chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-9: lha'i mig gis mthong ste pha rol gyis yongs su bzung ba la bdag gir bya ba'i bsam pas rku bar byed pa 'di ni ma byin par len pa rdzogs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-10: 'bras bu chung ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-12: rgyal po'i chad pas nyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-18: rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-20: ltogs pa de dag gi don du ma byin par blangs pa 'di ni 'bras bu chung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-21: ma byin par len pa'i sdom pa ma blangs pas ma byin par len pa 'di ni rnam par smin pa chung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-23: 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ba ni ma byin par len pa byas nas sems kyis 'chags par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-25: pha rol yang ma byin par len pa las phyir zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175a-26: sdom pa'i lung yang 'bogs par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-0: ma byin par len pa spong ba dag la 'jog par byed cing las kyi nyer @175b bsdogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-1: las kyi mjug mi byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-2: ma byin par len pa'i las kyi nyer bsdogs ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-3: 'di la ma byin par len pa pos pha rol la g-yo sgyu byed cing gsang thabs su smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-4: 'jal lugs la g-yo byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-5: mi rigs pa'i las lhag mar spyod pa rnam pa 'di dag ni las kyi nyer bsdogs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-6: las ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-7: gang gi tshe pha rol gyis yongs su bzung ba'i rdzas kyi rnam pa ma byin par len pa 'di ni las yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-8: las kyi mjug ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-9: 'di la byas nas rjes su yi rang bar byed cing goms par byed la mang du byas te rjes su yi rang ba kun tu 'chab par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-10: tshul khrims dang ldan pa gzhan ma byin par len pa la rab tu 'jog par byed pa 'di ni las kyi mjug yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-11: rnam pa 'di gsum gyis ma byin par len pa'i las kyi nyer bsdogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-12: mjug dang bral ba ma byin pa len pa'i chad pa'i 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-13: myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-15: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-16: rnal 'byor spyod pa chos la chos kyi rjes su lta bas mthong ste 'di la 'dod pas log par g-yem pa kun tu spyod pa na rang gi chung ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-17: gzhan gyi chung ma dag gi skye gnas ma yin par 'jug par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:175b-18: gzhan byed pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-0: mi byed pa'ang thabs kyis byed du @176a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-1: 'jug pa 'di ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-2: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-4: rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-5: gzhan 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'ang phyir zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-8: las kyi mjug dang bral ba'i sems yin zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-9: 'di ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur zhing myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-10: lus kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum po de dag ni 'bras bu chung ba dang 'bras bu zhan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-11: de dag ni nga'i nyan thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-12: nga las thos nas las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-13: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes shing gzhan gyis kha drang du mi rung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-14: gzhan la rag ma lus par ma gtogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-15: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-16: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-19: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-22: lha ma yin du bcas pas rtogs pa'i yul ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-24: ngag gi chad pa lci ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-27: rnam par smin pa shes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176a-28: ngag gi chad pa rnam pa bzhi la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-4: de la rdzun gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-5: bdag nyid la bdag nyid slu zhing gzhan yang slu ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-8: mngon sum du gzhan dag la gnod pa dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-9: 'phrog par byed pa log pas bskyed pa'i rdzun gyi skyon rab tu 'jug pa 'di ni brdzun du smra ba ngag gi chad pa rdzogs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-10: sems can dmyal dmyong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-12: ngag gi chad pa phra ma zhes bya ba ni don gcig la mthun par zhugs pa rnams la dbyen bya ba'i bsam pas tshig rjod par byed pa 'di ni phra ma'i ngag gi chad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-13: phra ma'i 'bras bu chung ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-14: bdag gti mug gis ngan pa byas so zhes 'chags par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-15: gzhan phra ma la mngon par dga' ba zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-16: lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-17: yang las kyi nyer bsdogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-18: las kyi mjug mi byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-19: las kyi nyer bsngogs ji na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-20: phra ma'i las kyi lam dang yang dag par rab tu ba nyon mongs pa rgyags pa la mngon par zhugs pa'i tshig gzhan du brtags nas gzhan la smra ba 'di ni las kyi nyer bsngogs yin na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-21: phra ma'i las kyi lam dang yang dag par rab tu ldan pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:176b-22: 'di la sdang ba'i sems kyis yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-0: yang du gzhan 'byed la rjes su yi rang bzhing kun dga' bar byed pa 'di ni phra ma'i las kyi lam dang yang dag par ldan @177a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-2: las kyi mjug dang bcas pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-3: 'di la phra ma byas nas rjes su yi rang bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-4: phyir zhing byed byed pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed; yid kyis kun tu rtog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-5: de nyid la mngon par dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-6: ngang tshul gzhan du mi byed pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-8: gzhan dag gis btsal cing yid ches pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-10: ngo tsha bar mi byed cing khrel med la bdag nyid la smod par mi byed pa 'di ni phra ma'i chad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-12: tshig rtsub po'i chad pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-15: kun 'byung ba mthong ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-16: 'di ni tshig rtsub pos bdag gdung bar byed cing yid du mi 'ong ba rna bar thos la glags skyed par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-17: de gzhan la gnas te mkhyud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-20: khro ba'i bsam pas rnam par smin pa du ma rnam pa du ma'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-21: de la tshig rtsub po chen pos ni sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-22: tshig rtsub po 'chags pa ni myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa yin te 'di dag ni ngag gi chad pa gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177a-25: yang dag par ldan pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-0: ngag gi chad pa bzhi pa ji lta bu yin @177b zhe na; rnal 'byor spyod pa las dang chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-1: rnam par smin pa'i rnam pa du ma shes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-2: tshig khyal pa zhes bya ba snga phyi 'brel pa med pa'i tshig kyal pa snga ma dang phyi mar mi sbyor ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-3: myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges shing kha na ma tho ba mi mang ba yin pa 'di ni ngag gi chad pa bzhi pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-5: yid kyi chad pa ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-6: rnam pa ni du zhig yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-9: rnam par smin pa la rjes su lta ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yid kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-11: brnab sems ni gzhan gyi 'byor pa mthong nas shin tu rtog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-13: rdzas 'di ni bdag gir bya'o snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-14: brnab sems 'di ni yid kyi chad pa dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-16: yid kyi chad par 'gyur ba ni pha rol gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas yid rab tu sdang ba gnod sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-17: yid kyi chad pa gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-19: yid kyi chad pa gsum pa ni log par lta bas phyin ci log tu mthong ba log par lta ba'i chad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-23: de la yod pa 'jig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:177b-28: nyes par byas pa dag gi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med do zhes bya ba rgya cher sbyor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-1: shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-3: sdug bsngal gang yin pa de ni lhas byas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-4: las kyi 'bras bus ni ma byas so zhes zer ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-5: 'di ni log par lta ba rnam pa gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-9: yid rnam pa gsum gyi chad pa rnam pa bcu kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas na tshe 'di nyid la las kyi 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-10: shi nas gzhan du skyes na de'i rgyu can gyi las kyi 'bras bu gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-11: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bu yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-12: yang 'jig rten 'dir skyes na'ang de dag ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-15: rnam par smin pa la rjes su lta ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-16: lus kyi srog gcod pa dang po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-17: srog gcod pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-19: yi dvags kyi yul rnams su skye bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-20: gal te mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na de tshe thung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-21: gal te rngon pa lta bu la chags pas srog gcod pa byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-22: srog gcod pa byas de nyams par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178a-28: nya la sogs par gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-0: 'khor ba na las de lta bu'i rgyus 'brel pa @178b gal te'ang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na de tshe thung bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-1: mkhas pa rnams kyi yul du skye bar mi 'gyur la mtshon mang pos 'khrug pa'i yul du myur ba nyid du gsod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-2: srog gcod pa chung du dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-4: chen po'i tshigs su bcad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-5: kha cig mngal dang de bzhin gzhan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-6: btsas pa'i khyim dang gzhan dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-7: gog pa tsam dang de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-8: gzhan dag yongs su rgyug na 'chi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-9: de ltar srog gcod pa ni da ltar gyi tshe la rnam par smin pas dbang du byas pa'i las yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-11: ma byin par len pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i rnam par smin pa rnam pa gsum po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-13: sems can dmyal ba myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-14: tshe 'di dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-17: rnam par smin pa la rjes su lta ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-18: de la ma byin par len pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-19: dud 'gro dang; yi dvags rnams kyi yul du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-20: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na'ang dbul bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-21: longs spyod bsgrubs pa gang dag yod pa de dag rgyal po'i chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-25: chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dag gis bsags bsags pa dag la chud za bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:178b-26: nam yang bde bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-1: par len pa'i chad pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-3: nang gi 'dod pas log par g-yem pa kun tu bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-6: rnam par smin pa la rjes su lta ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-8: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-10: yi dvags rnams kyi yul du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-11: gal te mir skyes na'ang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu de'i chung ma gus pa med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-14: 'di ni lus kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-15: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyi lus kyi chad pa mi 'dod pa nas rgyas par las kyi rnam par smin pa'i bar ni de lta bu ma yin no; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-16: gti mug dang 'grogs pa bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa gzhan gyis ni nga'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-18: rnam par smin pa'i gang yin pa 'di mi mthong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-20: nga'i rnal 'byor spyod pa dag gis rjes su mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-23: ngag gi chad pa ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179a-24: rnam pa ni du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-0: rnal 'byor spyod pa chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba des @179b thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas ngag gi chad par ma pa bzhi mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-6: de la rdzun kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-8: yi dvags kyi skye gnas rnams su skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-9: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na'ang sems can thams cad kyis tshig bzung bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-14: chung mas kyang tshig bzung bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-15: de'i kha nas dri ma nam pa 'byung so dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-19: 'jig rten pa kun gyis kyang log pa'i mngon par spyod pas mngon par sbyor bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-23: skye bo snying du sdug pa dag bsten par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-24: byed pa brtsams pa thams cad 'bras bu med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-25: don med pa thams cad spyod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-26: 'di ni rdzun gyi las kyi 'bras bu mi 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-28: yid du mi 'ong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:179b-30: ngag gi chad pa gnyis pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bu yin zhe na; rnal 'byor spyod pa chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-0: phra ma kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can @180a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-3: yi dvags rnams kyi yul du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-4: gal te mi rnams ni bskal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na'ang de lkugs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-6: de'i kha nas dri ma nam pa 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-7: de'i tshig la su'ang yid mi ches shing de skye bo kun gyi bzhad gad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-8: gdong gi mdog mi sdug par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-9: gnas gcig la mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-11: sems 'thas par 'gyur te 'di ni phra ma'i chad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-12: tshig rtsub po kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i chad pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-13: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-15: tshig rtsub po kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-17: yi dvags rnams kyi yul du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-18: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na'ang su las kyang dbugs phyin pa mi 'thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-19: skye bo kun gyis kyang rtag tu mngon par gtse bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-22: chung ma las dga' ba'i tshig gcig tsam yang mi 'thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-23: ri dvags ltar rtag tu skye bo kun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-24: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang spyod par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180a-26: rnam pa gsum po 'di ni tshig rtsub po'i 'bras bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-0: @180b tshig kyal pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i chad pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-1: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-3: tshig kyal ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-5: yi dvags rnams kyi yul du 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-6: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na'ang skye bo kun mi dga' zhing yang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-9: gnyen dag gi khyim du'ang smyon thabs mkhan lta bur 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-10: de ni tshig kyal pa'i chad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-12: yid kyi mi dge ba rnam pa gsum po kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i chad pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-13: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-15: brnab sems kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-16: dud 'gro dang yi dvags rnams kyi yul du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-17: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na de'i rdzas bsags bsags pa dag rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-20: rtag tu dbul par yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:180b-22: gnod sems kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas yid kyi chad pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-0: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos @181a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-1: la chos kyi rjes su lta zhi'a gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-3: gnod sems kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-5: yi dvags rnams kyi yul du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-6: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na'ang ri grags pa'ang kla klo rtag tu mtshon gyis 'khrug cing rtag tu 'jigs pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-7: rtag tu g-yangs rnams su lhung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-8: de'i sems nam yang bde bar gnas par mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-9: gnod pa dag gis rtag tu gnod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-10: gzhan yang log par lta ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i yid kyi chad pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-11: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-13: log par lta ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa la sogs par sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad myong bar skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-14: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su tsha bye ba brgya phrag du mar 'pho zhing skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-15: de bzhin du yi dvags kyi yul du'ang skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181a-16: gal te brgya la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na'ang de ji skad bshad pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi skyon stong du bsgyur ba thams cad de la 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-0: rnam @181b pa gzhan gang gi na mi dge ba bcu'i chos dag shin tu phra ba rjes su sems na'ang 'khor ba na sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-3: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-5: srog gcod pa ji ltar kun tu bsten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-7: ji ltar mang du byed ce na; 'di la srog gcod pa grogs po ngan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-9: de'i grogs la kun tu bsten par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-10: de dang lhan cig kun tu dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-12: yongs su spyod par byed; kun tu gnas par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-13: de la'ang yid ches pa'i gnas su byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-14: thams cad yon tan du lta bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-15: de'i tshul gyis rjes su 'jug par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-16: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-17: slob ma des mi srog gcod pa'i tshul can de srog gcod pa'i rgyu byed pa gtam sna tshogs lam ma yin par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-18: srog gcod pa la rab tu 'jog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-19: de bzhin du mchod sbyin gyi gtam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-20: de bzhin du ri dvags kyi gtam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-21: de bzhin du ro la chags pa rab tu nyes pa'i gtam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-22: de bzhin du dgra bco mi mdza' ba dang 'brel pa la lan ldon pa'i gtam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-23: de bzhin du de'i rdzas la chags pa'i gtam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-24: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa la rab tu spro ba rdzas la chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:181b-25: grags pa'i las kyi gtam rnams la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-1: ches pa'i gnas su rjes su 'jug pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-2: srog gcod pa kun tu bsten par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-3: de ltar srog gcod pa bsten pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-9: yid du mi 'ong ba skye bo mkhas pa kun gyis smad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-10: mir skyes na'ang tshe thung ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-11: de ltar na bshes gnyen ngan pa'i sa bon can gyi srog gcod pa de ni srog gcod pa kun tu bsten par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-12: mi ngan pa goms par byed pa ji lta bu yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-13: mi ngan pa srog gcod pa bsten pa zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-14: srog gcod pa byas nas yid kyis dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-16: yid kyis kun tu rtog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-17: yon tan du lta ba'i blo can du byed; srog gcod pa nyid la kun tu rtog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-18: rnam pa mang pos gzhan gyi srog 'phrog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-20: de la smod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-21: de la dga' ba dang bral bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-22: phyir zhing de'i ngang tshul du byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-23: srog mi gcod pa'i tshul can gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa de la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-24: gtam rgyud dang bcas pa sna tshogs dag gis snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-25: de ltar srog gcod pa goms par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-26: mang du byed pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182a-27: 'di na gang srog gcod pa byas nas goms par byed pa snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-0: 'di @182b la srog gcod pa byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-2: sdig pa'i grogs po dang phrad pas rgya 'dre bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-5: srog gcod pa'i bya sdud par byed gtum po dang bsten par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-13: go mtshon la sogs pa'i ngang tshul can yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-14: srog gcod par byed pa'i rgyu gzhan gang yin pa de thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-15: mi de lta bu de ni srog gcod pa mang du byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-18: rkyen des sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-20: yi dvags rnams kyi yul du skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-21: gnod pa mi bzad pas mngon par gnod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-22: srog gcod pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-24: chen pos rnam par smin pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-26: chen po nye bar spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-27: las byas la bsags pas ni las kyi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-28: de ltar na bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i las ni bdag nyid kyis nye bar spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-29: de lta bas na gal te 'khor ba la yid byung na sdig pa spang nas dge ba kun tu spyad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-30: 'di ni srog gcod pa kun tu bsten cing mang du byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-31: ji ltar na ma byin par len pa kun tu bsten cing sgom ste mang du byed pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-32: kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:182b-33: sems can dmyal ba ji ltar myong bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-1: la tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mi ngo bo nyid kyis ma byin par len pa'i ngang tshul can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-3: slob ma dang 'brel pas ma byin par len pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-5: chen po kun tu spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-6: de la tha ma ni rgyal po'i chad pas skrag nas gzhan gyi len pa yin te snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-7: 'bring ni dngos po chung du yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-8: zhing bzang po la brkus pa ma yin pa 'di ni ma byin par len pa 'bring yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-11: dge 'dun dag las ni chung du zhig blangs na'ang chen por 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-13: chos dang; dge 'dun gyi ma byin bar blangs pa de dag las kyang ris su mthun par slar phul na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-15: chos kyi ni dag par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-16: dge 'dun gyi brkus pa ni tshor ba ma myong bar dag par 'gyur ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-17: zhing lci ba'i phyir gal te zhal du 'du ba'i sgo zhig na ni de sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-18: gal te zhal du 'du ba'i sgo ma yin na ni de'i nang gi bar mnar med 'khor mun nag chen po la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-19: gal te ma byin par len pa chung du zhig blangs nas kyang kun tu bsten cing sems la dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-20: goms par byed la mang du byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-21: ma byin par len pa chung du des kyang sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183a-23: yi dvags kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-0: gal te 'chags par byed cing @183b rjes su ya rang bar mi byed la 'gyod na de myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-1: gal te ma byin par len pa'i ngang tshul can zhig de thabs du mar ma byin par len pa kun tu spyod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-2: 'di ni ma byin par len pa kun tu bsten pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-3: goms par byed pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-4: 'di la ma byin par len pa'i rdzas thob nas mgu bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun la mngon par dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-5: de rdzas de thob nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-6: bgo ba byas shing dga' bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-7: yon tan du bzung nas gzhan dag kyang ma byin par len pa la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-9: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing byed du 'jug pa de lta bu ni ma byin par len pa goms par byad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-10: ma byin par len pa mang du byed pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-11: 'di la ma byin par len pa byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-19: rgyan po mang po dag la mngon par dga' bar byed do; ;de sems kyis mngon par dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-20: bde ba thams cad kyi nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-22: ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni legs par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-23: rgyu des bdag mal cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:183b-30: rgyan po mang po dag gis mchog tu bde ba myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-0: ma byin par len pa de bdag gis kun tu spyad par @184a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-1: bya ste; de bdag la bde ba rab tu mang po dag tu 'gyur ro snyam na snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-2: 'di ni ma byin par len pa mang du byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-3: de ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-4: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-5: mang du byed pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-6: 'di la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas zil gyis non pa ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i ris mthun pa gzhan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-15: srog chags dud ka dag ni lha ma yin gyi ris dag nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-16: 'dod chags sha sa che ba'i grogs po ngan pa dang lhan cig yan lag ma yin par spyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-17: de tshul bzhin ma yin pa nyis gyur gyis mngon par zhen la de 'dod chags tshim pa med pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis tshul bzhin ma yin pa kun tu spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-18: gang dri za der nye bar 'gyur zhing gang gis der skye bar 'gyur ba tshul bzhin ma yin pa de ni skye gnas kyi zhing la skyon yod pa'i phyir der skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-19: rgyu des na tshul bzhin ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'dod pas log par spyod pa zhi ngan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-20: mi de reg bya'i 'dod chags shas che bas de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184a-21: de nyid la mngon par dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-0: de ni 'di ltar 'dod @184b pas log par g-yem pa 'di yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-1: yang du bsten cing reg bya ngan pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-2: 'di ltar 'di ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa kun tu bsten pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-3: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa goms par byed pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-4: 'di las 'dod pas log par g-yem pa yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-5: yang du bsten cing yid kyis yang dag par rtog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-6: de'i yid la mngon par dga' ba gzhan spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-7: de 'dod pas log par g-yem pa 'di nyid goms par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-8: yang yul bde ba de goms par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-9: mang du byed pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-10: 'di la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas brlan pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-11: 'di ltar 'dod pas log par g-yem pa ni mchog tu bzang ba yin la 'dod pas log par mi g-yem pa ni ma yin zhes yon tan mchog dang 'dra bar yang dag par 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-12: de gzhan shin tu mang po dag kyang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa la mngon par 'jug cing byed du 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-13: 'di ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa mang du byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-14: lus kyi rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mi dge ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-15: ngag gi ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-19: tshig kyal pa ba'o; ;de la brdzun gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-21: bdag nyid la bdag nyid slu zhing gzhan yang slu bar byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-22: rdzun du smra ba 'di ni bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:184b-23: gzhan slu bar byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-7: chos log pa'i 'dul ba yongs su sdud pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-8: rdzun du smra ba ji lta bu gang zhe na; 'di la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na 'dug kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-9: khyim bdag gi 'khor gyi nang na 'dug kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-10: nye du'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-12: mdza' ba shes ma yin pa dag smra ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-13: mdza' ba shes kyi phyir ni 'dod chags kyis rdzun smra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-14: mdza' ba shes ma yin pa'i phyir ni zhe sdang gis kyang rdzun smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-15: rnyed pa'i phyir yang rdzun smra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-16: nor la chags pa de rdzun smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-17: chos log pa'i tshig yongs su sdud pas kyang rdzun smra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-18: 'di la bram ze rnams yon tan gyi phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-20: rang gi srog la gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-21: bag ma len pa dag gi phyir rdzun smras kyang mi gos so zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-22: de ni chos log pa'i tshig yongs su sdud pa'i rdzun smra ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-23: mi gti mug pa log par lta ba'i tshig yongs su sdud pa 'di ni sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-24: sems can dmyal ba 'grub par 'gyur ba'i sa bon dang ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-26: rdzun smra ba yin pas rang gi srog gi phyir ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185a-27: gzhan gyi srog gi phyir rdzun cung zad kyang smra bar mi bya ba 'di ni mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-0: gang bdag gis rdzun 'di ma smras na de bdag gi srog la dman pa don med pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas de gang las @185b 'jigs par 'gyur ba de'i don du rdzun smra ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-1: rgyu lnga po 'di dag gis byis pa dag rdzun smra ba smra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-2: gti mug ni thams cad la gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-4: 'jig rten pha rol khyad gsod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-5: chos gcig las ni 'da' byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-6: brdzun du smra ba'i lus can gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-7: sdig pa mi bya ci yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-8: mi yi lus su skyes ma thag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-9: kha nas sta re lta bu yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-10: tshig 'byung ngan par brjod smra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-11: de yis bdag nyid gcod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-12: bden par smra zhing 'khrug mi bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-13: bslangs na chung yang sbyin par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-14: gnas 'di gsum dang ldan pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-15: lha rnams dag gi drung du 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-16: de lta bas na rgyu thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-17: rkyen thams cad kyis brdzun du smra bar mi bya zhing gzhan rdzun smra ba na rjes su yi rang bar mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-18: rdzun smra ba dang lhan cig 'bel ba'i gtam zer du mi 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-21: gzhan du na 'di'ang rdzun smra ba mngon du zer ba yin no zhes skye bo gzhan dag gis bsams par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-22: de ltar na las dri ma can la mngon par dga' ba'i mi rnams dang 'grogs pas las dri ma can du gzhan dag sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-23: de lta bas na sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'grogs par mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-25: sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'grogs pa ni 'khor ba'i 'ching ba sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-27: bdud 'gro rnams kyi gnas yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:185b-28: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa 'di ni thar pa mchog yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-0: 'di dag ni brdzun du smra ba mdor @186a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-2: gzhan yang phra ma ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-3: rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-4: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-5: gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-6: lha'i mig gis mthong ste phra ma zhes bya ba ni mthun zhing 'byor ba dag la dbye ba'i bsam pas tshig brjod pa ni phra ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-8: pha rol dang sbyor ba dang; mi sbyor ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-9: de la khyod kyis mi gnyis dang dbye ba'i sbyor ba gyis shig ces dgra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-10: dgra chung du gzhan dag gis sbyor ba byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-13: tshig rtsub po ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-14: rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-17: tshig rtsub po zhes bya ba ni bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-18: gzhan la gnod pa byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-19: khro bo'i rgyu mthun par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-22: mi dga' ba'i tshig brjod pa nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-27: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang lhan cig spyod pa'i tshig smra ba 'di ni tshig rtsub po zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-31: sems kyi kun nas ldang ba du ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-32: rnam par smin pa du ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-33: bde 'gror 'gro ba rnam par 'jig pa du ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186a-34: skye bo thams cad mi dga' bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-0: 'jig rten ldang @186b ba'i rgyur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-1: mthun par gyur pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-2: yid mi ches pa'i gnas su gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-3: yid gcugs pa ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-4: lce dug lta bur gyur pa'i tshig rtsub po dag gi dri ma ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas rnam par spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-6: brtan pas tshig rtsub spang bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-7: rtag tu yang dag tshig smos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-8: tshig snyan mngon par dga' ba'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-9: mya ngan 'das la nye bar gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-10: tshig ni rtag tu smra bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-11: dri ma yod pa rnam par spang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-12: tshig gi dri mas zil non pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-13: mi gang de ni dmyal bar 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-14: tshig gi dri mas zil non pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-15: gang yin de la bde ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-16: seng ge sbrul ni 'phags min ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-17: de dag la ni mtho ris med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-18: gang dag tshig rtsub mi smra zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-19: gang dag g-yo ni rnam spangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-20: de dag thams cad dga' bskyed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-21: bde ba dag dang dbugs 'byin cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-23: dga' zhing pha rol mtho ris 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-24: de 'dra ba yi mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-25: mkhas pa de la phyag byar 'os //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-26: bden tshig rtag tu zhi ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-27: g-yo sgyu med cing drang po'i sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-28: gzhan la gnod pa'i byed dang bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-29: de ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-30: lag pa brdabs pa'i sga lta bur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-31: mi ni chung bar gyur pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-32: gang dag de thob chos mi shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-33: mi ni rmongs pa dag gis bslus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-34: gang dag bdag sdug mi 'gyur dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-35: gang dag bde ba mi 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-36: de ni sdig gi las byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:186b-37: srid pa'i rgyu yis rnam par bslus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-2: nor dang bu dang chung ma dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-3: mdza' bshes nye du gnyen 'dab dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-4: der ni 'gro bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-5: legs par byas dang nyes par byas; ;de dag 'gro ba'i rjes su 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-6: mkha' la bya dag gnas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-7: de grib lhan cig 'gro ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-8: ji ltar lam rgyags nyung ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-9: lam zhugs sdug bsngal 'gro ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-10: de bzhin las bzang ma byas pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-12: ji ltar lam rgyags mang bdog pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-13: lam zhugs bde bar 'gro ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-14: de bzhin las bzang byas pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-16: yun ring yul gzhan gnas pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-17: mi dag bde bar 'ongs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-18: gnyen dang sdug pa mdza' bshes dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-20: de bzhin bsod nams byas pa'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-22: bsod nams nyid kyis mngon dga' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-23: gnyen sdug dag ni 'ongs pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-24: de lta bas na tshe phyi ma'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-25: bsod nams dag ni bya zhing bsags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-26: bsod nams 'jig rten pha rol tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-27: srog chags rnams ni dran gnas yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-28: spyod pa mthun par gang spyod pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-29: bsod nams dag la lha bstod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-30: de dag 'dir ni mngon dga' la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-31: pha rol mtho ris dga' bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-32: gnas 'di gzhan gyis mthong ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-33: mkhas pa dag gis tshul khrims bsrungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187a-34: 'phags pa mthong pa phun sum tshogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-2: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi tshig bzhi pa'i tshig kyal pa la rtog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-3: de la tshig kyal pa rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-4: tshig 'byung ba snga phyi 'brel pa med pa'i tshig kyal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-5: sems 'jug pa yang bas snga phyi 'brel pa med pa'i tshig brjod pa'i tshig kyal pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-8: rgyags pa med pa'i dus kyis bslang ba'ang byed pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo skyed pa de tshe 'di la yid gcugs pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur zhing tshe 'di'i las kyi lam skyed pa 'jig rten pa kun gyis smad pa'i gnas kyi rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-9: don med par smra ba ni tshig kyal pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-10: tshig gi dri ma bzhi pa 'di ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-11: skye bar byed pa smra bar mi bya zhing rjes su yi rang bar mi bya ba la gzhan gyi tshig kyal pa smra ba de la gnas par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-12: yid kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi lam ni brnab sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-15: de la brnab sems ni gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i nor rdzas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-16: nor rdzas kyi rnam pa la ngag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-17: yid kyis shin tu rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-18: 'di ni bdag gir bya'o snyam pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-19: de gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la 'phral la sems ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-20: don la 'chums pa rgyu med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:187b-21: de ni brnab sems yid kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi lam yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-3: yid du mi 'ong ba'i rnam par smin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-5: ma sbyangs pa'i byis pa skye bo brnab sems kyis rab tu bslus pa de gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la 'phral la yid kyis shin tu rtog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-11: rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gzhan gyi nor rdzas phun sum tshogs pa mthong na sdug bsngal ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-12: 'di ni brnab sems zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-13: yid kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi dri ma chen po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-14: gzhan yang sems las byung ba gnod sems mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la sogs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-16: thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-18: gzhan dag gis sgyu ma yin pa yid kyi nyes pa'i gnod sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-19: gzhan dag gi phun sum tshogs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-20: phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa mthong nas; sgyu ma yin pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin byas pa yid kyi nyes pa mi bzad pa chen po skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-21: gnod sems de ni sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-22: dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog tu gyur pa rnams kyi ser ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188a-23: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi mig gi mi mthun par gyur pa mun nag snying la gnas pa'i me de tshul khrims thams cad sreg par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-0: mdog ngan pa'i @188b rgyu; chos kyi stegs gcod par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-2: 'jig rten pha rol gyi dgra nang du zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-3: sems rtse gcig pa nyad 'jig par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-4: byams pa dang mi mthun zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-5: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-8: 'gog pa rnams 'jig par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-9: gnod sems zhes bya ba sems can dmyal ba'i pho nya mchog yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-10: de skyes bu dam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-12: thos pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyis spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-14: log par lta ba dam pa'i chos kyi mi mthun par gyur pa de lta ba ngan pa thams cad kyi mun gnag snying la yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-17: thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs shing skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-21: mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-22: lta ba ngan pa la mngon par dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-23: yang dag pa'i lam gyi mi mthun par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-28: skye bo thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-29: phyin ci log tu lta zhing log par lta ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:188b-34: de la rkyen yod pa ni bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-0: sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag @189a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-1: ni de dag nyid kyis byas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-3: 'bras bus byas pa ni ma yin no zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-4: las dang 'bras bu la skur ba 'debs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-5: sbyin pa med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-6: de ltar de dag log par lta ba mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag thams cad don thams cad med par byed pa'i rtsa ba yin no ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-7: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-10: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag bzlog nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-11: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-12: zag pa med pa dag gi las byed par 'gyur ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-13: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-19: thar pa'i rgyu'i dngos po ni dge ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-20: de la srog gcod pa spangs pas 'khor bar gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-21: de'i tshe 'di nyid la bsngags par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-24: tshe ring por 'gyur ba'i las byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189a-28: gzhan yang sems can 'tshe bar byed pa de dag kyang nyin mtshan du srung bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-0: phyi bzhin du lha dag @189b kyang mngon par srung bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-1: lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-2: gal te rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar 'dod na'ang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-3: ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pa bzhin myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-4: gal te byang chub kyi lam tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-6: chen po rnams kyi so so yang dag par myong bar 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-7: de rnam pa gsum po 'dir 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-8: gal te nyan thos kyi byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-9: de dgra bcom par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-11: gal te byang chub 'bring du yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-12: de rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-13: gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-14: de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-18: 'jig rten mkhyen pa; skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-23: chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni srog yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-24: gang srog de mngon par srung ba des ni bde ba thams cad sbyin par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-25: sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-27: sems las byung ba so sor bsgoms pa srog byin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-28: tshul khrims kyi nang na mtho ris su skye ba'i mchog ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-30: srog byin pa'i tshul khrims so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:189b-31: gal te yul gyi bde ba kun nas nyon mongs pa sred pa'i rgyur gyur par yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-4: gal te mi'i bdag nyid chen por yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-5: de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-7: gal te lha ma yin gyi bdag nyid chen por yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-8: de lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-9: gal te gnod sbyin gyi bdag nyid chen por yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-10: de gnod sbyin gyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-11: snying rje chen po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi sa bon du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-13: 'khor ba'i mun gnag tu zhugs pa rnams kyi sgron mar gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-15: srog gcod pa spong ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-16: srog gcod pa spangs pa byams pa bsgoms par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-17: snying rje'i rgyud la gnas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-18: bsams nas srog gcod pa spangs na gtsang zhing dga' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-19: gang gi tshe pha rol yang dag par bsrung bar ma nus pa de'i tshe btang snyoms su 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-20: de tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa'i rgyud du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-21: srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying po ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-23: gang gis ji lta ji ltar yongs su bsngo ba de lta de ltar yongs su 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-25: gser mgar mkhas pa de ni gser bzang po blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190a-26: ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar gser de la byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-0: de las mi'i gzugs @190b sam; de las sangs rgyas kyis gzugs byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-1: de bzhin du srog gcod pa yang dag par bsrungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-2: ma nyams shing ma ral la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-3: ma zhig na ji lta ji ltar yongs su bsngo ba de lta de ltar yongs su 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-4: de lta bas na srog gcod pa spangs pa'i sems can gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-6: de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang dag par spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-8: gzhan la phan pa'i skal pa dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-9: de sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-11: yi dvags rnams kyi 'gro ba la bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-12: des 'khor ba na chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-13: chos dang ldan pa'i kun rtog pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-19: thun mong ma yin par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-20: bdag nyid nye bar spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-21: chos dang ldan pa'i 'gran zla gzhan dag gis mi non par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-22: de lta bas na srog gcod pa spang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-24: ma byin par len pa spangs pas legs par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-25: mthong ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-26: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'ang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-28: ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:190b-29: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i chags pa chen po'i dra ba las grol bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-6: rgyal rigs kyi 'khor dang; dge sbyong gi 'khor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-7: bram ze'i 'khor du yid brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-10: yid du 'ong zhing tshig yongs su gzung bar 'os par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-11: de'i longs spyod gang yin pa de dag rtag cing gzhan la gnod pa med par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-16: ma bsams par de dag 'phral la 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-18: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-19: lam bzang po la zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-20: 'jig rten pa rnams la yang dag par nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-21: lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-22: gal te nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyis yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-23: nges par 'byung bar 'gyur la snga ma bzhin du tshangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-26: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-27: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-28: 'di ltar tshul khrims la mngon par dga' ba de byang chub rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191a-30: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-0: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing @191b gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-2: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pa ni dge ba'i las kyi lam bzang po spyod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-3: tshe 'di nyid la de spangs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-5: bud med kyi nang na 'dug kyang dogs pa med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-8: de'i chung ma nam yang gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur zhing rtag tu de'i rim gro byed par brtson par 'gyur la bsam pa dang mthun par yang 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-9: nyam thag par gyur pa na'ang khyad du gsod par mi 'gyur zhing tshul dang mi mthun par mi 'gyur la gcig la gcig gnod pa byed pa la mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-10: de'i chung ma de la brnyas pa byed par mi 'gyur zhing 'jig rten thams cad la ma dang srid mo lta bur kun tu spyod par 'gyur la de'i chung ma 'jig rten la khro ba med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-11: snga ma bzhin du lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-12: gang gi tshe lha dag las 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-13: lha'i bu gzhan zhig der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-14: gang gis 'dod pas log par g-yem pa byas par gyur na de'i tshe ma 'phos par lha gzhan zhig lha'i bu mo de dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur la de'ang de dang mngon sum du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-15: de dang lha gzhan dag dang lhan cig tu rgod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:191b-17: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-0: @192a *// de'i chung mas mthong nas gzhan du 'gro bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-1: phrag dog gi zhags pas yongs su bzung ba dag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-2: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spyod pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa 'di ni bar chad chen po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-3: de lta bas na 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i las kyi lam chen po yang dag par 'dzin cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-4: de nas gzhan yang dge ba'i phyogs thams cad dang mi mthun par gyur pa'i rdzun spangs pas dge ba'i phyogs chen po yang dag par 'dzin pa tshe 'di la 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-5: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-7: rdzun smra ba spangs pa de ni skye bo kun gyi mig dang rna ba'i lkog tu gyur kyang yid ches pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur zhing nor rdzas med na'ang skye bo kun dang rgyal pos ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin mchod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-8: ji ltar nam mkha' la gza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-9: rgyu skar gyi dbus na zla ba rab tu gsal ba de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyi nang na bden par smra ba de rab tu gsal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192a-10: rin po che thams cad kyi nang na bden pa rin po che mchog tu bzang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-0: 'khor ba thams cad @192b las sgrol ba'i nang na bden par sgrol ba khyad par du 'phags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-1: ngan 'gro thams cad las phyir zlog pa'i nang na bden pas phyir zlog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-2: sgron ma thams cad kyi nang na bden pa sgron ma yin no; ;lam ston pa thams cad kyi nang na bden pa lam ston pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-3: 'du byed kyi rdzas 'byung ba thams cad kyi nang na bden pa'i rdzas gzhan gyi nad 'phrog pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-4: rtsal thams cad kyi nang na bden pa rtsal yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-5: skyob pa thams cad kyi nang na bden pa skyob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-6: mdza' bshes thams cad kyi nang na bden pa mdza' bshes khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-7: gang bden pa'i nor kun tu 'dzin pa de ni nam yang 'khor ba'i ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-8: lha rnams dang nye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-10: gang du skye ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-11: der skye ba'i rigs che zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-12: gzugs bzang por 'gyur te; skye bo thams cad la sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-17: sha za dag gis mi mthong la gtse bar mi nus shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-18: yul gzhan du phyin na'ang mal cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-19: na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen mang po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-20: des 'dod pa gang dag yid la bsams pa de dag kyang de las 'grub par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-21: de mi'i; bde ba mchog myong nas gal te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-22: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi 'jig rten du tshe ring ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:192b-23: shin tu rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-2: snga ma bzhin du gal te rnam par byang ba zag pa med pa'i lam gyis yongs su bsngo bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-3: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-5: dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-6: phra ma spangs pas tshe 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-7: pha rol gyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-8: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-9: thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-11: phra ma spangs pas tshe 'di la las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni mdza' bshes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-19: gzhan gyi kha drang du mi rung zhing bshes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-21: spun mi mthun pa dag gis dbye bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-22: gal te nor dang bral bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-23: nor dang bral bar gyur na'ang mi gtong zhing mu ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-27: gnas skabs mi mthun par chud na'ang mi gtong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-28: nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la gang dag de'i skyon smran de dag de la thabs kun gyi nyan par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-29: de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du brtan par 'gyur zhing chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193a-31: mi 'dza' ba'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-0: dri ma chen po phra ma spangs @193b pa'i yon tan ni de dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-1: lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu'ang bde 'gro mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-2: de der yang lha'i ris mthun pa'i lha mo'i tshogs mang po rtag tu rjes su chags pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing me tog phreng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-5: rgyan thogs pa rnams kyis rtag tu dga' ba'i mchog byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-6: snga ma bzhin du gal te phra ma spangs pa rnam par byang ba zag pa med par yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-7: de zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi lam yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-9: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam 'jig rten thams cad skyo bar byed pa'i tshig rtsub bo spangs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-10: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-11: tshig rtsub bo spangs pa de ni dge ba mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-13: dbugs dbyung ba'i gnas dang; 'jig rten kun gyis rtogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-14: tshig 'jam zhing des la snyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-15: gzhan la rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-16: skye bo thams cad kyi dbugs 'byung ba byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-17: de rgyang ring po nas mthong nas skye bo kun nye bar 'gro bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:193b-19: nor rdzas med na'ang skye bo kun de'i bran dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-0: gal te de las gzhan zhig gis nyon @194a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-1: mongs pa byung na'ang de dag gis de nam yang gtong bar mi byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-2: de'i don thams cad nyon mongs pa med par nye bar sgrub la de la mi mdza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-6: mtshon gyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-7: lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-8: der skyes nas kyang tshig gi rgyu 'jam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-10: snyan pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-12: snga ma bzhin du gal te nges par 'byung ba'i bsam gtan bde ba'i gnas zag pa med par yongs su bsngo na de byang chub gsum 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-14: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam tshig kyal pa spangs pas tshe 'di la ji ltar 'thob par 'byung ba dang; phyi ma la gang du skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-17: tshig kyal pa spangs pa ni 'jig rten na rigs btsun par 'gyur zhing de bkur bar yang 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-18: tshig snga phyi 'brel bar 'gyur zhing tshig la skye bo thams cad mngon par dga' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194a-19: de la skyon gyis su'ang rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed la tshig shin tu 'brel cing 'jig rten na btsun par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-1: zab mo'i rgyu'i tshul dag chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba'i gtam smra ba 'jig rten na bla ma dang 'dra bar lta zhing nor rdzas brtan par yang 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-2: log par spangs pa'ang skye bo pha rol dag gis yon tan du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-3: de'i yon tan des skye bo dag gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-4: lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-5: der skyes nas kyang lha'i bu thams cad sems par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-7: lha'i bde ba dbe [?] med pa la spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-8: snga ma bzhin du gal te rnam par byang ba zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde bar yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-9: de byang chub gsum 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-10: de ltar lus kyi rnam pa gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-11: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi mi dge ba yongs su spangs na mthar mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-12: de ni dge ba'i las kyi rgyu yin la 'jig rten na'ang bsngags par 'gyur zhing lha rnams kyi nang du'ang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-14: ngag gi las yang dag par gyur pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba nang gi yang dag par gyur pa rjes su mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-16: yid kyi las ji ltar dge bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:194b-17: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-0: yid kyi mi dge ba de rnam p @195a *//
