K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-1: gsum po de dag zlog pas dge ba'i 'bras bu tshe 'di la bde ba gnas pa myong bar 'gyur zhing lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-2: gal te 'khor ba la yid byung na de rgyu des phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug pa 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-3: yid kyi las ni rnam pa gsum ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-8: brnab sems spangs pas dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji lta bu zhig 'byung zhe na; rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-10: brnab sems spangs pa ni rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-11: rgyal po'i blon po'i nor rdzas kyi rnam pa mang po thams cad gang la'ang yid kyis dbrog pa'i don du sems par mi byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-12: de'i nor rdzas gzhig tu tshor na'ang gzhan gyis rnyed cing de la skye bo de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-13: gtso bor gyur pa zhig na'ang slar sbyin par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-14: nor dang rtag tu ldan zhing gzhan dag gis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-15: lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur la der skyes nas kyang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195a-16: lha ma yin du g-yul 'gyed pa'i tshe lha ma yin gang gis kyang yongs su thub par mi 'gyur zhing rdeg par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-0: rnam par @195b the 'tsham par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-1: de dag las rnam par phye bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-2: lha'i bu thams cad la 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-8: gzugs dang; dri sdug pa dpe med pa nye bar spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-9: snga ma bzhin du gal te nges par 'byung ba zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu'i lam du yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-10: de byang chub gsum 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-12: gnod sems mi dge ba'i las kyi lam spangs pas dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-13: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-15: gnod sems spangs pas tshe 'di nyid la 'byor pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-17: skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-19: pha rol gyis 'jigs shing nyam nga ba mi bzad pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-20: rnam par gtse bar mi nus shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-28: 'jigs pa du mnyam nga ba dag dang bral zhing 'jigs pa dang nyam nga ba dag las kun tu thar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-29: skye bo thams cad kyi sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:195b-32: dge ba'i skye bo la bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-2: lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-3: der yang rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-7: reg bya 'dod pa thams cad 'byor ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing dga' ba'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-10: shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal chen po rnams su lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-13: yid la lha gang gis kyang rnam par gtse bar mi nus shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-14: de la lha 'bum snyed dag gis dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-15: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi 'dod pa dang sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-19: lha ma yin gyi g-yul 'gyed pa'i nyon mongs pa dag kyang med cing 'khrug pa dag dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-20: gal te nges par 'byung ba 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam nyon mongs pa med par yongs su bsngo na de lha'i 'jig rten de nas shi nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che sna bdun la nye bar spyod pa rnam pa du mar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-22: bud med rin po che ni de'i bud med kyi lus las tsan dan dang spos 'byung zhing kha nas autpa la'i dri 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-23: bya ka lingka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196a-24: bya ka lingka zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i gling la gnas pa'i bya yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-0: de @196b ltar 'di'i ma thus gang la reg pa nyid kyi lus kyi nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-1: gling de na gnas pa'i skye bo bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-2: skom pa dang mya ngan dang bral bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-3: bud med de lta bu de 'khod los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos mthong nas grang ba'i dus su ni dro bar byed cing dro ba'i dus su ni bsil par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-4: de la mi gzhan gang gis kyang reg par bya bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-5: de gnod sems spangs pa'i mthus dge ba'i las kyi rjes su zhugs pa dge ba thams cad yang dag par rtog pa'i mi de dag thams cad kyis ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-7: de'ang rgyal po'i yid du 'ong zhing de la gus par byed pa de'i snying du sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-8: rtag tu bde ba'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-9: bud med kyi skyon rnam pa lnga spangs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-11: skyes pa gzhan la sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-13: mi rigs par chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-14: mi rigs pa'i gnas la rjes su dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-15: khyim thab kyi srog gcod par 'dzin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-16: bud med rin po che'i yon tan lnga dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-18: bsam pa dang mthun par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-19: bu mang po btsa' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-22: khyim thab bud med gzhan la sems na phrag dog mi byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-23: gzhan yang bud med chen mo'i yon tan gsum dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-25: tshig cal col med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:196b-26: log par lta ba med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-4: reg bya dag gis dbang du mi 'gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-5: de rgyu des lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-6: de ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bud med rin po che la nye bar spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-8: gnod sems kyi dri ma chen po spangs pas dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por ji lta 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-9: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-11: gzhan gyi mi dge ba'i las kyi rgyu mthun pa gnod sems chen po spangs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-12: rin po che gnyis pa nor bu rin po che la nye bar spyod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-13: de'i yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-15: mtshan mo rab tu gsal ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-16: ji ltar ston ka'i zla ba nya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-17: ston ka 'od gsal bar 'gyur ba de ltar nor bu'ang mtshan mo'i mun pa mun nag dag la dpag tshad brgyar 'od byung zhing nyin par tsha bas gdungs pa rnams la ni 'od bsil ba 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-18: tsha ba sel bar byed pa 'di ni nor bu de'i yon tan gcig yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-20: yon tan gnyis pa ni gang gis tshe lam du zhugs pa la chu dang bral ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197a-21: skom pas gdungs pa rnams la chu chen po yan lag brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-0: ldan pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la des skom pa de dag thams cad @197b sel bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-1: 'di ni nor bu de'i yon tan gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-3: nor bu de'i yon tan gsum pa ni gang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos bsams pa nor bu de las 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-4: 'di ni nor bu de'i yon tan gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-6: nor bu de'i yon tan bzhi pa ni yan lag brgyad par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-7: de'i cha ra res 'od kyi kha dog sna tshogs gtong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-12: btsod ka'i kha dog lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-14: nor bu de'i yon tan lnga pa ni nor bu de gang na 'dug pa dpag tshad brgyar nye ba dag gi nad med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-15: rtag tu yid mnyam par gzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-16: de'i 'dod pa thams cad las ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-18: nor bu de'i yon tan drug pa ni klung na pas char mi bzad pa mngon par dbab par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-20: nor bu de'i yon tan bdun pa ni mya ngam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-24: yul dang bral ba rnams shing ljon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-29: ne'u gsing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-31: nor bu de'i yon tan brgyad pa ni mi gang yang dus ma par 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-33: dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dag gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:197b-34: mi mthun pas yang mi mthun pa la gnod par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-2: sbrul lta bu ste yon tan chen po brgyad po de dag dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-3: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i gnod sems spangs pa dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin par 'gyur ba de ni de'i bu'ang stong tham par 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-4: dpa' zhing rtul phod la yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-5: pha rol gyi sde mngon par 'joms pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-7: chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-9: 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad dga' zhing rang bzhin gyis rjes su chags pa dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-11: gnod sems spangs pas gsum pa 'jig rten du 'khor lo rin po che ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-12: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis brtags na 'khor lo rin po che yon tan lnga dang ldan par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-14: dzambu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-15: tshad dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-17: 'jig rten na nyi ma gnyis pa lta bu rnam par mdzes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-18: 'di ni de'i yon tan dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-20: 'khor lo rin po che'i yon tan gnyis pa ni nam mkha' la dpag tshad 'bum du nyi ma gcig gis thogs pa med par 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198a-22: 'khor lo rin po che de'i yon tan gsum pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-0: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal @198b po nub gyi ba lang spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-2: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-3: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i gnas gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-4: der nam mkha' la 'khor lo rtsibs stong yod pas 'gro zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-5: de'i mthus de'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-8: rkang thang pa dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-10: 'khor lo rin po che de'i yon tan bzhi pa ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang mi thos pa de 'khor lo rin po che des grogs byas te thos par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-12: 'khor lo rin po che de'i yon tan lnga pa ni sngo ba gang yang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-13: chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyal po la rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-14: blon po'i chos kyi grogs pos mthong ma thag tu de dag thams cad 'bul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-15: de ltar 'khor lo rin po che yon tan lnga dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-16: rin po che chen po gsum pa bshad zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-18: gnod sems spangs pa'i dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bzhi pa glang po che ji ltar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-19: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:198b-20: 'di la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i glang por 'gyur ba ni cang shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-0: pha rol gyi sde las rgyal @199a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-2: yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-5: mjug ma ma zegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-6: rig pa mdoms kyi gnas na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-7: sna legs par gnas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-8: de dag la sogs pa de'i yan lag bdun dag sa'i steng na legs par rab tu gnas pa yin stobs che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-9: rang bzhin gyis glang po che stong gi stobs yang dag par 'dzin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-10: rkan 'jam pa dang ldan zhing mdog dkar ba kha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-11: dngul gyi mdog lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-13: brgya byin gyi glang po che lta bu yin la; glang po che gzhan dag de'i dri tshor nas mdun du 'dug par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-14: gnas gsum du g-yul 'gyed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-19: shugs phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-20: nyin gcig gis dzambu'i gling lan gsum skor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-21: skud pas kyang dkrir rung bar 'gyur la gang gi tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po cang shes la zhon pa de'i tshe sems dang mthun par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-22: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang du sems 'jug par 'gyur ba der glang po cang shes pa de ma bskul kyang 'jug go ;dal gyis 'gro zhing 'gying bas spyi bor bskyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199a-23: gnod pa med cing 'khrug pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-0: byis pa'i nang du song na'ang byis pa rnams la 'jigs @199b bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-3: ba gam gyi nang du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-4: phan tshun 'gro ba na bud med kyis kyang reg par bzod pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-5: g-yul 'gyed pa'i dus su drag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-6: gnas pa'i dus su ni skud pas dkrir rung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-7: rgyal po'i glang po che'i yon tan ni de dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam re re spyad pas kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sa bon 'di dag 'grub na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mtha' dag gi rjes su zhugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-9: de ltar rnal 'byor spyod pa de lha'i mig gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bzhi pa glang po rin po che mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-11: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rta rin po che'i yon tan ni du zhig dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-12: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-13: rta rin po che ngang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-14: me tog ku mu da ltar dkar ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-15: kun nas lha'i nor bu'i gtsug la sogs pa mtshan bzang pos brgyan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-18: dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-19: bsgo na nyin gcig gis dzambu'i gling lan gsum du skor bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-20: de'i lus dag la shin tu nad med pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-21: 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che lnga pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:199b-23: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i blon po rin po che ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-1: pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-3: blon po rin po che'i yon tan ni 'di dag yin te; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-4: gang rgyal po'i bya ba'i rnam pa yid la sems pa de nyid ma bsgos kyang de'i yid kyis shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-5: rgyal po la yongs su 'bul bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-9: chos ma yin pa rnam par spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-10: shin tu rigs pa brtsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-14: gzhan la gnod pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-15: skye bo la rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-16: yang dag pa'i tha snyad dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin la skyo ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-17: rgyal po'i bya ba'i rnam pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-18: chos kyi don gyi bya ba 'dod pa dang ldan zhing ma 'ongs pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa thams cad yongs su 'bul bar byed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-19: 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i blon po rin po che yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-20: lhag pa'i gnod sems spangs pa'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spyod pa dag ni 'jig rten thams cad la pha ma ltar phan par 'dod par gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-22: ji ltar na bdun pa khyim bdag rin po che 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-23: khyim bdag rin po che de'i yon tan ni du zhig yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200a-24: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-0: lha'i mig gis mthong @200b ste; rgyal ba'i bka' nyan pa khyim bdag rin po che'i yon tan ni 'di dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-3: rin po che mthon ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-5: spug la sogs pa rin po che rnams kyis dam grogs dang; g-yang sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-7: mi mthun pa gzhan dag tu ma bskos kyang shin tu 'gengs la rin po che rnams kyang zad pa med par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-9: dngul lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-10: khyim bdag rin po che 'di'i 'byor pa ni shin tu gnas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-13: gzhan la mi gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-14: skye bo thams cad dga' ba ni khyim bdag rin po che yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-15: de ltar rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa ni mi'i gnas bzhi rnams la sgo bar byed cing klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-18: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi dbang po'i stan phyed 'phrog pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-19: de ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-20: de'i nye ba'i rin po che sna bdun ni rin po che de dag las cung zad dman pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-22: ral gri nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-23: pags pa nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-24: mal cha nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-25: tshal nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-26: khyim nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-27: gos nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-28: lham nye ba'i rin po che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-29: de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ral gri nye ba'i rin po che'i yon tan ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:200b-31: yul 'khor gang dag rgyal po'i yid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-0: tshig las 'gal ba byed 'dod pa de @201a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-1: ral gri nye ba'i rin po che 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-2: des btab pa med cing ral gri rin po ches su la'ang btab pa med kyis kyang yul 'khor kun gyis mthong nas 'dud par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-3: nye ba'i rin po che de'i yon tan ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-5: chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med kyang yul 'khor de dag thams cad 'dud par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-6: 'di ni ral gri nye ba'i rin po che'i yon tan yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-7: pags pa nye ba'i rin po che'i yon tan ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-8: pags pa rin po che ni rgya mtsho nas 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-9: de byung bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-10: tshong ba dag gis rgyal po la 'bul bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-11: de'i yon tan ni 'di dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-12: de rgya mtsho'i klu'i pags pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-13: zheng du dpag tshad lnga la chur dpag tshad bcu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-17: grang na dro bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-18: dro na bde ba bsil bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-19: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa gang du 'gro ba der blon po rin po ches de khyer bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-20: ji ltar so so nas byed pa ltar de rgyal po'i 'khor gyi khyim gyi bya ba thams cad byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-21: bud med mi sdug pa dag mi mthong zhing dkar ba de dang ldan par 'gyur la zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-22: nyi ma'i 'od snang ba de dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-23: gsum pa rgyal po'i mal cha rin po che ni yang zhing 'jam la mtho dma' can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201a-24: de'i rgyu mtshan ni bteg na 'phar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-0: mnan na @201b nam byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-1: gal te bsam gtan sems na de'i bsam gtan rnam par grol zhing blo gros gsal bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-2: gal te 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa yin na de mal cha'i steng du 'dug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-3: de'i tshe 'dod chags dang bral zhing chags pa med par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-5: gti mug dag la'ang de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-6: mal cha nye ba'i rin po che ni bsam gtan gyi gnas dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-7: rgyal po mal cha rin po che'i nang na 'dug pa bud med kyis mthong la de'i tshe mchog tu dga' ba skyes kyang yid la shin tu 'dod chags par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-8: gsum pa 'di ni mal cha nye ba'i rin po che'i yon tan yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-9: bzhi pa tshal nye ba'i rin po che yon tan du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-11: gal te rgyal po tshal du bsam gtan la dga' bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-12: de der nye bar 'gro na tshal de'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-13: rgyal po'i dge ba'i las kyis gang lha'i 'jig rten gyi tshal gyi dga' ba'i rnam pa me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-17: 'bab pa'i chu ngogs bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-18: lha'i bu mo dag rol mo byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-19: dgod la mdzes pa rtse ba de dag thams cad lha'i ris de nas tshal der nye bar 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-20: rgyal po de'ang lha bzhin du lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:201b-21: tshal nye ba'i rin po che der bud med dang lhan cig shin tu dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-0: dge ba'i las kyi rnal 'byor spyod pa de bzhi @202a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-1: pa tshal nye ba'i rin po che mthong nas gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-2: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyim nye ba'i rin po che ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-3: yon tan ni du zhig dang ldan zhe na; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-4: gang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyim nye ba'i rin po che'i nang du nyal bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-5: mtshan mo nyal ba de'i tshe zla ba lta bar 'dod na 'ong zhing gza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-6: rgyu skar dang; skar mda' dag kyang de'i khyim der nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-7: de'i nor bu'ang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-8: lha mo dag kyang lha'i rol mo byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-9: gang mya ngan mang po dang bral ba'i mi de bde bar gnyid log par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-10: gnyid log pa na rmi lam dge ba mchog tu dga' ba dag mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-11: grang ba'i dus su ni rlung dro ba ldang zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-12: dro ba'i dus su rlung bsil ba reg na bde zhing 'jam pa ldang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-13: mtshan mo thun gsum las thun gnyis la nyal zhing thun gsum pa las gnyid dang bral nas langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-14: bde ba'i chos la gnas par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-15: 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyim nye bar rin po che yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-16: gos rin po che rnam pa du yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-17: yon tan ni du zhig dang ldan zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-19: thags bzang zhing mchog tu 'jam la dri mas ma gos pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202a-26: dub pa'i gnod pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-0: me dang @202b mtshon dag gis bsreg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-3: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lha ma nye bar rin po che ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-4: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-5: lha'i mig gis brtags na lham nye ba'i rin po che 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rkang pa la gyon na ji ltar skam sa la rkang pa mi 'bying ba de bzhin du chu la'ang mi 'bying bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-6: gal te dal gyis sngon du 'gro bar 'dod na dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus la ngal ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-7: 'di dag ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-8: nye ba'i rin po che sna bdun dag la spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-10: lha'i rigs gnyis la nye bar spyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-11: de'i bu dpa' zhing rtul phod la pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tham pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-12: de dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la phyag byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-13: gnod sems mi dge ba'i las spangs pa ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi rgyu mthun pa bde ba de dag myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-15: 'khor ba thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-16: thog ma med pa'i dus nas mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-17: yang dag par sbyor ba thams cad kyi bag la nyal du gyur pa log par lta ba spangs pa ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:202b-18: yang dag pa'i lta bas 'khor ba las grol ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-1: chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-3: rnal 'byor spyod pa des chos la chos kyi rjes su mthong ba ni 'di la log par lta ba spangs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-4: de'i yang dag pa'i lta bas don med pa thams cad spangs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-5: yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'i bag la nyal 'dor bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-6: de mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar 'gyur zhing 'khor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-8: 'di la log par lta ba rnam pa lnga mthong nas dbang po lnga bsgrubs par 'gyur ba ni skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' ba de thog ma nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dag rnar thos nas de'i tshe 'di ltar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la dmigs shing 'gro ba lnga rnams la 'jigs pa chen po lnga dmigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-9: lha rnams la bag med pas 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-10: mi rnams la 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-11: sems can dmyal ba rnams la gnod pa'i sdug bsngal dang; yi dvags rnams la bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-13: dud 'gro rnams la gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203a-14: de ltar rnam pa lnga po de dag rnam pa du ma yod cing sdug bsngal gyi yan lag dbye ba dag dpag tu med par dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-0: de'i tshe 'di ltar thog ma nyid du 'khor ba thams cad las nges par byung bar gyur cing snang bar gyur la dam pa'i chos nges @203b par 'byed pa'i cha lam rab tu 'byung bar sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-1: de'i sems bskyed pa gcig las dge ba'i chos kyi rgyun nyid skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-2: gang gis de'i sems bskyed pa de dang yang dag par ldan pa la bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rab tu mgu zhing kun tu dga' la rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-3: sems rangs par gyur nas yid la rigs kyi bu 'di ming ni 'di zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-5: de thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams spong bar 'dod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-6: bdud kyi yul gyi dngos po mi 'dod par zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-7: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yul dag gis dga' pa'i 'dod chags kyi mod las skyes pa'i sred pa dag la kun tu mi dga' ba yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-9: log par lta ba dang bral ba'i rigs kyi bu de ni de ltar rtag tu rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kun tu bsten par byed cing goms par byed la mang du byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-11: dam pa'i chos nyan pa la dga' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos la phyir zhing sems gsal la phyag 'tshal bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-14: ngag gi las kyi mtha' zhi zhing shin tu gsal ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:203b-17: yid zhi bas nyin mo mnyam par bzhag par bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin gyis rig nas kun tu dga' bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-0: rigs kyi bu 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sems rab tu dang zhing khyim gyi gnas gzeb lta bur gyur pa la @204a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-2: des bdud kyi yul rnams la thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dag gis 'dod pa'i lha dang lhan cig tu 'du shes dag la chags pa med cing bdud dang lhan cig g-yul 'gyed par 'dod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-3: nyon mongs pa spong bar 'dod pa de bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin gyis rig nas kun tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-5: rigs kyi bu de de ltar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la dmigs nas ches shin tu rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-7: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-8: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-11: brdzun du smra ba spangs nas sdom pa len par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-12: de gang gi tshe dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa rdzogs par spyod par 'gyur bag de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-13: bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin kun tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-14: rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig ming 'di zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-15: rus ni 'di zhes bya ba grong khyer che ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-16: grong rdal ga ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-17: yul ga ge mo zhig tu skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-18: kha spu bregs te chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-19: bdud kyi phyogs ni dams par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-20: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mtho bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204a-21: bdud kyi 'ching ba ni rnam par gcod par byed cing nyon mongs pa chen po 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug las grol bar byed do zhes mngon par sgrogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-0: log @204b par lta ba ni kun tu sbyor ba'i bag la nyal thams cad kyi gzhi yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-1: yang dag par lta ba ni mtha' mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzhi yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-2: rnal 'byor spyod pa bas chos de rjes su mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-3: de'i tshe 'di ltar thog ma nyid du yang dag pa'i lta ba la mngon par bstod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-4: mi rgod mi smod skyon du mi 'grang la pha rol dag la bstod par byed cing rab tu 'jog par byed do; ;log par lta ba la smod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-5: bstod par mi byed la smod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-6: yang dag par lta bas ni log par lta ba las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-8: rnam par smin pa yang dag par mngon par ston par byed cing 'jog par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-9: 'ching ba rnams kyi rtsa ba ni log par lta ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-10: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi 'ching ba yin zhing 'byung po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-13: yi dvags kyi yul du gnas pa'i mtha' yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-14: rigs kyi bus de spangs na dge ba du ma de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-16: rigs kyi bu de 'di ltar khyim gyi gnas ni sdug bsngal ba nyam nga ba 'ching bar gyur pa du ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-17: rang dbang med par rig nas khyim nas 'byung zhing rab tu 'byung bar 'dod la bdud dang lhan cig g-yul 'gyed par 'dod pa'i skyes bu dam pa des bla dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:204b-18: bar snang la spyod pa'i lha dag gis rig nas kun tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-0: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams la kun tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rigs kyi @205a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-1: kyi bu 'di zhes bya ba grong che ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-2: grong rdal mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-3: yul ga ge mo zhig tu skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-5: gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pa nyid kyis khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-6: de khyim nas byung bas bdud kyi phyogs ni dams par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho bar byed do zhes mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-7: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis sa bla dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-8: bar snang la spyod pa'i lha dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-9: gnod sbyin de dag las de skad thos nas yid dga' la bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin dag rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-10: de ltar dzambu'i gling gi mi dam pa'i chos dge ba'i gtam gyis spro ba skyes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-11: rigs kyi bu de ji ltar rigs par 'phags pa dge sbyong gi mkhan po la bsnyen bkur byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-12: bsnyen bkur byas nas kyang skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-13: kha spu bregs shing gos ngur smrig bgos te so sor thar pa'i sdom pa len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-14: sdom pa blangs pas sa bla dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-15: bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams lhag par kun tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-16: rgyal po chen po bzhi la dzambu gling na rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig ces bya ba grong mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-17: yul ga ge mo zhig tu log par lta ba spangs nas yang dag par lta ba'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-18: chos yang dag par blangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205a-20: chung ma la sred pa dug lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-0: don med cing nyam nga ba thams cad spangs @205b nas; skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-1: kha spu bregs gos ngur smrig bgos shing so sor thar pa blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-4: dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod las ksyes pa spong bar 'dod pa yin no zhes mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-5: de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi kun tu dga' nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la dzambu'i gling du rigs che ge mo zhig las grong mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-6: yul ga ge mo zhig du rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig log par lta ba spangs nas yang dag par lta bas skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-8: gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa nyid kyis khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-9: dge slong ga ge mo zhig gi drung du gnas so zhes mngon par sgrogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-10: de lha rnams kyis thos nas bdud kyi phyogs dams par 'gyur zhing dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes yid dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-11: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi las rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis thos nas shin tu yid dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-13: rigs kyi bu de 'di ltar kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam la'ang 'jigs par lta la bzod cing dul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-14: sems yang dag par sdom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-15: 'du 'dzi la mi dga' zhing nye bar khro ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-16: rigs nas rigs su nye bar bsten cing sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'grogs par mi byed la yul gyi rnam par rtog pa la lta bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:205b-17: bza' ba zhim po mang du mi 'dod cing tshogs ngan pa dang spyod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-0: yul gyi spyod pa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed cing @206a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-1: nam du'ang mdza' bshes su lta bu'i ngang tshul can du mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-2: yul la spyod pa'i tshul khrims su mi byed cing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-3: zhi ba'i zas kyis gnas shing bdud kyi 'ching ba gcod pa la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-4: yang dag par lta ba la rtag tu brtson zhing skyes bu dam pa 'jig rten thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-7: rtag tu byams sems bzod ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-8: 'byung bo kun gyi pha lta bur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-9: de la 'jig rten rjes su lta //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-10: ma byin len pa spangs pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-11: rtag tu shes ldan dbang po thul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-12: lus kyi las mtha' dge ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-13: srid pa dag las de brgal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-14: ri mor bris pa'i bud med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-15: mig gis lta bar mi byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-16: 'jig rten 'dod pa dam bcom pa; ;de lta bu ni grol zhes bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-17: dpa' la bong ba gser du 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-18: mya ngan bral zhing mnyam par gzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-20: de ni mtha' yas sgo thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-21: gang la don dang don min mnyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-22: de bzhin rnyed dang ma rnyed dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-23: bde dang sdug bsngal sems mnyam pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-24: de ni dge slong zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-25: mdza' bshes mi bshes gnyis ka spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-26: sems ni mnyam zhing dbang po thul; ;gang dag yul gyis nyon mi mongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-27: de 'dra bram zer shes par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-28: yul ni gang dag dug 'dra la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-29: sdang ba dpa' bo nyon mongs bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206a-30: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-0: @206b de yi mya ngan 'das mi ring //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-1: skye dang 'jig pa'i de nyid shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-2: yang dag lta la chags pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-3: gangs ri lta bur blo mi g-yo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-4: de ni 'khor ba las grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-5: tsandan dang ni ral grir mnyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-6: zas ni zhim dang mi zhim mnyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-7: zab dar snam bu mnyam pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-8: srid pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-9: rnyed dang bkur sti mi dga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-10: rtsva stan tsam gyis chog shes la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-11: rnyed dang bkur sti me lta bur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-12: gang gis mthong ba de mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-13: gang dag yul gyi dbang mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-14: sred pa'i chu bor mi 'jug la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-15: rang gi las 'bras de nyid shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-16: d /e ni dge slong sangs rgyas gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-18: ma 'ongs pa la blo mi dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-19: rnal 'byor pa ni da ltar la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-20: mi dga' de yi blo gros med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-21: gang gi blo gros phyir log pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-22: chos la rtag tu gnas par 'gyur; ;dkar po chos la mnyam gzhag pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-24: gang gis sems la rnyog mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-25: rig pa med lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-26: gang la yul ni bran lta bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-27: de la sdug bsngal med pa min; ;gang gis dbang po dbang byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-28: dbang po'i dbang du mi 'gro la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-29: gang dag gzugs sogs mi 'phrogs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-30: nyon mongs med pa thub dang 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-31: gang gis bsams pa dge ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-32: [?] na mthong na dga' ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-33: sems ni rab tu dga' byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-34: mi de zla 'dra thub pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-35: gang dag dgon par mngon dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:206b-36: khang bzang mchog la chags pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-2: zas slong dge slong zhes bya 'od //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-3: dpa' bo zhi dul blo bzang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-4: bde dang sdug bsngal de nyid rig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-5: de ni bla med gnas 'gro zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-6: gang du song bar nyon mi mongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-7: snying brtse ldan zhing blo gros drang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-8: rtag tu bsam gtan pha rol 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-9: phal pa rnams dang mnyam mi 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-10: rnal 'byor de ni bden tshig ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-11: log par lta ba'i chos de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-14: log par lta ba spangs pas yang dag par lta ba sngon du 'gro ba'i yid rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i rim gyis zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba las bla dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-15: bar snang la spyod pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-17: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-18: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-20: rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lha de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-21: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sgrogs par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-22: lha; 'di ltar dzambu'i gling na rigs che ge mo zhig las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-23: grong ga ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-24: grong rdal ga ge mo zhig tu rigs kyi bu ming 'di zhes bya ba skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-26: gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207a-28: yang dag par sdom pa spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-0: dran @207b pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-1: kha na ma tho ba rdzul tsam la'ang 'jigs par lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-2: bdud kyi phyogs dmos par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-3: de bdag cag gis lha rnams la gsol pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-4: de thos nas lha rnams kyi dbang po'i brgya byin shin tu yid dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-5: brgya byin gyi mdun na 'don de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-6: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kun tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-7: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam le'ur bcad pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-8: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-11: zag pa rim gyis spangs pa'i dge slong dag dang po mi dge ba'i chos spong zhing dge ba'i chos ji ltar sgom par byed cig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-12: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-13: lha'i mig gis brtags na dge slong de thog ma nyid du yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-14: dbang po 'di dag phan tshun rgyu rkyen du gyur pa bdag gis skye bo kun thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'khor bar zhugs shing yongs su 'khyam pa de dag nyid kyi skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa yul gyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-16: yul de dag gis skye bo 'di dag 'khyam mo snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:207b-17: de re zhig thog ma nyid du de ltar dben pa la mngon par dga' goms par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-0: dur khrod dben pa rnams su @208a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-1: sems spre'u lta bu gdul ba'i phyir goms par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-2: dben pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems shin tu dang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-3: de grong dag tu rgod rgod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-4: sgeg sgeg; rtse rtse ba dag la mngon par mi dga' zhing pha rol gyi bud med de la lta bar mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-5: 'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-6: tshangs par spyod pa la tshogs gnyis 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-9: de tshogs gnyis spangs nas dang por de'i yid rtse gcig la dga' zhing rab tu dang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-10: de thog ma nyid du ji ltar na sems 'di bsdu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-11: gzung bar nus snyam du yang dag par rnam par rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-12: de thog ma nyid du 'di ltar yid kyi dpyod pa bco brgyad dag gis dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-14: lung du ma bstan pa la yid 'jug par byed do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-17: mig gis gzugs mngon nas yid bde ba'i gzugs mngon nas yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba so sor myong bar byed cing yang dag par rab tu rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-18: yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-19: de'i dge ba'i chos rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208a-20: btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-0: de @208b ltang rna bas sgra thos nas yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-1: yid mi dge ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni rnam par byang ba la dmigs pa dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-2: btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-3: de bzhin du snas dri bsnams nas yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-4: yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni rnam par byang ba dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-5: btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-6: de bzhin du lces ro myong nas yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no; ;yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni rnam par byang ba dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-7: btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-8: de bzhin du lus kyis reg bya ba la reg nas yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-9: yid mi bde pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni rnam par byang ba dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-10: btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:208b-11: de bzhin du yid kyis chos shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-1: ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-2: yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni rnam par byang ba dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-3: btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-4: de ltar yid kyi dpyod pa bco brgyad kyi rnam par smin pa dag gis 'khor ba na 'chi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-6: gang gi tshe dge slong de yid kyi dpyod pa bco brgyad dag mthong ba de'i tshe bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin kun tu dga' nas sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-7: bar snang ba la spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-8: sa bla'i gnod sbyin yid rab tu dga' bas rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-9: rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la gang dzambu'i gling du grong che ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-10: grong rdal mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-11: yul ga ge mo zhig tu rigs che ge mo zhig gi rigs kyi bu skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-13: gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-14: de yid kyi dpyod pa bco brgyad dag la rab tu rtog par byed cing mngon sum du byed la dben pa la mngon par dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209a-15: mtha' gcig la spyod pa yin no zhes mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-0: rgyal po chen po bzhi dag las rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dag gis de thos nas bdud kyi phyogs ni dams par 'gyur @209b la; dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho bar 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-2: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-3: lha; gang dzambu'i gling na rigs che ge mo zhig las zhes bya ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-4: rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-5: kha spu bregs gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-6: de dben pa nas dur khrod kyi bar la dga' ba yid kyi dpyod pa bco brgyad la rab tu rtag par byed cing mngon sum du byas nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so zhes mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-7: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha de dag las lha'i dbang po koo shi kas de thos nas yid mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-9: dge slong de yid kyi dpyod pa bco brgyad rab tu mthong ba 'dod pa las gzhan pa'i sa ji lta bu yid la byed cig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-10: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-12: 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs bzhi mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-14: shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-15: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-16: gtong ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-17: nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-18: dge slong gis shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs ji ltar mthong zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:209b-19: 'di la dge slong ni dge slong bdag nyid kyi lus ji ltar gnas pa de chos nyid kyis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-6: rnam par shes pa'i khams de dag rab tu shes shing rnam par 'byed la so sor rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-7: de la sa'i khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-8: sa'i khams rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-11: de la nang na yod pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-12: lus 'di la gang cung zad nang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-13: so so'i nang du bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-15: de la bzung ba ni pags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-16: sha la sogs pas bsdus pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-22: mkhrang ba'i rnam pa ni bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-51: so so'i nang du sra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-52: mkhrang ba'i rnam pa bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-53: zin pa 'di ni nang gi sa'i khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-54: de la phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-55: phyi rol la gang cung zad sra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-56: mkhrang ba'i rnam pa ma bzung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210a-57: ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-0: de la @210b gang sa'i khams de gcig tu bsdus pa'i khams 'di ni khams tsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-1: tshor bas gnas su ma byas shing 'dod rgyal gyis ma byas pa'i sa'i khams rtag par ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-2: bde bar ma yin; gtsang bar ma yin par mthong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-3: de dag tu mi lta ba'i shes rab kyi byin gyis rlabs la lhag par mos pa'i dge slong de ni 'di dag thams cad bdag gi ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-4: de dag bdag ma yin; de dag bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-5: bdag gi ma yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-6: 'di dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-7: sa'i khams la sems 'di 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-8: de ltar dge slong shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs la lhag par mos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-9: de la chu'i khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-10: chu'i khams kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-13: de la nang na yod pa ni lus 'di la gang cung zad chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-14: chu'i rnam pa 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-15: chu'i khams ni lus la gsher ba'i bdag nyid du yod pa rdul dang; mchil ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-26: gang gzhan khang lus 'di la nang so so'i nang du chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-27: chu'i rnam pa bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-28: zin pa gang cung zad yod pa 'di ni nang gi chu'i khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:210b-29: phyi rol gyi gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-0: gang cung zad kyi phyi rol gyi chu @211a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-1: dang; chu'i rnam par gsher ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-3: ma bzung ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi chu'i khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-4: de la gang nang gi chu'i khams dang; gang phyi rol gyi chu'i khams de dag gcig tu bsdus pa'i khams 'di ni khams tsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-5: 'di dag thams cad bdag gi ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-8: bdag gi ma yin pa chu'i khams yang dag par mthong nas chu'i khams la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-9: de ltar dge slong shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-10: de la me'i khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-11: me'i khams kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-14: de la nang gi me'i khams ni lus 'di la gang la cung zad nang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-15: so so'i nang gi me dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-16: me'i rnam pa bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-20: gang gis gdung bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-21: gang gis yongs su sreg par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-22: gang gis 'bar bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-26: myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-29: so so'i nang gi me dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-30: me'i rnam pa bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-31: zin pa 'di ni nang gi me'i khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211a-32: de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-0: phyi rol @211b gyi gang cung zad me dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-4: mi bzung ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi me'i khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-5: de la gang nang gi me'i khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-6: gang phyi rol gyi me'i khams de dag gcig tu bsdus pa'i khams 'di ni khams tsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-7: de dag thams cad bdag gi ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-11: 'di ltar de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas me'i khams la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-12: de byed pa bos gnas su ma byas kyang me'i khams rab tu 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-13: de la rlung gi khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-14: rlung gi khams rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-17: de la nang gi gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-18: lus 'di la gang cung zad nang dang; so so'i nang gi rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-19: rlung gi rnam pa yang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-20: yang zhing g-yo ba bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-22: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-27: de bzhin du ral gri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-29: mtshon cha lta bu'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-31: srin bu dang lhan cig rgyu ba'i rlung brgyad cu dag yod do; ;rlung brgyad cu dag yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-32: nying lag dag gi rjes su 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-33: gang lus 'di la gzhan yang nang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-34: so so'i nang gi rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:211b-35: rlung gi rnam pa yang zhing g-yo ba bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-0: @212a *// zin pa 'di ni nang gi rlung gi khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-1: de la phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-2: phyi rol gyi gang cung zad rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-3: rlung gi rnam pa yang zhing g-yo ba ma bzung ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-4: de la nang gi rlung gi khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-5: gang phyi rol gyi de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus pa'i khams 'di ni khams tsam ste; de dag bdag gi ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-9: byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing tshor ba pos gnas su ma byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-10: de ltar 'di dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi sa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas rlung gi khams de la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-11: 'di ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon sum du byed pa'i dge slong yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-12: de la nam mkha'i khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-13: nam mkha'i khams kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-16: de la nang gi lus 'di la gang cung zad nang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-17: so so'i nang gi nam mkha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-18: nam mkha'i rnam pa bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-19: zin pa mi gsal zhing gzugs kyi rnam pas khyab par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212a-22: myangs pa rnams nang du 'jug par skabs 'byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-0: zas nang du 'gro ba lces @212b skabs 'byed par byed pa 'di ni nang gi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-1: de la phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-2: gang cung zad ma bzung ba ma zin pa mi gsal zhing khyab par byed pa ma yin pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-4: shing lo'i bar gyi gseb dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-5: ri phug gi bu ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-6: ri phug gi bu ga'i gseb dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-8: gang phyi rol gyi bu ga yod pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-9: de la gang nang gi gzugs kyi rnam pa'i nam mkha'i khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-10: gang phyi rol gyi de dag gcig tu bsdus pa'i khams 'di ni khams tsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-11: de dag thams cad bdag gi ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-13: de dag bdag dang bdag gi ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-14: 'di ltar de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas nam mkha'i khams la sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing de dag mthong nas 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-15: de dag thams cad bdag gi ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-19: byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-20: tshor ba pos gnas su ma byas pa'i nam mkha'i khams la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-21: de la yid kyi khams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-22: skye mched bcu gnyis dang yang dag par ldan pa ni yid kyi khams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-23: mig gi rnam par shes pas don mthong ba yid kyi rnam par shes pas rjes su myong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:212b-24: de bzhin du rna ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-1: dang; yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu 'byung ba'i rtsa ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-3: yid ni sngon du 'gro ba'i chos; ;yid mgyogs yid ni 'gro ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-4: yid ni shin tu gsal ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-6: sdig pa'i mtshan nyid gsal ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-7: 'chi dang skye ba rnams shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-8: las 'bras de nyid shes pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-10: gang dag dbang po kun 'dzin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-11: 'byung po kun la phan par dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-12: dbang po bde zhing zhi la dul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-13: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-14: ji ltar dbang po dul la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-15: 'dod chags dgra ni zlog par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-16: dpa' bo shes rab byed ldan gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-17: de ni zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-18: dgon par gnas la dga' byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-19: mnyam gzhags la gnas pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-20: mkha' sprin rlung gis gtor ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-21: sdig pa'i chos rnams 'jig par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-22: lus ngag las kyi mtha' dge zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-23: spyod pa dge la yang dag dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-24: de nyid lta zhing bya ba mkhas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-25: bdud kyis sgrub pa 'jig par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-26: 'dod chags la sogs mi gnod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-27: dge ba'i sems la brkam chags med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-28: byams dang snying rje mang ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-29: dge slong nges par 'byung la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-30: gang dag yul gyis 'chid ba'i rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-31: gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213a-32: de ni zhi ba mchog 'gro zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-0: gang du song bar nyon mi @213b mongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-2: dge slong 'di dang po yid kyi dpyod pa bco brgyad kyi dang po'i sa las sa gzhan gnyis pa la 'dug pa ni khams drug gi de nyid shes pa'i sa la ci da ltar chos rjes su dran pa'i sa la 'jug gam snyam nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-4: sa gzhan gsum pa la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-5: dge slong de nyid mthong ba de'i sa gzhan gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-6: sems phan tshun du 'gyur ba ni sa gzhan yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-7: de bde ba skyes pa rnam par shes shing sdug bsngal skyes pa rnam par shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-8: yid bde ba rnam par shes shing yid mi bde ba rnam par shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-9: btang snyoms rnam par shes shing bde ba cung zad rnam par shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-10: bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa la brten nas bde ba'i tshor ba skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-11: de bde ba'i tshor ba 'di myong ba na bde ba'i tshor ba myong ngo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-12: de nas de bde ba myong ba'i reg pa gang 'gags na de bde ba myong ba'i reg pa la brten nas tshor ba skyes pa myong ba na bdag gi bde ba'i tshor ba nub bo zhes tshor ba nub pa so sor mngon par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-13: de dag bde ba'i tshor ba so sor nye bar zhi zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor pa skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-14: brten nas 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba so sor mngon par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-15: bdag gi bde ba'i tshor ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:213b-16: de dag sor mngon par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-0: ji ltar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i @214a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-1: reg pa bshad pa de ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'ang rgya cher yang dag par brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-2: yid bde ba rnam par shes pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-3: yid bde ba'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i reg pa la brten nas yid bde ba skyes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-4: yid mi bde ba so sor mngon par shes pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-5: yid mi bde ba'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i reg pa la brten nas yid mi bde ba skyes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-6: de nas 'di ltar de'i yid bde ba'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i tshor ba ji lta ba bzhin rjes su rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-7: yid bde ba'i gzhir 'gyur ba 'gog pa mthong nas yid bde ba las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-8: gang bdag gi yid bde ba'i tshor ba sngon skyes pa de zad cing zhi la rnam par bral ba de las de'i 'dod chags dang bral ba skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-9: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-10: de bzhin du yid mi bde ba la'ang brjod par bya zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-11: btang snyoms la'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o; ;de'i sa gzhan gsum pa 'di la 'jug pa la sa bla'i gnod sbyin shin tu dga' nas bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-12: de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon par bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214a-13: de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-0: de dag gis kyang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin koo shi ka la gang @214b dzambu'i gling na rigs kyi bu de skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-2: dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-3: yul che ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-4: grong khyer mang ge mo zhig tu rigs che ge mo zhig las rigs kyi bu ming che ge mo zhig ces bya ba skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-5: kha spu bregs te dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung zhing de sa gzhan gsum pa la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-7: lhan cig g-yul 'gyed par 'dod pas bdud kyi phyogs ni dams par byed la dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho bar byed do zhes mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-8: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin koo shi kas de thos nas mchog tu dga' zhing glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhon te rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha'i tshogs la sogs pas bskor nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams la dzambu'i gling na rigs kyi bu zhes bya gnas rgya cher sbyar te sa gzhan gsum pa la zhugs pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-9: bdud dang lhan cig g-yul 'gyed par 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-10: bdud kyi phyogs dma' bar byed cing dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs mngon par mtho bar byed do zhes bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-11: lha'i dbang po brgya byin las de thos nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams shin tu yid dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-13: dge slong de sa gzhan gsum pa las sa gzhan bzhi pa la ji ltar 'jug cig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:214b-14: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-2: des gzhan bzhi pa la 'jug pa ni reg pa'i rkyen gyis bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba bde ba'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-4: bde ba'i rkyen gyis bdag gis tshor ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-5: de 'gags snying rnam par zhi la nang du nub pa de ma thag tu sdug bsngal gyi reg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-8: sdug bsngal nyid kyis bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-9: de bzhin du btang snyoms kyi rkyen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-10: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba so sor mngon par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-11: skad cig skad cig la bdag gi reg pa'i tshor ba'i grogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-13: de bde ba'i tshor ba la mi dga' zhing chags par mi byed la tshor ba de la mngon par mi dga' zhing mang du mi byed de ro myang bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-14: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas kyang gnod par mi byed cing rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed la rnyog pa can du mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-15: de btang snyoms la gnas te dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-16: shes bzhin dang ldan pa yin na ni tshor ba gsum po 'di dag gis gal te na gtan du sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-17: yang na btang snyoms khyad par can gzhan du 'gyur te; yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215a-21: bdag gis nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-0: 'di @215b ltar rnam par byang ba 'di rdzogs par bya zhing bdag gi sems dang mthun par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-1: bdag gi btang snyoms kyi mthar gtugs pa dang 'bral pa mngon sum du byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-2: de la mchog tu lhag par gnas par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-3: bdag nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi btang snyoms kyis bsdus pa de rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-4: bdag gis 'di ltar yongs su dag cing 'di ltar rnam par byang ba rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-5: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-6: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-7: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi btang snyoms 'di rdzogs par byas te gnas par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-8: de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-9: bdag gi sems mthun par byed la btang snyoms de la gnas shing 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-10: de la lhag par chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-11: de nye bar len pa bdag gi 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi btang snyoms rdzogs par byas te gnas par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-15: gser mgar gyi slob ma mkhas pa de so mal du gser 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-16: bcug nas phra skam gyis bzung zhing yam shing gis 'bud /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-18: las legs par byas pa'i gser de dge zhing bkra shis la kha dog bzang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:215b-21: kha dog bzang bar bsngags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-0: yul thams cad du rjes su @216a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-1: mthun par 'jug pa de dri ma dang bral zhing skyon lhag ma'ang med la dul zhing bkra shis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-2: rin po che'i 'od kyang zil du rlag par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-3: de gser mgar ram; gser mgar gyi slob ma mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis gser legs par sbyang ba byas par rig nas ci 'dod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-4: gal te bgo bar bya ba dag la dril bu'i rgyan byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-5: gal te shin tu blta na sdug pa dag byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-6: gal te dpung rgyan du byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-7: gal te snying gar mdzes pa'i rgyan byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-8: gal te glegs bam la mdzes par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-9: gal te mgo rgyan du byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-10: gal te sor gdub tu byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-11: gal te gser gyi phreng bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-12: gal te rgyan cod pan du byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-14: gang du khyer ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-15: der las dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-16: de bzhin du dge slong shin tu tshul khrims dang ldan pa shes rab can ni bdag gis 'di ltar yongs su dag cing 'di ltar rnam par byang ba gal te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi btang snyoms de rdzogs par byas la bdag de dang mthun par de la gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-18: de la lhag par gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-19: de nye bar len cing de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi btang snyoms rdzogs par byas te gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-20: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-21: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216a-22: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-0: de 'di snyam du sems @216b te gang bdag gi btang snyoms 'di ni mi rtag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-2: ther zug ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin par de gzugs med pa'i skye mched bzhi po de nyid la dmigs nas bdag gi btang snyoms mi rtag cing mi rtag par dmigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-3: mi brtan zhing mi brtan par dmigs te 'dus byas su rig par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-4: nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched mi rtag cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-5: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dmigs su med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-6: ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dmigs su med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-7: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi btang snyoms 'di ni g-yo ba dang bral ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-9: 'di ni nye bar phan pa yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-10: de lus kun tu tshor ba skye zhing myong ba na so sor mngon bar shes shing skyes pa rnams kyang so sor mngon par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-11: 'gags pa so sor mngon par shes shing 'gag pa'ang so sor mngon par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-12: mig gi reg pa las byung ba so sor mngon par shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-13: de bzhin du rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba so sor mngon par shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-14: sna'i reg pa las byung ba so sor mngon par shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-17: yid kyi reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba so sor mngon par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:216b-18: dge slong tshor ba mngon sum du byas pa de tshor ba de dag nyid shin tu rgyas par rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-0: de mig gi reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skye ba na skyes pa la gnas shing myong bar byed la 'gags shing 'gag pa na @217a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-1: bdag gi tshor ba 'gags so zhes so sor mngon par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-3: rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba so sor mngon par shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-4: gang bdag gi mig gi reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba de 'gags shing nub la med par 'gyur te yang mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-5: de dag 'gags nas gzhan yang rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skyes pa bde ba 'di bde ba la dmigs pas sdug bsngal ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-7: sdug bsngal la dmigs pas bde ba ma yin zhing sdug bsngal ma yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-8: de rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ji lta ba bzhin rjes su mthong zhing rnam par shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-9: rna ba dang 'brel ba'i tshor ba dag la kun tu chags pa med la de tshor ba myong ba na 'dod chags dang bral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-11: rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba de 'gags na sna'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-12: de snas kun nas bslang ba snas kun nas so sor myong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-13: bdag sna'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skyes pa bde ba la dmigs pa ni bde ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-14: sdug bsngal la dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217a-15: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba'ang ma yin pa la dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba'ang ma yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-0: de sna'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor myong bar @217b byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-1: nub pa'ang so sor myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-2: de 'gags na sna'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-4: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba'ang ma yin pa skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-5: de so sor myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-6: bdag gi sna'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-7: ji ltar lhag par chags pa skyes pa de ltar bdag gi 'gog pa 'di dag kyang skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-8: de 'gags na lce'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba rnam pa gsum skye ba nas yid kyi dmigs pa'i tshor ba rnam pa gsum snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-9: de sa gzhan bzhi pa la tshor ba yang dag par rgya che ba la 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-10: de'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa spro ba chen po bdud kyi 'ching ba gcod par 'dod pa la sa bla'i gnod sbyin shin tu dga' nas bar snang gi gnod sbyin rnams la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-11: de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-12: de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-13: de dag gis kyang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-14: brgya byin gyis kyang 'thab bral gyi lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-15: gang dzambu'i gling na rigs kyi bu yul che ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-16: grong mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-17: rigs ga ge mo zhig las rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhes bya ba skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:217b-19: gos ngur smrig bogs nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-0: brtson pa'i rim gyis sa gzhan bzhi pa'i tshor ba yang dag par rgya @218a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-1: che ba la zhugs pa bdud kyi phyogs ni dma' bar byed cing yang dag pa dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho bar byed pa de bdag gi lha rnams la bsnyad do snyam mo; ;brgya byin glang po'i che sa srung gi bu la zhon pa de 'thab bral gyi lha dag gis mthong nas dga' ste brgya byin la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-3: gang dzambu'i gling gi mi chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa de /
