K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-5: khyod kyi dam pa'i chos dang mthun par gyur pa nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-7: dge slong de bdud kyi 'ching ba spong zhing rab tu spong ba'i tshor ba la ji ltar rtog ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-8: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-10: dge slong de yang dag pa'i tshor ba nyid la 'di ltar rnam par rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-11: de mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa mi dge ba skyes pa de langs pa na dge ba la dmigs pa gnyis pas 'gags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-12: dge ba skyes pa de'ang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pas 'gags shing lung du bstan pa'ang 'gags la lung du ma bstan pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-13: de bzhin du rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-14: sna'i re ga pa las byung ba'i tshor pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-15: lce'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218a-17: yid kyi reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba so sor myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-0: so sor myong bar byed pa na dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su @218b rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de'i nyon mongs pa bsrabs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-1: de de ltar sgom pa na tshor ba phra mo de dag so sor shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-2: de chos kyi tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-4: ji ltar na mar me'i 'od nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gag pa de bzhin du tshor ba gnyis ka 'gag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-6: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i tshor ba rgyas pa so sor myong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-8: mar me'i 'od la mar me'i 'od gnyis pas gsal bar byed pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-10: tshor ba rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-12: tshor ba gzhan gang zhig gi tshor ba dang lhan cig gtan du mi mthun par 'gyur ram snyam pa las dge ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-13: mi dge ba'i tshor ba lhan cig gtan du mi mthun par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-16: skar ma'i 'od lhan cig mi mthun pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-18: dge slong de rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-19: tshor ba gang zhig la tshor ba gang zhig gis gtan du sel bar byed ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-20: de zag pa med pa la dmigs pa'i tshor bas zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa'i tshor ba la gtan sel ba nyid du mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-22: me'i 'od kyis kha ba zhu ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-23: tshor ba gang zhig la tshor ba gang zhig gis gnod zhig gu snyam nas yang 'di rgyas par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:218b-24: gang gi tshe mi bde ba'i tshor ba la bde ba'i tshor bas zil gyis gnon par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-0: nyi mas nyin mo'i zla ba @219a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-1: ba'i 'od zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhing zla ba'i 'od de'ang mtshan mo rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-3: dge slong de tshor ba rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-4: gang tshor ba mang po dang ldan pa dag tshor ba gcig gi dran pa rtse gcig pa'i tshor ba dang lhan cig mi mthun pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ram snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-5: de 'jig rten pa byed pa'i tshor ba mang po dag 'jig rten las 'das pa zag pa med pa'i tshor bas zil gyis gnon par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-9: skar ma mang po'i 'od dag zla ba'i 'od gcig gis gnon pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-11: dge slong de tshor ba rjes su mthong ba'i tshor ba ches phra ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-15: lus kyis kun nas bslang ba zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba mang ba ni gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-16: dge ba ni ji ltar rtsom zhig gu snyam na de 'jig rten pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba mang ba'ang zag pa med pa snang bas thub par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-20: skar ma rnams kyi 'od zla ba'i snang ba gnas pas thub pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219a-22: dge slong de tshor ba de la rtag ste bdag gi tshor ba gzhan yun ji srid gcig tu gnas snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-0: de skad cig la bdag gi tshor ba gzhan skye zhing 'jig par gnas @219b par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-4: dge slong de 'di ltar rab tu rnam par rtog pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-5: ci mig gi tshor ba sna'i tshor ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ram snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-6: de blo gcig bzhin du dbang po tha dad pa'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba dbang po de dag thams cad kyis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-8: ba lang gcig cig rta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-11: ma he'i rigs tha dad pa rnams kyi rkyen du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du thog ma med pa nas brtson pa'i dbang po lngas kun nas bslang ba'i yul gyi bye brag tha dad pa'i dbang po rnams kyi dmigs pa ni gcig tu mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-18: de ltar tshor ba rjes su mthong ba'i dge slong de dag ni shes pa ches zhib pa skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-19: de shes pa de la kun tu bsten cing skom ste mang du byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-20: de kun tu bsten pa na tshor ba rjes su mthong zhing zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-21: 'jig pa rjes su mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-26: yid kyis kun nas bslang ba'i tshor ba gang nas 'ong zhing gang du song /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-27: 'gag pa na gang du gsog par 'gyur snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-28: dge slong tshor ba zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-29: 'jig pa rjes su mthong ba de rab tu sems pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-30: lam gyi rnam pa la 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:219b-31: mig gi tshor ba gang nas kyang skye ba med cing 'ong ba med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-0: 'gag pa na'ang gang du'ang gsog par mi 'gyur te @220a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-1: gang nas kyang skye ba med cing 'ong ba med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-2: 'gag pa na'ang gang du'ang gsog par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-3: mig gi tshor ba ma byung ba las 'byung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-4: byung nas kyang so sor 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-5: mig gi 'byung khung las tshor ba 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-7: rgya mtsho'i gzhi las chu 'byung ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-8: 'gag pa na'ang gang du'ang mi gsog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-10: chu bo gzhol bar 'gro ba rgya mtshor 'du ba bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-11: mig gi tshor pa ma byung ba las 'byung zhing byung nas kyang so sor 'jig par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-16: yid kyi tshor ba dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-19: rdza mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig 'khor lo la'ang brten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-20: 'jim pa la'ang brten; rtsol ba la'ang brten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-21: chu la'ang brten nas rgyu 'jim pa la brten pa'i bum pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-22: bum pa de 'byung khung gnang nas kyang ma 'ongs shing 'jig pa na'ang gang du'ang gsog par mi 'gyur mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-23: rgyu rkyen las bum pa 'byung ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-29: yid la byed pa la'ang brten nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-30: mig gi tshor ba bde ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220a-32: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba'ang ma yin pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-0: bum pa gal te @220b rgyu rkyen bzang po las byung na bum pa de legs par 'gyur zhing gal te ngan na de'i tshe bum pa ma legs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gal te dmigs pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-1: rkyen bzang na de'i tshe mig la sogs pa tshor ba bzang po skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-2: chos dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rim gyis mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-4: rkyen mi bzang de'i tshe mig la sogs pa'i tshor ba ngan pa skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-5: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug la dmigs pa 'khor ba na sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-9: 'bras bur 'brel ba thams cad la mkhas par sems pa'i dge slong ni tshor ba rjes su tshor ba na tshor ba du ma la gnas par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-10: byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing rgyu med pa las kyang ma byung la 'dod rgyal gyis kyang ma byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-11: ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-15: yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-16: de'i tshor ba'i phung po de mthong nas yang 'byung ba'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod la skyes pa'i dri ma can yongs su nyams par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-17: 'khor ba thams cad mi rtag par rjes su mthong ba'i dge slong ni lam kun tu sten par byed cing goms par byed la mang du byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:220b-18: de de ltar sgom pa na kun tu sbyor ba dag spong bar byed cing bag la nyal 'dor bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-2: rjes su chags pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-3: khong khro ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-4: nga rgyal gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-5: ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang lta ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-6: mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-7: the tshom gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-8: phrag dog gi kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-9: ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-10: kun tu sbyor ba de dag spong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-11: pag la nyal gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-13: 'dod pa 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-14: srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-15: lta ba'i bag la nyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-16: khong khro ba'i bag la nyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-17: ma rig pa'i bag la nyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-18: nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-19: the tshom gyi bag la nyal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-20: 'di dag ni gtso bo ji lta ba bzhin du srid pa gsum du yongs su 'jug par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-21: sa gsum du yongs su rgyu bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-22: nyes pa gsum la yongs su 'jug par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-23: dus gsum gyi rjes su 'gro ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-24: bar ma gsum gyi tshor ba gsum rjes su bsgoms pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-25: skye ba gsum du 'pho bar byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-26: 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-28: ji ltar dge slong de rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221a-29: rkyen du bcas pa 'di dag khong du chud par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-0: gzhi gang la lta bar byed cig gu snyam nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las @221b byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-1: lha'i mig gis brtags na mig gi rgyu ni las las byung zhing las kyis skye ba mngon par bsgrubs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-3: shing pa ta'i sa bon chung ngu las shing ljon pa skyes la shing ljon pa'i rgya rkyen las yang shing pa ta'i sa bon phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-4: de bzhin du mi shes pa las las mngon par 'gyur par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-5: las las kyang skye ba mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-13: 'khrug pa rnams yod cing 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-14: de ltar las kyi rgyu sred pa'i zhags pa des bcings pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo ni 'khor lo lta bu'i rgya mtshor yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-15: tshor ba de dag thams cad kyi rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-16: rkyen 'di dag la 'du shes kyi las su bya ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-17: las med na sred pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-18: de med na tshor ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-24: me la'ang brten nas mar me'i 'od skad cig la mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-25: de bzhin du dge slong de tshor ba'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-27: las kyi rgyu tshol zhing la kyi rjes su 'brang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-28: las kyi mthus tshor ba thams cad skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-29: de la lus ni kong bu lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-30: dbang po dag ni mar lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:221b-31: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni me lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-1: pa skad cig ma ni mar me'i 'od 'bar ba lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-2: rnal 'byor pa gang gis srid pa gsum du 'gro ba'i tshor ba de nyid tshol zhing mthong ba ni shes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-4: gser mgar gser blangs nas las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-5: las su byas pa'i gser las byas pa'i rgyan gyi rnam pa legs par mngon par 'grub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-6: de bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa gser mgar lta bu de dmigs pa gser lta bu la dmigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-7: gal te dmigs pa bzang na de las bzang po mngon par 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-9: gal te dmigs pa ngan na de ngan pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-11: rgyu rkyen de nyid shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-12: don zhib nges par byas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-13: thar pa'i rgyun la mngon dga' na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-14: sred pas khyer bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-15: lus can thams cad las dag gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-16: rjes 'brang las kyi skye gnas dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-17: las kyi 'bras bur sbrel nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-18: srid pa nyam ngar kun tu 'khyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-19: gang zhig mi dge mi len cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-20: rtag tu dge ba'i las dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-21: zla 'od dri ma med pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-23: me yis shing skam bsregs pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-24: sdig pa'i chos rnams rab bsregs pa; ;sdig las grol zhing nyon mongs rgyal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-25: sa gsum dag tu rnam par mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-26: gang zhig yid ni thar 'dod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222a-27: nam yang 'khor bar mi dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-0: @222b mkha' la bya ni 'gro ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-1: gang zhig tshor 'byung de nyid shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-2: tshor ba'i 'bras bu rag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-3: de nyid grol bar shes par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-4: de nyid rig pa srid gsum du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-5: bde sdug gis ni de ma gnod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-6: zhim dang nga bas gos pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-7: gang dag srid pa 'bar pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-8: rnal 'byor de ni bsam pa ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-9: blo gros rtag tu mi rmongs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-10: rtag tu chos kyi pha rol 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-11: dge slong sdom la mngon dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-12: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-13: gnyen lta ba la dga' med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-14: mkhas pa dag la lta 'dod la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-15: khyim gyi skyon las nges 'byung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-16: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-17: dbang po thams cad rab zhi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-18: yul rnams la ni chags med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-19: gnya' shing gang tsam lta ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-20: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-21: khro med khyim la spyod med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-22: tshong zong nyo 'tshang mi byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-23: srang dang bzhi mdor mi dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-24: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-25: glu dang gar la mi lta zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-26: nyes rtsom rnams la chags med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-27: gang dag dur khrod dga' byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-28: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-29: nyi ma gcig la bsod snyoms mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-30: blangs nas sang gir mi sems la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-31: lto 'drangs tsam gyis chog byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-32: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-33: gang dag gos mchog rnam spong zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-34: phyag dar khrod kyis chog 'dzin la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-35: gang dag rigs [?] zas za bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-36: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-37: gang dag las ni mi rtsom zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-38: las rnams kun la bsam med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-39: spro med 'dud pa med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:222b-40: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-2: gti mug 'dam ni rnam spangs la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-3: sdig pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-4: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-6: bag la nyal ba thams cad spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-7: bsam pa kun las rnam grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-8: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-9: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-10: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-11: gang dag nyon mongs kun bcom pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-12: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-13: dbang po dul zhing blo gros brtan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-15: rtse gcig yid ni legs gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-16: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-17: gang dag sa yi rim shes la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-18: se yi de nyid ston byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-19: gang dag phan tshun sa shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-20: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-21: zag bcas zag pa med pa'i chos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-22: rgyu dang rkyen du 'byung ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-23: rnam pa bzhin du kun shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-24: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-25: tshangs par spyod pa drang zhing zhi //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-30: dga' zhing bsam gtan bzhi la dag [?]/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-31: dkon pa kun dgar dga' ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-32: de lta bu ni dge slong yin; ;nam mkha' la ni bya gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-33: de gri ba rtag tu rjes 'gro ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-34: gang blo dam pa'i chos la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-35: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223a-36: gang zhig nyon mongs nye nyon mongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-1: dbugs dbyung rdub pa'i rnam pa shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-2: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-3: gang zhig rig pa'i cho ga shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-4: rnal 'byor rig cing de nyid ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-5: lam dang lam min rim shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-6: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-7: gang zhig dga' la mi chags shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-9: dpa' bo dga' dang 'jigs mnyam pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-10: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-11: rga dang 'chi ba'i de nyid shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-12: lha dang lha min phyag byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-13: sems kyi rnam pa phan tshun shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-14: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-15: gang zhig snam sbyar lhung bzed kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-17: 'dod pa chung zhing tshangs par spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-18: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-19: dri med stan gcig zas za zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-20: zhim pa'i ro la mi chags la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-21: rnyed dang bkur sti spangs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-22: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-23: btang snyoms snying rje dag la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-24: 'chab dang skyon ni rnam spangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-25: nyes pa'i rdzas kun nges bsregs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-26: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-27: dge slong de nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing tshor ba de dag ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-28: de shes pa shin tu zhib mos mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i dmigs pa rjes su rgyu ba med par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-29: dmigs pa gnyis pas lhan cig 'gag cing 'jig pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:223b-30: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i dmigs pa 'das nas bdag sgra la dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba sdug pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-0: @224a *// bdag gi sems de dang ldan cig gyur pa med do snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-1: des sems kyi dmigs pa des bstan par byas nas 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-2: rna ba'i tshor ba sgra la dmigs pa dang bcas pa de 'gags nas sna'i tshor ba dri la dmigs pa skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-3: de sna'i tshor ba la'ang rtog par byed cing shin tu rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-4: bdag gi sna'i tshor ba dri dang bcas pa dge ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-7: lung du ma bstan pa skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-8: bdag gi sna'i tshor ba de'i sems gyur pa gal te des sems gyur pa mthong na des yang dmigs pa de nyid la gom par byed cing spyod la 'bad cing brtson te las su rung bar byed la dge ba'i chos zag pa med pas sems goms par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-9: gal te mi g-yon lce'i dmigs pa dge ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-12: lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-13: de dmigs pa de mngon sum du byas nas bde pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224a-15: sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la lta bar byed cing ci 'dis bdag gi sems gyur tam snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-0: gal te ro la dmigs pa'i tshor ba skyes pas sems gyur pa mthong na des yang sems dmigs pa'i ka ba la mos pa'i thag pas bcings nas ji ltar sems 'di lce'i tshor ba dang bcas shing sred pa dang bcas pas mi 'phrogs par bya snyam nas spyod cing 'bad @224b la nan tan du byed do ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-1: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-4: dge slong de lus kyi reg bya dang bcas pa'i reg bya'i tshor pa dmigs pa'i ka ba la bcings nas dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-6: lung du ma bstan pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-7: gal te de reg bya'i tshor ba des sems gyur par mthong na'ang ji ltar dmigs pa'i ka ba la bcings nas las su rung bar byed cing gyur pa med pa de ltar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-8: yang dge slong de yid la 'ongs pa'i yid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-9: shin tu 'brel ba'i chos kyis tshor ba dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-12: lung du ma bstan pa la lta bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-13: gal te tshor ba de dag gis yid gyur na de dmigs pa'i ka ba de la mos pa'i thag pas bcings nas las su rung bar byed de gyur pa med pa de ltar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-14: yul drug lus la yod pa'i tshor ba la lta ba'i dge slong yang dag pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-15: zad pa de nyid mthong ba ni gnas lnga pa la 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-16: de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes pa'i sgron mas tshor ba myong bar byed pa'i tshor ba 'di dag gang zhig yin zhes rnam par rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-17: de yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshor ba 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:224b-18: yid dang shin tu 'brel par mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-0: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni yid kyi rnam par rtog pas 'phrogs shing shin tu rtog @225a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-3: byed pa po ni gang yang med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-4: rgyu rkyen dang 'brel ba'i 'du byed kyi phung po 'di nyid skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-5: 'du byed kyi phung po 'di nyid 'gag go snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-6: de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ji lta ba bzhin rjes su mthong zhing rjes su 'jug pa des sems mi 'phrogs shing rnam par mi g-yo la skyon du 'gyur bar mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-7: dri ma can du mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-8: yang dge slong de rna ba'i tshor ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-9: tshor ba rjes su myong zhing reg pa'i tshor ba 'di gang yin snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-10: de rna ba'i tshor ba 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-11: yid dang shin tu 'brel ba de la gnas par zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-13: tshor ba po med cing rna ba'i tshor ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la byed pa po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-15: 'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di rgyu rkyen gyi dbang gis skye zhing 'gag go snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-16: yang dge slong de sna'i tshor ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-17: tshor ba 'di myong zhing rig pa gang zhig yin snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-18: de tshor ba yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225a-19: de la dmigs pa de la gnas pa de rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-0: rkyen las byung zhing rjes su myong ba'i mtshan nyid yin gyi 'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing tshor ba pos gnas su ma byas pa rgyun chags par 'jug pa @225b yin no snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-1: de sna'i tshor ba rtogs nas byed pa po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-2: tshor ba po med cing don gyi bar du gcod par gyur pa ni med do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-3: yang dge slong de lce'i tshor ba la rnam par rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-4: lce'i tshor ba 'di myong zhing rig pa gang yin snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-5: de lce'i tshor ba 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-6: de la gnas pa de dang 'brel ba de la dmigs pa de'i rgyu las byung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-7: de la bsten pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-10: don gyi bar du gcod par gyur pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-11: 'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-12: rkyen gyi dbang gis skye'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-13: yang dge slong de lus kyi reg bya'i tshor ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-14: lus kyi tshor ba myong zhing rig pa 'di gang yin snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-15: de lus kyi tshor ba 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-17: tshor ba po don gyi bar du gcod par 'gyur ba ni med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-18: de 'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-19: rkyen gyi dbang gi 'jug go snyam mo; ;yang dge slong de yid kyi tshor ba la rnam par rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-20: yid kyi tshor ba myong zhing rig pa 'di gang yin snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-22: chos la bsten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye bar mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-23: gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa reg pa dang lhan cig byung ba'i tshor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:225b-25: rdzas dri zhim pa du ma bsdus pa las spos bzang po 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-0: spos de'i rgyu mi 'byung ba gcig kyang @226a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-1: med pa de bzhin du rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-2: rkyen 'dus pa las tshor ba thams cad 'byung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-3: byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing tshor ba pos gnas su ma byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-8: ze 'bru la'ang brten nas padma zhes bya ba'i me tog 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-9: padma de'i rgyu gcig kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-10: de bzhin du dmigs pa la'ang brten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-12: yid la byed pa la'ang brten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-13: snang ba la'ang brten nas mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'byung ste; mig las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-14: mig la brten pa'i tshor ba de rigs gcig pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-16: 'byung ba gcig ma yin zhing ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin la sprul pa lta bu yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-17: de ji lta ji ltar de nyid tshol ba'i dge slong de ni de lta de ltar de'i chos dkar po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-19: bu ram shing snod kyi nang du bcug nas mes bskol ba des de dang po zhu zhing dri mar 'gyur ba ni bu ram dri ma can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-20: lan gnyis su bskol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-21: dkar bar 'gyur zhing bu ram du shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226a-22: lan gsum pa la shin tu dkar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-0: de ji lta ji ltar bu ram shing bskol ba de lta de ltar shin tu dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dge slong dmigs pa'i snod du ye shes me lta bus sems kyi rgyun @226b bu ram shing lta bu yongs su skol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-1: de'i dbu ba lta bu bsam gtan dang po thob par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-2: de'i dkar ba lta bu bsam gtan gnyis pa thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-3: de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar dge slong gi sems kyi rgyun ye shes kyi mes skol bar byed pa de lta de ltar zag pa med pa'i chos shin tu dkar zhing shin tu dri ma med la shin tu skyon med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-4: las phyir phyogs pa dri ma dang bral zhing dkar la dag pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-6: dge slong de tshor ba de dag la shin tu rnam pa phra ba gzhan gyis rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-7: sems can che ge mo zhig gi tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba phra ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-8: rags pa dri ma can gti mug dang ldan pa skyes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-9: tshor ba rags pa che ge mo zhig gis bsal cing spangs te lhag ma dang bcas par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-13: lus kyi tshor ba'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-14: dge slong de de ltar brtson zhing spro la bdud kyi sde 'joms pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-15: sa bla'i gnod sbyin dang; bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-17: bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-18: rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-19: sa bla'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:226b-20: bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-2: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha de dag gis kyang lha'i dbang po brgya byin la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-3: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhen nas yid dga' bas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-5: 'thab bral gyi lha de dag kyang brgya byin la dga' nas rin po che sna tshogs thogs shing lus lha'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-6: spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-10: dri yid du 'ong zhing bde ba dpe med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-11: rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-13: grong khyer rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-14: yid kyis brtags pa zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa'i khang bzang dpag tshad khri yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-15: zag pa med par 'gro ba zhes bya ba de na bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa de la 'thab bral gyi lha dag yid rab tu dga' bas gos phyogs gcig tu bgos te pus mo sa la btsugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-16: mgo btud thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-17: lha; 'di ltar dzambu'i gling na las kyi sa la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-18: grong che ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-19: grong rdal mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227a-20: yul ga ge mo zhig tu rigs che ge mo zhig las rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-1: gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-2: de spyod pa la nan tan bgyid cing bla ma la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-3: zag pa med pa'i chos kyi de nyid tshol zhing tshor ba'i de nyid mthong ba zhes bgyi ba sa gzhan bzhi pa la zhugs nas bdud kyi phyogs 'joms par bgyid cing dam pa'i chos kyi zam pa brtan par bgyid cing chos dkar po rab tu ston par bgyid cing bdud kyi phyogs smod par bgyid la lha'i phyogs 'phel bar bgyid pa de bdag cag gis lha rnams la mngon par gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-4: 'thab bral gyi lha rnams la byams pas lha'i phyogs 'phel bar 'gyur ba de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-6: 'di ltar gang bdud kyi phyogs dma' bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-7: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs mngon par mtho bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-8: nyon mongs pa rnams las rab tu grol bar byed pa'i bdud kyi sde rnam par 'jig par byed pa la bdag rab tu dga'o zhes gtam du byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-10: dge slong des tshor ba'i tshogs drug mdor bsdus pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas tshor ba'i phung po'i sa'i chos sa gzhan lnga pa la ji ltar 'dug ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-11: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-12: yang dge slong de tshor ba'i de nyid mthong zhing tshor ba'i tshogs drug gi las kyi mthar byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:227b-13: 'du shes kyi phung po yang dag par rab tu rnam par 'byed cing mtshan mar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-1: shes dang bcas pa gang yin snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-2: bdag chos dkar po dben pa la spyod cing phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-3: mi phan pa las dben par spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis 'du shes su byed cing de yang dag par sems par byed la de chos dkar po mtshan mar byed pa ni 'di ltar thog ma nyid du chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-4: dmigs pa bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-5: bstan du med cing thogs pa'i 'du shes ji ltar skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin zhig gu snyam nas de shin tu dben pas 'du shes de la rtog par byed cing de 'du shes des gzugs rnam pa bcu gcig la mtshan mar dmigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-17: de la 'du shes kyi mtshan mas ring por byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-19: byis ba blo zhan pa rnams kyis thog ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-20: tha ma med pa'i skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-37: gcig la gcig za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228a-38: gsog par byed cing don med par gyur pa dpag tu med pa 'di kun ni bzod par dka' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-0: yid kyis kun nas @228b bslang ba'i nyes par byas pa'i las kyi bye brag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis byis pa so so'i skye bo dag yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-1: yang du khyab par byas shing rnam par gtses pa'i 'khor ba 'di ni ring ngo snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-2: de la mir gyur pa rnams la 'dod pas nyon mongs shing gcig la gcig 'drid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-6: rgyal po'i pho brang du bsten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-16: dam pa'i chos dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-17: sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-21: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-23: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-28: tshig kyal pa la yid rnam par zhen pa'i 'khor ba 'di ni ring ngo snyam du 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-29: lha rnams kyi 'khor ba'ang ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-34: dri la rab tu chags shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:228b-39: bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-9: rnam pa sna tshogs su rtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-11: gnas khang la rab tu chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-16: me tog man d'a ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-18: lha'i glu dbyangs la sems rab tu chags shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-19: dam pa'i chos la kha phyir phyogs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor ba ni ring ngo snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-20: yi dvags rnams kyi 'khor ba'ang ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-21: nyes par byas pa'i las kyis 'gro ba bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-25: me'i char rab tu 'bab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-26: mid pa khab tsam la lto ri tsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-27: lto sgal ba la zhar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-29: ser sna skyes shing gcig la gcig mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-30: mun nag tu 'jug cing g-yang sar rab tu ltung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-35: gshin rje'i mis ral gri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-38: mdung gis btab cing sdug bsngal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-40: ngar snabs kyi kha zas lo 'bum phrag du mar za ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229a-41: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchi ma rab tu 'byung zhing bzod par dka' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-0: yul ngan @229b byung zhing gdong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-2: lus la srin bu 'bum zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-3: lus nad thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur cing thegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-4: 'khor bar yun ring du zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-5: lcags kyi bya rog mchu 'bar ba dag gis mig phyung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-6: lus shing bsregs pa 'dra zhing pha rol gyis gnon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-8: dgon pa dpag tshad bye ba brgya phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-10: skom gyi mes lus bsregs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-11: mun nag tu zhugs pa'i yi dvags dag ni dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la kha phyir phyogs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-12: log par lta bas bsdus pa rnams kyi 'khor ba ni ring ngo snyam du 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-13: gcig la gcig za zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-14: khong du chud par bya ba ma yin pa shes pa la kha phyir phyogs pa rnams ni chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-15: chu la spyod pa rnams rtag tu skom pas gdungs shing snying yongs su skams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-16: gzung bas 'jigs pa chu srin byis pa gsod dang; chags brkam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-22: chu srin kum bhi ra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-24: chu srin ma ka ra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-25: chu srin nya phyis dang chu srin dung la sogs pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-26: chung du rtag tu gcig la gcig za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:229b-27: de las gzhan pa rgyas bshor zhing bzung bas 'jigs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-0: de bzhin du skam sa la rgyu ba ri @230a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-11: bse la sogs pa sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis 'ching zhing mtshon gyis gsod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-14: 'chi bas gcig la gcig gnod pa brgya phrag stong gis nyen pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-15: de bzhin du nam mkha' la rgyu ba bya rog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-25: bya tsha ya ba lin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-27: bya san ta ba la sogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-29: bya'i rigs dag gsod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-33: gcig la gcig za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-35: tsha bas gnod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-36: gnas gsum la gnas pa skams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-38: bar snang la rgyu ba'i dud 'gror gyur pa rnams la mi bzad cing so so'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'khor ba ni ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-39: de bzhin du yang sos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230a-46: mnar med pa rnams kyi mi bzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-0: bsam pa shin tu ngan pa rnams kyi so so'i 'jigs pa brgya stong du ma yong @230b pa; me dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-3: brkyal ba'i chu bo dmar po'i nang du lus rab tu 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-4: lo ma'i ral gri'i nang du 'jug cing 'dab mas so sor nyams su myong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-5: ba tshva'i chu'i nang du 'jug cing sa rab tu 'bar ba la 'gro ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-6: sreg par byed pa'i padma mi bzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-8: bzod par dka' ba rnam pa du mar mtshungs pa med pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi 'khor ba ni ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-9: dge slong de 'du shes kyi phung po rab tu rnam par dpyod pa la bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa yun ring po'i gzugs 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-10: 'bras bu'i rgyu'i gzhi dmigs pa sems can rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tshad brgya phrag stong gi 'gro bar song ba rnams la lta bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-13: gzhi la dmigs pa'i 'du shes rab tu gsal bas mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-14: 'khor ba la yid 'byung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-16: ji ltar na dge slong de thung ngu rnam par 'byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-17: mngon sum du byed ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-18: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-20: dge slong de bdud kyi sde rnam par 'jig par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-21: ji ltar thung ba rnam par 'byed ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:230b-22: 'khor ba thung ba'i brtul zhugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-2: bla ma la gus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-4: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-5: pha ma la gus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-6: sangs rgyas la chos nyan cing lta ba bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma yin pa spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-16: yid las su rung ba dang ldan zhing mi'i snying dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'khor ba ni thung bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-17: de bzhin du gang dag bag med pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-25: do shal dang; bro gar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-27: shin tu mdzes pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-33: gnas kyi khyad par dag spangs nas gang dag tshul khrims kyi rnam pa'i bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-34: klog pa la gnas shing legs par lta la kha ton du 'don pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-37: yang dag par sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-40: smra ba'i tshig nyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231a-42: zhi ba'i zas la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-0: lha gang yin pa de dag gi 'khor @231b ba ni thung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-1: ji skad bshad pa bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-4: tshal shing bsregs pa bzhin du dman zhing zhum la skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-5: gdong shing bsregs pa lta bu'i lus can gang yin pa de dag sdug bsngal du mi bgrang bar gang dag skad cig tsam zhig kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-7: dge 'dun la dbang po rab tu dang bas dad pa chung du zhig byas pa de dag gi 'khor ba ni thung bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-8: gcig la gcig za zhing rdeg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-12: 'jigs pas 'jigs pa de dag gal te nus na skad cig tsam du rnam par gnod pa mi bgrang bar skad cig tsam zhig kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-14: dge 'dun la sems dang bar byas pa'i dud 'gro de dag gi 'khor ba ni thung bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-19: ngu 'bod chen po dang; tsha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:231b-21: mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes pa gang dag sdug bsngal shin tu gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs de dag sdug bsngal du mi bgrang bar gang dag skad cig tsam du tshul khrims la sems dad par byed pa'i sems can dmyal ba de dag gi 'khor ba ni thung bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-0: @232a *// de de ltar 'khor ba thung bar sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-1: 'khro ba gru bzhi po ji lta bu zhig snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-2: de byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni bdag gi ba med cing bdag tu nga rgyal med la nges par gong du 'gro ba de rnams kyi 'khro ba ni gru bzhi po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-5: dud 'gro mi shes par yongs su 'gyur zhing sems bzang po ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i 'khor ba ni zlum po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-8: lung du ma bstan pa'i las 'dren ma dang ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-10: 'dren ma mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-11: de la mi dge ba'i las kyis ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-12: dge ba'i las kyis ni lha rnams su'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-13: 'dren ma sa ni mi rnams su skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-15: gang dag gnas gsum gyi skye bar skyes pa de rnams kyi 'khor ba ni zur gsum po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232a-18: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi las lta bur skyes pa'i lha dag las shi nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-0: gang dag mi las shi nas mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mi khom pa med pa'i @232b sa de dag gi 'khor ba ni zlum po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-1: las dmar pos yongs su bzung ba dag ni dud 'gro yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-2: de dag kyang gcig la gcig za zhing dmar po la dga' ba'i 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-3: las kha dog dkar pos yongs su bzung ba ni lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-5: gtsang zhing dge ba'i las kyi lam rin po che las byung ba'i rim gyis lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-7: lha 'chi ba na de la lha dag bde 'gro mi'i 'jig rten du bzhud cig ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-8: de bzhin du mi 'chi ba na gnyen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-10: chung ma dag mig mchi mas gang zhing ngom zung gang pa dag bdag cag thong la bde 'gro mi'i 'jig rten dgyes par bzhud cig ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-11: de 'di snyam du sems ta; mi de nyid thob kyang gang dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-14: shes rab la brtson 'grus med pa de ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-16: dud 'gro'i dgon par gtses shing yongs su 'khyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-17: so so'i skye bo ni las kyi lam gyis bslus shing chud gzan pa yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-18: dge slong de tshor ba'i de nyid mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-19: 'du shes kyi phung po la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la dmigs pa'i de nyid mthong ba ni 'di ltar de nyid tshol bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:232b-21: gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-1: las reg pa brjod pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-2: gzugs mthong na bzang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-12: gzugs kyi dbyibs 'du shes kyis yang dag par rnam par 'byed cing mtshan mar byed la gzhi la lta bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-15: skye mched kyi gzhi 'du shes su byed cing rnam par 'byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-17: mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu 'byed cing mngon sum du byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-18: rgyu dang ldan pa la dmigs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-19: rgyu ma yin pa dang ldan pa shes nas rnam par spong bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-21: mi phan pa'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba 'das pa la 'du shes su byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-22: ji ltar 'dis bdag gi byas pa nyes pa byas pa'i 'du shes kyis 'du shes par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-24: gal te 'du shes med na dran pa 'ang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-26: 'du shes su 'brel ba ni de'i dmigs pa yin zhing de'i rkyen yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-28: 'od de'i rkyen de'i gzhi de'i rgyu mar me yin pa de bzhin du dran pa ni 'du shes kyi rgyu 'du shes rab tu byung ba 'du shes kyi bdag po yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233a-29: dge slong des gzhan lnga pa 'du shes reg pa zhes bya ba la 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-0: de yang dag pa'i tshor ba bde ba la 'du shes su byed @233b kyang de la dga' ba med la sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi las byas pa sdug bsngal de'ang 'jigs pa med par de mtshungs par rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-2: dge slong 'du shes can de 'du shes kyi rnam pa gzhan gyis rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-3: de 'du shes las rnam par grol zhing rtog par byed pa gzhan ma yin pa bdag gi 'du shes kyi rkyen ni gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-5: gzhi ni gang yin snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-6: de 'du shes 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-7: rkyen tshogs pa des 'di skye zhing de 'gog pa las 'gag par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-11: nor bu chu shel las chu dang ba 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-12: rkyen la brten nas 'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-13: 'du shes 'di ni rgyu med pa las 'byung ba ma yin zhing; byed pa po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-15: 'dod rgyal bas ma byung bar 'di skye'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-16: dge slong de 'du shes kyi phung po'i de nyid tshol ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-17: de 'du shes kyi de nyid mthong zhing de skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-18: 'jig pa'i de nyid shes pa rim pa shin tu phra mos tshol ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-19: chu bo'i rgyun 'bab pa ltar 'du shes la zhugs pa rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-20: rkyen gyi dbang gis dge ba 'byung ba rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-21: rkyen gyi dbang gis mi dge bar 'gyur ba rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:233b-22: de dang sems sbre'u lta bu nyams pas lung du ma bstan pa 'gyur ba lung du ma bstan pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-0: de bde ba'i 'du shes pa la bde bar mi lta @234a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-1: ste; zag pa med pa'i bde ba la bde bar 'du shes shing bde ba la'ang bde ba ma yin par 'du shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-2: bde ba de dag ni chung ngur 'du shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-3: ji ltar na; bde ba'i phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-5: skye mched kyi phung po skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-6: 'gog par lta zhing tshor ba dag la'ang mngon par chags pa med ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-7: tshor ba nub pa des 'du shes mngon par dga' ba med cing 'du shes nub pa des 'du byed rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-8: gnas pa med cing 'jig pa med la gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la mngon par 'dod pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-9: gnas pa med cing 'jig pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-10: gzhan la 'gyur ba med pa'i ngo bo 'di ni dge slong phung po'i de nyid shes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-11: bdud kyi yul la mi gnas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-12: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams kyis gnod pa med pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-16: bdag tu lta ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-20: dri sdug pa dra ba'i zhags pa lta bu dag gis 'ching bar mi 'gyur zhing dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-21: de dran pa nye bar gnas pa rnam par shes shing zag pa zad par bya ba nus la mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234a-23: dge slong brtson 'grus zhan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-0: @234b lo byed cing lta ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-1: gang zhig rtag tu spro dga' med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-2: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-3: mal cha stan la longs mi spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-4: dge slong yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-5: gang zhig le lo mngon dga' ba; ;de ni dge ba'i 'os min no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-6: nyon mongs rnams kyi gzhi gcig ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-7: le lo yin te gang la yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-8: gang la le lo gcig yod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-9: de la chos ni med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-10: bgo ba tsam gyis chog 'dzin pa; ;de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-11: gang gi blo gros brjod med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-12: bsam gtan med la zag zad med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-13: cha byad tsam gyis chog 'dzin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-14: de lta bu ni dge slong min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-15: gtsug lag khang dang kun dgar brtson //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-16: chos kyi spyod yul dga' med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-17: bud med chang la chags pa'i blo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-18: de lta bu ni dge slong min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-19: gang zhig bdud kyi 'ching gcod dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-20: sdig pa'i las dag gcod byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-21: dge 'dun spyod yul mi spyod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-22: de ni dge slong sangs rgyas gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-23: sbrul gdug dang ni ta mra dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-24: smin pa za ba nyis na rung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-25: tshul khrims 'chal pa dge 'dun gyi; ;bza' btung spyod pa mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-26: gang zhig nyon mongs bsdus pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-27: de ni bsod snyoms 'os min zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-28: de ni bsod snyoms rigs min te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-29: de ni dmyal ba'i 'os yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-30: sbrul gdug khung na 'dug lta bu'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-31: nyon mongs gang gis bcom zhing spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-32: dge slong de ni bsod snyoms spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-33: de ni bud med lta ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:234b-34: gal te bdag nyid gtar bzhag cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-2: dge 'dun rin chen sun byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-3: de ni dge slong ji ltar shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-4: gang zhig rnyed dang bkur sti dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-5: gang zhig yul sdug sems byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-6: bud med lta zhing de 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-7: dge min khyim min g-yon can yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-8: ji ltar me'i yis tshal bsregs bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-9: gang gis nyon mongs tsha bsregs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-10: bram ze de yin de dge zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-11: sdig pa'i zas la mi chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-12: rtag par grong du 'gro spro zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-13: g-yon can rtag tu khrus byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-14: rmongs pa bdag dang gzhan slu ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-15: dam chos lam la rmongs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-16: yid ni zhi zhing dgon pa ru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-17: rtag tu bsam gtan pha rol 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-18: bram ze de yin de dge zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-19: dge ba'i lam gyi spyod yul yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-20: dgon pa dag tu dga' byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-21: der ni 'dod chags bral ba dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-22: 'dod pa tshol ba'i yid dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-23: der ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-24: gang zhig 'brel ba'i gtam dga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-25: yul gyi sred pas mngon dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-26: gang na 'chi ba med pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-28: rgyal po bsten cing zas dang skom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-29: shin tu zhim 'dod rtag khro ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-30: ming gi dge slong g-yo thabs kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-31: gang dag rgyal po'i sgor 'dug cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-32: khyim pa dag dang nye rtsom bcas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-33: de nas de dag sun 'byin cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-34: sbyin bdag bden sems slu bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-35: ji ltar glang chen tshal gnas bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-36: gang dag bu smad yongs spangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235a-37: zhi ba'i tshal na gnas pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-0: de dag sred @235b spangs bsam pa mnyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-1: dge slong de nyes pa de dag spangs nas de nyid mthong ba de las gzhan pa gzugs la sogs pa phung po'i de nyid mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-2: thar pa la 'bad cing spyod de bla ma la yongs su 'dri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-4: lam ma yin pa'i de nyid shes shing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i thar pa'i grong khyer de tshol ba ni lam brtson pa'i ngang tshul can mnyam par lta zhing dri ma med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-5: zhi ba'i sems kyis lam de kun tu bsten cing sgom ste mang du byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-6: de zag pa med pa'i las kyi lam gyi dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa des bdud kyi phyogs ni dams par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'phel bar byed do zhes sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag gis shes nas bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin dge la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-7: de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-8: de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi pa nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-10: dga' ldan gyi lha dag gis dga' ldan gyi gnas na byams pa bzhugs pa'i bar la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig cig mchog tu dga' ches nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la mngon par bsnyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-12: dzambu'i gling du rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:235b-14: gos dur smrig bgos nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-0: de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yid mchog @236a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-1: tu dga' ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-3: dge slong de sa gzhan lnga pa la ji ltar 'jug cig gu snyam nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-5: skye mched gzugs can bcu la rtog par byed do; ;bcu gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-12: dri'i skye mched dang; lce'i skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-16: skye mched gzugs can bcu po de dag la rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-17: bdag gi mig gi skye mched la'ang brten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-18: gzugs kyi skye mched la'ang brten nas 'du shes su ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-21: mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-23: reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-26: de la tshor ba gang yin pa de ni myong ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-27: sems pa gang yin pa de ni sems par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236a-28: de la 'du shes gang yin pa de ni shes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-3: gzugs 'di ni bstan du yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-4: gzugs 'di thogs pa dang bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-5: gzugs 'di ni bstan du med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-6: gzugs 'di ni thogs pa med pa zhes rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i bar rnam pa bcu gcig po 'di ni 'du shes kyi gzugs su rnam par dbye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-7: de ltar gsum 'dus pa las reg pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-8: de reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-11: de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-13: sems pa myong ba'i don ni tshor ba'i don no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-14: 'du shes kyi don ni tshor ba'i tshe yang dag par shes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-15: chos 'di dag la yid 'jug pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra zhing ngo bo nyid mi 'dra ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-17: sa chen po bcu'i chos lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-18: sems pa'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'ang de bzhin de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-19: rnam pa rtog pas yid la byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-21: dran pa dang; tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-26: ting nge 'dzin de dag ni dmigs pa gcig la mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:236b-27: de bzhin du tshor ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi 'dra zhing de bzhin du 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid kyang mi 'dra ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-0: nyi ma'i gzhi gcig yin kyang 'od kyi ngo bo tha dad pa de bzhin du tshor ba'i @237a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-1: ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-2: sems pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-3: de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-5: sems pa'i de kho na nyid shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-8: snying po med par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-9: yang dag par mthong ba'i dge slong de ni lam gyi de kho na nyid shes nas log par lta ba spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-10: de yang dag pa'i lta ba sngon du btang bas de mig dang lhan cig skyes pa'i 'du shes kyi gti mug rnyog pa can gyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-11: sha'i gong bu'i de kho na nyid mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-15: mchi ma'i gnas yin par rig nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-16: 'dod chags spong zhing mi rtag par rig nas rtag par mi lta ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-17: rus pa'i bu ga'i nang na sha'i gong bu yod par rig nas 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-18: rgyus pas sbrel bar rig cing mig gi skye mched 'di ni gcig la gcig 'brel bar rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-19: 'di la snying po med cing bdag med par rig la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-20: mdor na mig 'di ni sdug bsngal du gyur pa yin no zhes rnam par shes shing mthong nas mig gi skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro; ;de mig gi skye mched yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs shing gzugs la rnam par dpyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237a-21: gal te yang dag pa ma yin pa'i gzugs 'di sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-0: mi sdug pa @237b dang; lung du ma bstan pa yongs su rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-1: ci 'di la snying po yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-4: ci bde ba yod dam snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-5: de gzugs la lta zhing shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-6: rtog pas gzugs su mi dmigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-9: mi sdug pa 'di ni kun tu rtog pa tsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-11: mi sdug pa'i ngo bo ni med la sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-12: khong khro ba kho nar kun tu rtog pas bzung ba'i 'jig rten 'di ni sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-13: sdang bar sems so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-14: de mig gi skye mched mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-15: rna ba'i skye mched la lta bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-16: de sgra la so sor rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-17: sgra skyes pa dbang po'i yul la 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-20: de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa la'ang brten nas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-22: reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-25: de la reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa gang gis myong bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-26: de la reg pa dang lhan cig byung ba'i 'du shes gang gis kun tu shes par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-27: reg pa dang lhan cig byung ba'i sems pa gang gis sems par byed snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:237b-30: 'di ni ring ngo snyam pa'i mtshan nyid do; ;sgra 'byung ba'i rkyen 'di las skyes pa'i sgra mi gsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-0: de sgra byung ba de la so sor rig par byed cing yang dag par @238a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-1: sems par byed la 'du shes kyis rnam par 'byed par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-2: yid kyis rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par byed cing tshor bas shes par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-3: som nyis rnam par dpyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-4: de rna ba'i skye mched la mngon par zhen pa na rtog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-5: rtog pa na rnam par dpyod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-6: rnam bar dpyod pa na so so yang dag par rig par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-7: 'di la sgra ngo bo nyid kyis snyan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-8: mi snyan pa ni med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-10: mi snyan pa 'di ni kun tu rtog pa tsam kho na ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-11: sgra 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyis rtag pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:238a-14: bdag dang bcas pa ni med la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:239a-13: de la myong ba'i mtshan nyid ni tshor ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:239b-14: ro'i skye mched dag la bdag gi med de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240a-0: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye @240a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240a-4: ji ltar na dge slong de skye mched gzugs can bcu brtags nas chos kyi skye mched kyi de kho na nyid rtog cing chos kyi skye mched la lta bar byed ce na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240a-8: so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240a-11: so sor brtags pas 'gog pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la so sor rtog pa'i shes rab yin te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240a-14: so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba gang mi shes shing shes pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240a-16: shes pa ma yin zhing shin tu khong du chud pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240a-18: gzhan gyi rnam par shes pa brgya phrag stong skyes pa dag kyang 'jig par byed cing /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240b-3: yang 'byung bar mi byed pa gsum pa 'di ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240b-5: chos gsum po 'di dag ni skye ba med la rtag pa de dag dus kyis ma bskyed cing skye bar mi 'gyur la mi skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240b-7: ji ltar na dge slong de chos kyi skye mched gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240b-8: gzugs ma yin pa rnam pa gnyis rnam par 'byed ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240b-9: de la gzugs can bcu ni skye mched gzugs can yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240b-10: de la ji ltar na bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pas bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ji ltar na dmigs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240b-11: de bzhin du ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bstan du med cing thogs pa med pas sgra 'dzin par 'gyur /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240b-13: de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa bstan du med cing thogs pa med pas ro rnam par shes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:240b-14: de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyi rol gyi skye mched lnga dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:241a-2: dge slong de ji tsam du dmigs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba de tsam du rnam par mthong zhing de rnam par shes pa skye ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:241b-0: 'o ma sla ba las zho bska ba 'byung ba ni ji ltar 'o ma sla ba las zho bska ba 'byung ba de bzhin du dngos po mi 'dra ba mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rgyu rkyen gyi bye brag gis mig gi rnam par @241b shes pa la sogs pa skye'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:241b-9: de nyid kho na dge slong yi //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:241b-22: gang gi yid la dga' ba dang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:241b-24: skyon rnams thams cad rnam spangs pa //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:241b-32: bza' btung dag la dga' med pa //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:241b-34: gang dag tshal dgon gtsug lag khang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:241b-35: dur khrod dang ni rtsva bting la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-0: @242a *// yid ni dga' bar byed pa dag /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-4: rgyu dang rkyen gyi de nyid shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-5: sdig dang bral ba dge slong yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-6: sdig pa'i dgon pa bcom byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-7: skyon bcom dbang po thul ba dang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-27: brtan pa blo gros nges grol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-29: gang rig le lo thag bsrings pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-30: bsam gtan kha ton las rung zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-31: sems can rnams la phan byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-32: dgon gnas dge slong zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242a-33: gang gi blo gros dris lan ldon //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-2: gang dag bzlog na rtsva dang 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-3: gang gi blo gros lus dub pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-4: rnam pa kun tu skyo med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-5: don du bya ba kun shes pa //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-21: bslab pa'i gzhi la nyams med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-22: mya ngan 'das pa yong mi ring //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-23: 'khor ba'i skye dang rga ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-24: 'jigs las kha ni phyir phyogs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-25: bsam gtan ldan la bag yod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-26: mya ngan 'das pa yong mi ring //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-27: me rtag stong pa bdag med dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-28: bya ba'i rnam pa shes pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-29: bsam gtan 'phel ba'i rnam shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-30: mya ngan 'das pa yong mi rung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:242b-31: de nas gzhan yang dge slong de sa gzhan lnga pa las sa gzhan drug pa la ji ltar 'jug ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-0: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes @243a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-3: dge slong de mu bzhi pa la lhag par mos pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-4: ji ltar na chos 'di dag gi rgyu 'dra ba dag las 'dra ba 'byung ba dang; mi 'dra ba dag las mi 'dra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-5: 'dra ba ma yin pa dag las 'dra ba ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-6: phyed 'dra ba dag las phyed 'dra ba 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-7: ji ltar na rgyu 'dra ba dag las 'dra ba 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-10: 'bru'i rgyur gyur pa dag las 'bru nyid skye ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-11: nang gi dge ba'i las 'dra ba dag las 'dra ba'i 'bras bu nyid lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-12: mi rnams la dmigs pa ni mu dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-13: rgyu mi 'dra ba dag las mi 'dra ba 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-15: 'o ma las zho skyur ba 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gi'ang 'jig rten 'dir kun nas nyon mongs pa sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-19: dri 'dod pa sdug pa dag byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-20: zho skyur ba 'byung ba de bzhin du mi 'dod cing mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-22: dud 'gro rnams la dmigs pa ni mu gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-23: rgyu mi 'dra ba dag las mi 'dra ba 'byung pa ni; dper na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-25: bab lar sbyar na kha dog mi 'dra ba 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du nang gi chos la'ang las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243a-26: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-4: log par lta ba mchod sbyin pa dag mtho ris 'dod pa'i phyir phyugs dag gsod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-5: de dag sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ni mu gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-6: rgyu phyed 'dra ba dag las phyed 'dra ba 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-7: thags phra mo dkar po nyid las snam bu dkar po stug po nyid du byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-9: stug po gnyis mi 'dra ba nyid du yod pa de bzhin du rgyu phyed 'dra ba dag las phyed 'dra ba 'byung ba ni mi dge ba'i las bsags pa phra mor gyur pa dag gis sems can dmyal ba chen po dag byed pa ni mu bzhi pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-12: 'gro ba'i byed pa'i rjes su bsams pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-14: 'bras bu 'khor lo bzhin du srid par 'gro ba'i mu bzhi pa sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-15: ris dang ldan pa'i mi la gnod par byed pa'i las thob pa med pa yin pa de ni mu dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-16: mi la gnod pa byed pa'i las thob pa gang yin pa ni mu gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-17: gnod par byed pa'i las thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-18: ma thob pa gang yin pa ni mu gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-19: gnod par byed pa'i las thob pa'ang ma yin ma thob pa'ang ma yin pa gang yin pa ni mu bzhi pa yin no; ;ris dang ldan par gnod par byed pa'i las thob pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:243b-21: 'jig rten par gyur pa dag rgyu sngar ma thob par mi dag la gnod par byed pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-0: @244a *// 'jig rten las 'das pa mig gi rnam par shes pa las kyi rgya mtsho thob pa med pa'i mi la 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-1: mya ngan la sogs pas gnod par byed pa ni mu dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-2: mi la gnad par byed pa'i las thob pa gang yin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-5: ral gri dang phrad na sreg go zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-6: gcod do zhes zer ba lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-7: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni mi dge ba'i las thob na sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-9: yi dvags rnams su gnod pa byed pa ni mu gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-10: gnod par byed pa'i las thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-11: ma thob pa gang yin pa ni; dper na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-12: 'jig rten pa dag rig sngags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-13: dug gi mthu thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-14: ma thob pa sbyin par byed pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni 'chi ba'i yul gyi dus su sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi mtshan ma'i gzugs brnyan thob pa ni mu gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-16: gnod par byed pa'i las thob pa'ang ma yin ma thob pa'ang ma yin pa gang yin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-18: 'jig rten pa dag sman gyi sa bon btab pa skye bar 'gyur ba thob pa'ang ma yin ma thob pa'ang ma yin pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-21: dge slong dgra bcom pa la nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ri rab tsam yod kyang dgra bcom pa mya ngan las 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244a-22: dgra bcom pa la yod pa'i las de dag thob pa med cing gnod par yang mi 'gyur la grol ba ni mu bzhi pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-0: @244b tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur la skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i las ni mu dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-2: tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni mu gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-3: skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-4: tshe 'di la'ang myong bar 'gyur ba ni mu gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-5: tshe 'di la'ang myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-6: skyes nas kyang myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni mu bzhi pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-7: tshe 'di la myong bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-8: skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i las gar yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-10: 'jig rten pa dag rgyal po la gnod pa byas na chad pas gcod pa ni tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-11: skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni sbyin pas des bsngags par 'gyur ba tshe 'di la myong ba yod pa de dang 'jig rten pha rol tu lhan cig mi 'gro ba ni mu dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-14: tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-16: 'jig rten pa dag me dong du zhugs pas mtho ris thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-17: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni tshe 'di la dge ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-18: mi dge ba byas pas gzhan du rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-19: 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba thob pa ni mu gnyis ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-20: tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur zhing skyes nas kyang myong bar 'gyur ba ni mu gsum pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:244b-22: 'jig rten pa dag tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-0: skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba lta @245a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-1: bu'o; ;'jig rten las 'das pa ni mu gsum pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-2: tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin zhing skyes nas kyang myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-4: 'jig rten pa dag mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-5: mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-7: tshul khrims dag ni tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-8: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi las yin te /
