K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-9: lung du ma bstan pa'i las des tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang mi dmigs shing skyes nas kyang myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni mu bzhi pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-10: de ltar dge slong de phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-14: rnam par smin pa'i dra ba mang po yan lag du ma mthong nas yang dag pa'i chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-15: de nas gzhan yang dge slong de las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-16: rnal 'byor spyod pa chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-18: las kyi 'bras bu dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-19: mi dge ba shes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-20: 'di ltar sems can 'di dag lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245a-21: ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-0: yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa ni 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs shing log par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa yin @245b te; de rgyu de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-1: rkyen de dag gis ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-3: yi dvags rnams kyi yul du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-5: sems can 'dod dag lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-6: ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-7: yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa ni 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-9: rkyen de dag gis lus dang bral nas bde 'gro lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-12: rnam par smin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba'i dge slong de ni gzhan dag las thos pa la rnam par rtog cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-13: bdud kyi dbang du song ba'i sems can dag dang spyod pa mtshungs par mi spyod la mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar gtugs pa'i spyod pa la yid 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-15: 'khor ba'i mthar gtugs pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-16: 'khor ba 'di las ji ltar bdag nyid kyis bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-18: sbyin pa po dag sgrol ba ltar gzhan dag la'ang phan gdags pa byed par gyur pas spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-21: rnam par smin pa shes pa'i dge slong de sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:245b-27: rnam par smin pa la rtog cing dpyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-0: nor bu shin tu dang zhing @246a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-2: nor bu bee d'urya'i bu ga'i nang du skud pa bcug pa ser po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-4: dkar po ji ltar snang ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-5: las kyi nor bu'i nang du rnam par smin pa'i skud pa yod pa de dge slong thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-6: lha'i mig rnam par dag pa des mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-7: yang dge slong de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas nor bu lta bu'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-9: rnam par smin pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-11: nor bu dkar zhing shin tu dkar ba gang zhig kun nas gsal zhing rma med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-13: las su byar rung zhing kun tu sgor gyur la skye bo thams cad kyis bsngags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-14: nor dang ldan zhing rgyal po la 'os pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-15: yon tan rnam pa de dag dang ldan pa'i nor bu de rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-16: rgyal po'i bus de'i yon tan shes shing de'i rin shes par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-17: rgyan du bya ba nas gdags pa'i bar du byas pa de bzhin du dge slong de phyogs dkar po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi nor bu 'di kun nas dkar zhing shin tu gsal la sdig pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-18: kha na ma tho ba med cing dang la dbug bzod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246a-22: lan ldon pa la chos kyi thur mas 'bigs par bzod cing las su rung ba sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-0: shes pa dag ji lta ji ltar yongs su bsngo @246b bar byed pa de lta de ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi nor bu 'di las su rung ba nyid du de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-1: de bdud kyi rgyal srid dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-2: de tshangs pa'i rgyal srid dam; de zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i rgyal srid 'grub par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-3: de de ltar dam pa'i chos kyi nor bu 'di las su rung zhing kun tu sgor gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-4: kun tu sgo ni lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-5: mi'i sgor gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-6: de ltar dam pa'i chos kyi kun tu sgor gyur pa ni 'khor ba'i grong khyer las 'byung zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo'i rjes su 'jug pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-7: skye bo thams cad kyis bsngags pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa slob pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-8: rgyal po la 'os pa zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos kyi lam bsgrub pa shes pa'i sems kyi dbang phyug tu rung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-9: der zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni nor bu bee d'urya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-10: dam pa'i chos kyi nor bu yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-12: yang dge slong de las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-14: rnam par smin pa nor bu bzhin du mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-16: nor bu gzhan zhig rma yod cing thams cad du bzang ba ma yin la; kun gyi sgo ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-17: dkar ba ma yin zhing dbug tu mi bzod la las su byar mi rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:246b-18: skye bo kun gyis bsngags pa ma yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-0: rgyal po'i bu la rung ba ma yin pa de bzhin @247a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-1: du gzhan mu stegs can chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi nor bu rma yod pa de'i rma gcig po ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-3: brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-4: the tshom yod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-5: kun gyi sgo ma yin pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-8: nor dang mi ldan pa ni zag pa med pa'i bkra shis dang mi ldan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-9: dbug par mi bzod pa ni legs par dri ba dang ldan glan pa'i chos kyi gtam 'bugs pa'i mthur mar mi rung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-11: rgyal po'i bu la 'os pa ma yin pa ni sems can thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos kyi lam du zhugs pa skyes bu gang zag brgyad rnams su mi rung ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-12: rnam pa de lta bu'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan chos ma yin pa mgul du thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-13: de dag nor bu de'i gzugs brnyan gyi nor bu thogs nas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-15: dud 'gro rnams kyi 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs te yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-16: de lta bas na dge slong nor bu de lta bu'i nor bur 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-18: byis pa so so'i skye bo ni bee d'urya dang 'dra ba'i nor bu mching bu mthong nas bee d'urya yin no snyam du sems pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247a-20: chos ma yin pa'i brtag pa'i de kho na shes pas gzhan bdun pa la 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-0: de la zhugs pa'i brtul @247b zhugs bla ma'i gnod sbyin dag gi mthong nas bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin dag la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-1: de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-2: de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-3: de dag gis kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-4: de dag gis kyang brgya byin la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-5: brgya byin gyis ni 'thab bral ba rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-6: 'thab bral ba dag gis ni dga' ldan pa rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-7: dga' ldan pa dag gis kyang byams pa la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-8: byams pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-9: 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la dzambu gling du rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig ces bya ba snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-13: rnam par smin pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyi gzugs bcu gcig rjes su ji ltar mthong zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-14: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa gang gi tshe chos thams cad kyi byed pa dang ldan pa gang sdom pa nyid blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-15: de phan chad gnyis log gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-17: rab tu myos kyang dge ba'i chos kyi rgyun nyid rab tu 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-19: chu po'i rgyun par chad med pa rtag tu 'bab pa de bzhin du skyes bu de gnyid log gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:247b-21: rab tu myos pa'i 'jug pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-0: de ltar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i @248a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-1: gzugs bstan du med pa thogs pa med par 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-2: gzugs de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-3: las kyi ngo bo yod pa nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-4: de lta bas na gzugs de'ang gzugs rnam pa bcu gcig po de dag yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-5: dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-6: dge slong des sems can 'di dag gi gzugs tha dad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-7: gnas skabs tha dad pa; ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-9: gnas kyi rnam pa tha dad pa ji ltar mthong zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-10: 'di ltar de sems can de dag gi sems tha dad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-12: mos pa tha dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-13: las kyi rnam pa tha dad pa mthong ba de'i phyir gzugs tha dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-14: gnas skabs tha dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-17: gnas kyi rnam pa tha dad pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-20: ri mo mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig sa yid du 'ong zhing 'jam la mkhrang ba zhig mthong nas 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-21: tshon sna tshogs dag gis ri mo'i rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs legs shing legs pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs sems kyi dbang gis 'dri ba de bzhin du sems ri mo mkhan nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-22: ri mo mkhan gyi slob ma lta bu 'di lhag par mos pas khams gsum gyi sa shin tu 'jam zhing mkhrang ba dag la las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dag gi 'khor ba'i sar gnas skabs tha dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248a-25: rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-0: sems @248b can gyi gnas kyi rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-1: sems ri mo mkhan lta bu des mngon par 'grub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-2: yang ji ltar tshon dkar pos ni gzugs dkar por 'dri bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-3: dmar pos ni dmar por 'dri bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-4: ser bos ni ser por 'dri bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-5: tshon phug ron kha lta bus ni phug ron kha lta bu 'dri bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-6: nag pos ni nag por 'dri bar byed pa de bzhin du sems ri mo mkhan lta bu 'di sems kyi dmigs pa dkar po nye bar bzung nas zag pa dang bcas pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dag gis nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos dkar po lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-7: mi rnams kyi gzugs dkar po mngon par 'grub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-8: ri mo mkhan gyis tshon dmar po blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-10: mi rnams kyi gzugs dmar po mngon par 'grub par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-11: dmar po zhes bya ba ni sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-15: dri sdug pa dag gis ri mo'i gzhi la tshul bzhin du byas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-16: yang sems ri mo mkhan lta bu des tshon ser po blangs nas dud 'gro mngon par 'grub par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-17: de dag kyang ser po'i dbang gis gcig la gcig khrag 'thung bar byed cing sha za bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:248b-18: gcig la gcig tshon ser po lta bur gyur pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis gsod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-0: yang sems ri mo mkhan lta bu des tshon phug ron kha lta bu la dmigs pa mthong nas tshon phug ron kha lta bu'i las dri ma can yi @249a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-2: de dag kyang lus tshal shing bsregs pa lta bu yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-3: sems ri mo mkhan lta bu ser sna la dmigs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-4: gti mug rab rib kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis bkres shing skom /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-5: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su nyams pas zil gyis non pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-6: yang sems ri mo mkhan lta bu des tshon rtsi nag po lta bu'i las kyi ngo bo blangs nas sems can dmyal ba'i gzugs nag po 'dir ba lta bur de dag kyang las nag pos lcags nag po'i ra ba 'bar bas bskor ba der skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-7: lus nag po la nad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-9: bkres shing skom pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzhir gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-10: rang gis nyes par byas pa gzhan yang mtshungs pa med pa'i gnod pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-11: yang dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa de tshon rtsi lnga'i ri mo'i gzhi lta bu'i 'khor ba khams gsum du 'gro ba lngar kun tu gnas shing sa gsum po 'dod pa'i khams kyi sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-13: gzugs med pa'i khams la kun tu gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249a-14: de la sems ri mo mkhan lta bu de 'dod pa bsten cing 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pas gzugs rnam pa nyi shu rnam pa sna tshogs 'dri'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-0: 'dod pa'i khams dang bral ba dag ni gzugs kyi khams la dmigs shing gnas pa de la brten @249b pa'i sa'i gnas skabs bcu drug po dag ni bsam gtan bzhi'i bar gyis gzugs kyi khams mngon par 'dri'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-1: gzugs kyi khams la dmigs pa dang bral ba dag ni snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i sred pa la mnyam par dmigs pa'i sems ri mo mkhan lta bus gzugs med pa'i khams mngon par 'dri ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-2: khams gsum gyi gzhi 'di ni rgya che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-3: yang dge slong des sems can gzhan gyi sems ri mo mkhan lta bu rnam pa gzhan gyis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-4: de la sems ni ri mo mkhan lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-5: lus ni ri mo'i tshon rtsi'i snod lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-6: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dag ni las brtan par byas pa lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-7: dmigs pa ni khri lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-8: dbang po ni pir lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-9: phyi rol gyi yul sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-13: dri sna tshogs dag ni tshon rtsi sna tshogs lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-14: 'khor ba ni rtsig pa lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-15: shes pa ni snang ba lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-16: brtson 'grus rtsom pa ni lag pa lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-17: las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas byas pa'i gzugs mang po dag ni ri mo'i gzugs cha byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-20: 'byor par gyur pa mang po dag lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-21: yang dge slong bsam gtan la zhugs pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:249b-22: sems ri mo mkhan lta bu de nyid rnam pa gzhan gyis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-0: gang ri mo mkhan de mgun tshon rtsi'i rnam pa legs par sbyang ba byas pa gsal bar 'gyur @250a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-1: zhing pir gyis yang dag yang du legs par 'dri na de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-2: gzugs legs par 'dir ba de bzhin du gang sems ri mo mkhan lta bu 'di mgu na bsam gtan gyi bya ba la tshon rtsi lta bu'i bsam gtan gyi rnam pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa tshon rtsi lta bur gsal bar 'gyur zhing pir gyis yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-3: yang du legs par 'dri ba lta bu'i dmigs pa lung phog pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-5: steng du mnyam par 'jog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-6: ldang ba la skyo ba med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-7: sems ri mo mkhan lta bu de bsam gtan gyi sar gzugs legs par 'dri'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-8: gal te mi dga' na sems ri mo mkhan lta bu de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-11: dud 'gro'i sa ngan pa der 'gro ba'i ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-13: lcags kyi gtun shing pir lta bus mi dge ba'i tshon rtsi blangs nas snod lta bur gyur pa'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-15: yi dvags kyi gzugs de dud 'gro'i 'gro ba'i gzugs ma legs pa 'dri ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-16: rgya cher snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-17: yang dge slong de sems spre'u lta bur mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-18: ji ltar spre'u ni 'phyar ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250a-24: sman ljongs tha dad pa thogs pa med par 'gro ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-0: sems spre'u ltar 'phyar ba 'di'ang tshal tha @250b dad pa lta bu'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-2: dud 'gro dag gi 'gro ba lngar 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-3: sems can ni shing lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-4: sred pa'i lcug ma ni lcug ma'i rnam pa du ma lta bu yin rtog pa ni me tog gi yal ga lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-12: mi sdug pa'i khams gsum ni 'bras bu lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-13: lus ni phug lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-14: sems spre'u lta bu sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-18: mi rnams kyi gnas rnams su thogs pa med par 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-19: sems spre'u lta bu de 'khor ba'i sar 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-20: yang dge slong bsam gtan la zhugs pa de sems gar mkhan lta bur mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-21: ji ltar gar mkhan dag cha byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-25: sil snyan sna tshogs dag thogs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-26: gar mkhan gar byed pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-27: sems gar mkhan lta bu 'di'ang sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-28: 'gro ba'i ris kyis sna tshogs su las kyis sprul pa'i cha byad sna tshogs thogs shing rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-29: rkyen rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa ni cha byad sna tshogs thogs pa lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-30: byed pa dag ni sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:250b-31: 'khor ba gar mkhan lta bu ni rang gi yul gar mkhan lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-0: gar nyid kyis sems gar mkhan lta bu 'khor ba thog ma med cing yun ring ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mar gar byed @251a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-1: do; ;yang dge slong de sems nya lta bu chu bo'i nya lta bur mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-2: ji ltar nya ni ri'i chu bo 'gyur zhing dba' rlabs 'khrugs pa gting zab la rgyun drag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-3: bzod par dka' zhing 'bab pa'i rgyun gyis shing ljon pa mang po rtsa nas 'byin par nus la 'gyur ba'i shugs drag po bzlog par dka' ba'i las mi bzad par 'byung zhing 'jug pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-4: sems nya lta bu 'di'ang srid pa gsum gyi dpa' rlabs 'khrugs pa ni 'gyur zhing dba' rlabs 'khrugs pa lta bu yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-5: mnar med pas mchog tu zab pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi chu bo rab med ltar gting zab pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-6: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-7: mi dge ba'i las kyi rgyun bzod par dka' ba'i 'gro ba dag tu pha rol tu 'gro ba ni rgyun drag po bzod par dka' ba lta bu yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-8: 'gro ba lnga'i chu bor rgyu ba'i rgyun drag pos bskal pa du ma tsam du 'dren par 'gyur ba mi bzad pa ni 'bab pa'i rgyud 'gyur ba'i shugs drag pa lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-9: mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'gyur ba'i shugs bzlog par dka' ba ni bzlog par dka' ba lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-10: srid pa chu bo lta bur sems nya lta bu 'byung zhing 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251a-12: mi dag tu ni 'byung la sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-0: dud 'gro rnams su ni sred pa chu bo ltar sems nya lta bu 'dug @251b go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-2: ji ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor la gnas pa de las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-4: rnam par smin pa shes shing sems can thams cad sems la rag las pa mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-5: sems kyi rnam pa sems kyi dbang du gyur cing sems kyis bslus pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-6: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-7: lha'i mig gis sems can thams cad sems kyi las la rag las shing sems kyi las kyi rnam pa la sems rag las pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-10: tha ma med pa nas 'gro ba du ma rab tu rgyu ba'i sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'gyur snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-11: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-12: lha'i mig gis sems can gyi sems kun nas nyon mongs pas 'ching zhing rnam par byang bas 'grol bar mthong ngo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-13: de la sems kyi rnam pa mang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-15: ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-16: 'gro ba'i ris kyi bye brag gis 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam pa lnga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-17: rten bzang po'i bye brag gis dal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-18: kun tu sbyor ba'i 'du byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-19: yang dag par ldan pa'i sems bag la nyal ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-20: nam mkha'i la sogs pa gsum dang rtag tu mi ldan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:251b-22: de'ang dbang po'i bye brag gis ni dpag tu med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-0: sred pa'i gnas sna tshogs kyi bye brag @252a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-1: gis mdor na kun nas nyon mongs pa 'di'i phyogs 'di ni sems las byung ba lngar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-2: ji ltar na rnam par bya ba'i sogs su 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-3: nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum dag gi gnyen po gsum ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-5: ma 'ongs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rab yang dag pa'i lam ston pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-7: 'dod chags la ni mi sdug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-8: zhe sdang la ni byams pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-9: gti mug la ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-10: de lus la 'dod chags skye ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-11: de lus de la dmigs nas gnas shing rnam par 'byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-16: nying lag rags pa'i bar la rnam par 'byed pa ni bdag gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-17: bdag gi ci yin zhes de rang gi yan lag gi phyogs la rkang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-18: sen mo lus tha dad par lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-19: gang la bdag tu nga rgyal 'jug pa 'di ni sen mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-21: rkang pa'i sor mo lus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-23: gang la bdag tu nga rgyal 'jug pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-24: rkang pa'i mthil lus ma yin zhing long bu bdag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-26: rkang pa'i rting pa bdag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252a-27: lus ma yin zhing bsdus pa bdag gam lus ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-0: sgal @252b pa'i rus par gyur pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga bdag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-4: bzhin gyi rus par gyur pa bdag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-6: dge slong des rnam par phye na don gzhan du gyur pa'i lus ma mthong zhing so so la'ang lus ma mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-7: rnam par phye na'ang lus ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-14: bdag mi mthong zhing bdag nyid med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-15: de ltar lus rdul phra mo so sor rnam par 'byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-16: de bdag gi lus yungs kar tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-17: phyi ma lta bur mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-18: de 'byung ba chen po rnams rnam par 'byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-20: ci sa'i khams bdag yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-23: rlung gi khams bdag yin nam snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-24: de don dam par na bdag gi khams ma mthong zhing bdag gi khams mthong ba med pa na don gzhan du gyur pa ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-26: shing ljon pa du ma 'dus pa la tshal du mthong la shing ljon pa re re la tshal med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-27: don dam par na tshal zhes bya ba shing ljon pa ma gtogs par tshal med la yang dag par na shing ljon pa'ang shun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-31: lcug ma ma gtogs par don gzhan du gyur pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:252b-32: kun rdzob tu ni tshal yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-0: de ltar lus 'di'ang lag pa la sogs pa 'dus pa tsam 'di la kun rdzob tu 'di ni @253a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-1: lus yin no zhes 'du shes 'jug go snyam nas de lus de'i chos kyi de kho na nyid shes nas lus la 'dod chags dang bral zhing lus kyi yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-2: nying lag dag la 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-3: de 'dod chags dang bral na dga' pa'i 'dod chags kyi mod las skyes pa'ang 'byung ba'i sred pas gnod pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-4: de ltar 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la rab tu brtson no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-5: ji ltar na zhe sdang gi gnyen po la rab tu brtson zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-6: de byams pa la gnas par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-8: sems can 'di dag ni nyam nga bar zhugs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-10: 'gro ba lnga rnams su skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-13: 'byung ba dag 'jigs pa lngar zhugs shing shi ba'i lus rus pa lta bu de dag la ma lta bur snying rje skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-14: rma la ba tshvas byugs pa lta bu'i sems can sdug bsngal ba 'di dag la ji ltar khro ba skyed de sems can de dag ni rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba yin no snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-15: de nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po gnyis pa la gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-16: yang dge slong de ji ltar na nyon mongs pa chen po gsum pa so sor 'jig pa la rab tu brtson zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-17: gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i sems can ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-18: ngag gis nyes par spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253a-19: yid kyis nyes par spyad pa spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-0: lus dang bral @253b nas dam 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-1: gang gi tshe yang dag pa'i lta ba sngon du song bas gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-2: ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-3: yid kyis legs par spyad pa spyod pa de chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-4: chos ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-6: chos ma yin pa de dag gi de kho na nyid shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-7: rnam par shes par 'gyur ba de'i tshe nyon mongs pa chen po gsum pa'i ngo bo nyid med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-8: dge slong de nyon mongs pa gsum po de dag gzhig pa'i gnyen po gsum ni nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-9: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-10: bag la nyal so sor gnas pa 'jig par 'gyur ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-12: shing ljon pa'i rtsa ba bcad na shun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-19: 'bras bu la sogs pa de dag thams cad rul pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-20: rnyis par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gsum po de dag bcom na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-21: nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-23: ji ltar na dge slong de sa gzhan bdun pa las sa gzhan brgyad pa la 'jug ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:253b-24: rnal 'byor spyod pa de nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-1: slong thog ma nyid du 'di ltar mig gis yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin mthong zhing ji ltar na mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la byis pa so so'i skye bo kun tu chags shing rnam par chags la shin tu rmongs shig gu snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-2: de la kun tu chags pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni mdza' bshes mthong ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-5: de las gzhan pa mthong na kun tu chags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-6: zhe sdang gi gnas su 'gyur ba ni 'gran zlar gyur pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-7: 'gran zla'i gnas su 'gyur ba dag la zhe sdang bar 'gyur ro; ;'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-8: zhe sdang gis bsgribs pa'i mig dag ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-9: gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sems ni kun tu rtog pa tsam gyi mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba la kun tu chags shing rnam par chags la shin tu rmongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-10: sred pas bslus pa'i mi ni rang gi 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pas bdag nyid la bdag nyid kun tu chags par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-12: khyi ni sha med pa'i rus pa blangs te khar bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-13: de 'gram so'i bar du rus pa bcug pa'i kha chu 'dzag pas gsher ba la za la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-14: de la chags pa'i khyi'ang rang gi kha'i so'i bar nas khrag 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254a-15: de rus pa de'i ro yin par sems kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-0: ro 'di ni bdag nyid @254b kyi khrag la bdag nyid myong bar byed do snyam du mi sems shing ro la chags pa'i khyi de lce'ang za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-1: ro la chags pa'i bsgribs pa rus pa yin par sems pa de ni kun tu rtog pa tsam kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-2: de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo'i mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs mig tu sdug pa'i gzugs dag la kun tu chags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-3: de kha chu lta bu'i rnam par rtog par blo gros bsgribs pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-4: rnam par dpyod pa ni rus pa lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-5: mig ni khar ba cug pa lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-7: de'i sred pa ni gang gis khrag 'dzag pa lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-8: 'di ni bdag gi gzugs yin no snyam du sems pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-9: sred pa khrag gi ro la chags pa lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-10: de ro de la chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-11: de la khyi ji lta ba bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo'ang de dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-12: rus pa ji lta ba bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs kyang de dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-13: 'gram sos za bar byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'ang de dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-14: so ji lta ba bzhin du yul yang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-15: de lta bas na mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rus gong lta bu dag gis byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad rnam par slu bar byed do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:254b-16: yang dge slong de sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-0: ji ltar na 'khor bar yid byung ba'i dge slong dag sred pa'i 'jigs pas @255a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-2: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu spong zhig gu snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-3: ji ltar glang po che lo drug lon pa glang po che'i cho ga shes pa'i mes bskor cing lus chen po de shing thags kyis bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-4: bcing ba lnga yis bcings nas bu ram shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-8: btung ba'i ro mang po sbyar cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-11: sgra dbyangs dag gis de rnam par 'dul bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-12: gang gis de tshal gyi bde ba brjed par bya ba brjed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-13: der glang po che tha mal ba dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed cing de gzhan gyis bkrir rung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-14: de nas glang po che cho ga shes pa des de ltar yongs su spyod pa na rang gi tshal gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i gnas ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-21: sa phyogs dga' ba rjes su bsams shing bcings pa thams cad kyang bde ba de dag rjes su dran nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-22: bcings pa thams cad bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-23: glang po che'i cho ga shes pa'i mi la'ang 'dzem pa med par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-25: bu ram shing gi dum bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-28: btung ba'i ro dag ni 'thungs pa glu dbyangs dag gis gzhag par ma nus shing de'i yid rnam par gdul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255a-29: de'i tshal gyi bde ba brjed par bya bar ma nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-0: glang po che @255b tha mal pa dang lhan cig 'dra bar 'gro bar mi 'dod cing yang tshal de dag dran pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong de thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-1: 'ching ba lnga dag gis bcings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-8: dri sdug pa dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-9: glang po che cho ga shes pa'i mis bskor blta bu gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-16: yid kyi rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-17: rang gi blo gros khyim gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-18: gzeb lta bus bskor ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-30: btung ba'i ro zhes bya ba kun tu rtog pa'i la du 'dod chags kyi skom zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-31: sred pa la rnam par chags par ni glu dbyangs lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-32: dga' ba'i 'dod chags ni bcings pa lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-33: glang po che tha mal pa dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni mi tha mal pa log par lta ba glang po che zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:255b-34: lhan cig gnas zhes bya ba ni de dag dang lhan cig 'jig tshogs la lta zhing tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-1: pa dang; yang dag par 'brel pa mi tha mal pa'i khar sbrang rtsi lta bu log par lta ba'i gtam dag gis rab tu dga' ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-2: gzhan gyis bkrir rung ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-3: glang po che'i chog shes pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-4: yongs su spyod pa na zhes bya ba ni gti mug nyon mongs pa thams cad dang 'grogs pa zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-5: nges par 'byung ba'i ri dran zhing ri'i sman ljangs zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-6: snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-8: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i lam la sems bskyed pa'i 'bras bur gyur ba mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-9: bya'i sgra zhes bya ba ni chos kyi gtam gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-10: cha bo'i rgyun dga' ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi chu bo zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-11: rgyun ces bya ba ni sems rtse gcig ces bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-12: sa phyogs zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-15: snying rje dang dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-17: rjes su bsams nas zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba rjes su bsams ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256a-18: rnal 'byor spyod pa de glang po che'i tshogs lta ba'i rjes su 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-0: @256b de lta bas na glang po che lta bur rnal 'byor spyod pas bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-1: khyi lta bur ni mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-2: de nas gzhan yang ji ltar na dge slong des gzhan brgyad pa las sa gzhan dgu pa la 'jug ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-3: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ching gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-5: khams gsum pa 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-9: mi gtsang ba'i snod du gyur pa 'dod pa thams cad kyang mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-11: nags tshal gyi khrod na rigs chen po'i ngam grog la shing 'brog skye ba skyon du ma dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-12: de la 'bras bu chung du yod pa blang bar dga' zhing nyes pa mang por 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-13: ngam grog tu ltung ba'i nyes pas srog la the tshom za bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-14: khong stong gi nyes pas g-yang sa'i phyogs su ltung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-15: shing mthon po la 'dzeg pa dag gi srog chad par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-16: gal te mi byis pa so so'i skye bo rmongs shing mun par gyur pa dag ro la chags pa de 'bras bu de dag mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-19: shing khong stong mthon po ltung ba'i sar 'gro ste 'chi bar 'gyur ba mi sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-20: byis pa so so'i skye bo blo zhan pa ro chung du myong bas phyogs pa de dag shing de la 'dzegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-21: de shing de las 'bras bu dag ma thob par de'i srog ni g-yang sar gtong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:256b-22: gal te rang bzhin gyis thabs gzhan dang ldan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-0: dge ba'i las byed pa kha cig ni de 'dod @257a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-1: chags kyi ro ches chung bas byis pa'i blo'i nyes dmigs ches mang ba bcings par mthong ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-2: dge slong des nags tshal gyi khrod lta bur 'gro ba lnga'i rim pa mthong ngo ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-3: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-5: ngam grog chen po zhes bya ba ni nyes pa thams cad ngam grog lta bu yin no; ;shing 'bra go zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i shing zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-6: skyon brgya phrag du ma zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa brgya phrag stong du ma ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-7: de dag tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-8: shing la yod pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-12: dri sdug pa 'dod pa de dag la rnam par chags pa'i blo zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-13: blang bar dka' zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i 'bras bu blang bar dka' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-17: rgyal po la bsten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-19: tshong pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas thob pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-20: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu lta bu nyes pa mang po zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ces bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-22: g-yang sa zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257a-24: yi dvags kyi g-yang sa zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-0: @257b srog la the tshom za bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni chos kyi srog ces bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-1: shing khong stong gi nyes pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-4: snying po med pa zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-5: rmongs pa'i ni 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni byis par log par lta ba zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-6: de lta bas na skyon mang po du ma 'bras bu med pa'i 'dod bum zhog chung ba mthong nas dge slong de 'dod pa thams cad la kun tu rtog par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-7: yang dge slong de 'dod pa me 'bar ba lta bur mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-8: ji ltar mar me mthong na dga' la rag na mchog tu tsha ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-9: phye ma leb rmongs pa mar me kha dog sdug par mthong nas mar me de'i nang du song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-10: de 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo phye ma leb lta bu dag ni 'dod pa thams cad la kun tu dga' bar lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-11: mar me lta bu zhes bya ba ni gal te mar me der lus song ba'i phye ma leb bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-13: yi dvags rnams su sreg par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-14: de lta bas na 'dod pa dag gis chog go snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-15: dge slong de 'dod pa dag las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:257b-17: dge slong de sems can dag 'ching ba gang gis bcings shing 'khor bar kun tu 'khor snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-0: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi @258a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-1: rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-3: 'jig rten 'di ni 'ching ba gnyis kyis bcings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-6: de la zas kyi 'ching ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-7: kham gyi zas gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-10: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-11: sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-13: yi dvags kyi phyogs gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-14: yid la byed pa'i zas yod pa de dag mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-16: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bsam gtan gyi zas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-17: reg pa'i zas ni bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-18: mig gis lta ba dag gi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-19: de'i rnam pa gzhan ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi byis pa so so'i skye bo mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-22: sems can dmyal ba 'di dag thams cad ni 'khrig pa'i reg pa la rab tu chags pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-23: gang 'dod pa la bsten pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-24: mnyam par dmigs pa'i zas ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-25: de lta bas na 'jig rten 'di ni gnyis kyis bcings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-27: bag la nyal ba thams cad kyi 'ching ba dag las de 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258a-28: de mig gi rnam par rig par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-0: rnam pa gzhan gyis mig gis yang dag @258b pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-1: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba gang yin pa de las bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-2: dmigs pa bde ba la rnam par smin pa mi bde ba'i las byung ba de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-3: de bzhin du mig gi rnam par rig par bya ba yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa bde ba las byung ba de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-4: mig gi rnam par rig par bya ba de gang yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-5: gzugs la dmigs pa bde ba ni rnam par smin pa mi bde ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-6: 'di la nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i mig gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dmigs pa'i gzugs mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-7: da ltar byung ba'i rnam par smin pa bde ba la bde'o zhes rab tu shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-8: rtog par byed la ro myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-9: yongs su 'gyur bas rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang; yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-10: dud 'gror yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:258b-11: gang dag da ltar byung ba rnam par smin pa bde ba ma yin pa ma yin la yongs su 'gyur bas rnam par smin pa bde ba'i las de gang yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-0: 'di la mig gi rnam par rig par bya ba'i gzugs rnams mthong nas mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la mngon du @259a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-1: phyogs pa'i sems de la chags pa med cing yid 'jug pa med pa de ni da ltar byung ba la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-3: mi'i bde bar skye zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-4: de bzhin du rna ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-8: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos rnam par shes pa'i chos rnams la'ang sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-10: ji ltar na dge slong de mig gis rig par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la btang snyoms su gnas she na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-11: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i dge slong gi mig gis 'di la gzugs mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-12: ma chags shing rnam par ma chags la rnyog pa can du ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-13: smod pa med cing dga' bar mi byed la yid la mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-14: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas bsgribs pa ma yin zhing btang snyoms pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-15: de ni btang snyoms su 'gyur ba'i gnas la sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-16: bde bar 'gyur ba'i gnas mi dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-17: yang dge slong de sa drug pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i ngo bos gzhan bcu pa la 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-19: mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-20: bsam gtan dang po'i sa khyad par can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259a-22: sa drug pa'i rab tu dbye ba la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-0: de skyes nas 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i @259b lam yan lag brgyad pa'i sgo rtogs shing khong du chud pa'i chos skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-1: 'jig pa mthong zhing yang dag par thob nas rab tu 'bad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-2: de de ltar rab tu 'bad pa na sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag gis bdud kyi 'ching ba phal cher spa gong bar mthong nas dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-3: bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin dag la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-4: de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-5: de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-6: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-7: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyis kyang 'thab bral ba rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-8: 'thab bral ba rnams kyis kyang dga' ldan pa rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-9: dga' ldan pa rnams kyis kyang 'phrul dga' ba rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-10: 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-11: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyis kyang tshangs ris pa rnams la mngon par bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-12: de ltar dzambu'i gling du rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig ces bya ba rgya cher snga ma bzhin du sbyar ba nas sa gzhan brgyad pa la 'jug pa dag sa drug pa'i nang du lhag par zhugs pa de tshangs ris kyi lha dag gis thos nas mchog tu dga' ba bsam gtan la bde bar gnas par btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:259b-13: kun tu dga' bar gyur pa'i bar de thos nas shin tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-1: dge dang mi dge dag gi las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-2: bdag gis byas pa'i las kun gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-4: lus can dag dang 'brel ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-5: nyon mongs pa ni dang por dngar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-6: rnam par smin pa tsha ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-7: de dag don med byed pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-8: dug dang 'dra ba spang bar bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-9: nyon mongs dbang du mi 'gro zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-10: ye shes dbang du 'gro bya ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-11: ye shes ldan par tshe 'di dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-12: pha rol dag tu bde ba 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-13: ji ltar rtsva la mes bsregs bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-14: shes pas rtag tu nyon mongs gzhom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-15: tshangs pa dkon mchog gsum ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-16: ye shes me lce mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-17: gang dag ye shes spyod yul dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-18: de dag zhi ba'i lam la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-19: gang dag nyon mongs sprul bsregs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-20: de dag thams cad zhig par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-21: dpa' bo gang dag phan tshun shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-22: mkhas pa de nyid mthong ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-23: de dag gnas ni dam par 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-24: skye dang 'chi ba spangs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-25: gang dag 'khor la mngon dga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-26: mgu ba nyon mongs dgra dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-27: rtag tu bcings pas bcings pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-28: de dag sred pa nyam ngar 'khyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-29: gang dag nges 'byung blo yod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-30: gang dag rtag tu zhi spyod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-31: de ni lha yi ris dag gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260a-33: 'dod la sogs la gang sdang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-0: sangs rgyas @260b la sogs rtag tu mchod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-1: shing skam me yis bsregs pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-3: gang dag sems kyi dbang mi 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-4: rtag tu de rjes sems 'gro ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-5: mun la nyi ma shar ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-6: de ni nyon mongs nges par 'joms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-7: sems ni dgra nang dgra chen te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-8: de las gzhan pa'i dgra med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-9: ri ni dus su bsregs pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-10: sems can rtag tu sems kyis bsregs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-11: byis pa [?] blun po sems dbang song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-12: dbang po ma thu la gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-13: de yi sdug bsngal zhi med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-14: de yi mya ngan 'das pa ring //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-15: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal rnam smin dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-16: sdug bsngal rgyu ni rnam shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-17: kun nas nyon mongs 'dus pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-19: snang ba'i nang na shes pa mchog //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-20: mun pa'i nang na gti mug ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-21: de ltar gang zhig snang la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-22: de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-23: don rnams mchog kun med byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-24: dpa' bos gti mug rnam par spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-25: gang zhig gti mug dbang song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-26: de la zhi ba med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-27: gal te che bar dag 'dod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-28: me yis reg par gyur kyang rung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-29: sprul dang lhan cig 'dug kyang sla'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-30: nyon mongs lhan cig sbyor mi bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-31: bdud rtsi'i nang na shes pa mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-32: che ba'i nang na gter mchog yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-33: gnyen gyi nang na gnyen mchog ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-34: nor gyi nang na nor mchog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:260b-35: de lta bas na ye shes mes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-0: @261a *// rtag tu nyon mongs ri bsreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-1: nyon mongs ri dag bsregs pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-2: bde ba'i gzhi la gnas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-3: mi gang blo ni zhan pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-4: chos ma yin pa nyon mongs gzeb //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-5: 'khor ba dag las ma brgal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-6: mun pa mun nag nang du 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-7: gang dag chos la blo rtag pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-8: de dag dam pa rtag tu mchod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-9: de dag tshe rabs 'bras bur ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-10: de dag blo yis gce ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-11: de ltar dge slong de chos dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-12: chos ma yin pa de dag gi rnam pa yang dag pa shes par gyur nas gnas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-13: de ltar de shin tu dri ma med pa'i sems kyis tshe 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor ba'i ri'i rtse mo 'jig par byed cing spong bar byed la 'joms par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-15: de'i nyon mongs pa'i ngag 'joms par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-16: de'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-18: dge slong de las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa gzhan rjes su sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-19: ji ltar na nyes par byas pa'i sems kyi rgyu'i rgyun rnam pa du ma chu bo'i rgyun ltar 'bab pa'i sems can rnams kyis nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i sa mngon du gyur pa sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba mi bzad pa tshab rtsub pa dag myong bar 'gyur snyam nas nang gi chos kyi rjes su lta ba de legs par byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261a-20: nyes par byas pa'i de kho na nyid dpyod pa'i blos rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-1: srog chags 'di dag ni sems kyis bslus shing sred pas bslus nas yang sos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-8: mnar med pa'i gnod pa'i nyen 'khor gyi sems can dmyal bar ji ltar skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-9: 'di ltar las mngon sum du gyur pa sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor ni gang zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-10: sems can dmyal bar las gang gis srog chags rnams sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor du 'gro snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-11: dge slong des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-12: lha'i mig gis brtags na sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos na yod pa'i 'khor gyi ming ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-17: gnod pa rnam par ma zhi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-19: kun tu mi dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-24: ne'u le nag po lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-26: sdug bsngal gyis gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-30: yang sos kyi 'khor bcu drug yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-31: de la las gang gis sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi 'khor du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:261b-32: dge slong des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-0: lha'i mig gis brtags na srog gcod pa kun tu bsnyen cing bsgoms @262a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-1: te mang du byas pa'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-3: las kyi mjug dang ldan pas sems can dmyal ba yang sos su skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-4: 'di ltar srog gcod pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-6: tha mas gnod pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-9: de la sems can dmyal ba chen po ni mi tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-11: tshul khrims kyi phyogs spyod pa'i sems can gzhan sems can du'ang shes la bsams bzhin du srog bcad de las kyi mjug kyang gsog cing 'chags par mi byed la sems 'gyod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-12: gzhan dag la'ang rung bar rjod cing phyir zhing byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-13: gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa de la gcod du 'jug cing rab tu spro bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-14: dga' bar byed cing rab tu gnas par byed la slob par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-15: gzhan dag gis byas pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed pa'i mi gti mug can yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-17: de sems can dmyal ba'i gnas der skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-18: mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-19: bgrang ba'i tshul ji lta bu'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-20: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262a-21: rgyal chen bzhi pa dag ni lo lnga brgyar 'tshol de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-0: chen pos @262b tshe thung du dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-3: dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-4: gal te sdig pa'i sa 'od mi zad pa byas na de 'khor gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-9: drug nas de bzhin du 'khor bcu drug gi bar dag tu smin par 'gyur ba nas sdig pa'i las bcom zhing bsal la zad par ma byas kyi bar du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-10: sems can dmyal ba gzhan dag gi lo lnga brgya ni lha'i bgrang ba'i tshul dang mthun te mi'i ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-12: ji ltar na dge slong de sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor dag gi las mngon sum du gyur pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-13: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des sems ri mo mkhan lta bus ri mo lta bu'i rang gi las kyi 'bras bu'i sa'i cha sems kyi bsam pa'i gnas kyi rnam par gnod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gi 'jigs pa gzhan dang mtshungs pa med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi 'khor dag rab tu 'byed par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-14: las gang gis 'khor mi gtsang ba'i 'dam du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-15: lha'i mig gis brtags na mi gtsang ba'i 'dam du skye bar 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-16: mi dge ba'i las kyi sa bon du gyur pa srog gcod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-17: gal te 'dod chags kyis byed na bya yis bya la'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-18: mig dud ka lta bus mig dud ka lta bu la'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:262b-19: dud ka lta bus dung ka lta bu la'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-2: ri dvags dag gsod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-5: las kyi mjug gsog pa snga ma bzhin du sbyar te de de bskye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-6: de'i gnod pa'i phyogs gcig tu 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-8: mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi 'khor du mi gtsad pa rab tu 'bar ba ro tsha ba zangs bzhus pa lta bu dang ldan zhing srin bu mchu rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa dag gis kun tu gang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-9: de gal te mi gtsang ba de dag za na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-10: de'i srin bu de dag gis lus de'i nang du song ste sngar mchu za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-18: b'ar sha'i 'og tu b'a ksha li ka /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-19: b'aksha li ka'i 'og tu mnye ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-21: rgyu ma'i 'og tu long ka'i nang du song nas gnad thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-22: so so'i gnad rgyus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-25: mi gtsang pa'i lus las srin bu 'byung ba de dag gis pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-26: de sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba tshab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-29: mi'i bgrang ba'i tshul gyis lo du ma lo 'bum phrag du mar tshor ba myor bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-30: ji tsam du sdig pa bya'i srog gcod pa ni byas gsod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263a-31: srog chags dud ka lta bu ni dud ka lta bus gsod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-0: gdos kyis ri dvags gsod pa rdon pa spyod pa'i @263b ngang tshul can ni de dag gis gsod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-1: de dag gis dbang du byas nas za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-2: de'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas ji ltar de dag gis de zos pa de ltar srin bu de dag gis de'i nang du song nas za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-3: rang gi las dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-4: mi dge ba'i 'bras bu 'dra ba ni gang gi tshe de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-5: de de'i tshe mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba las thar bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-6: sems ri mo mkhan lta bu de'ang ri mo bris pa lta bu 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-7: de de las thar nas gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las su mi 'gyur na de dud 'gro byar skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-8: de bya der gyur nas de bzhin du bya des gsod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-9: ri dvags su gyur na'ang des sngon ji ltar rgya'am //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-11: ri dvags dag bsad pa'i las kyi 'bras bu des sems can dmyal bar smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus dud 'gror skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-12: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis lha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-13: mir skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun par de tshe thung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-15: dge slong de sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi 'khor gnyis pa lcags kyis bsgyur ba zhes bya ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-16: srog gcod pa'i las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:263b-17: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-3: blang ba'i rgyu'i sems can dag srog gcod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-4: mtshon gyis gzhan bsad cing srog dang phral na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-7: gzhi de 'chags par mi byed cing rab tu spro bar byed pa'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-8: las kyi nyer bsdogs byas pa ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-9: lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro legs par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba lcags kyis bsgyur bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-10: de na lcags kyi rab rab tu 'bar ba 'phang du dpag tshad bcu yod pa sems can dmyal ba'i mes rab tu 'bar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-11: de'i drung na mi dag gi me ni sprin dang mtshungs so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-12: mtshon rab tu 'bar ba'i shugs kyis kyang de dag gi lus la rab tu 'bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-13: gang gis lus de dag yungs kar tsam du gcod cing 'jig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-15: thams cad du mtshon gyi char rab tu 'bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-17: dzambu gling du dus su char gyi rgyun 'bab pa ltar phyogs bcur mtshon gyi char gyis mngon par khebs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-18: gang gis sems can dmyal ba de dag gshegs kyang 'chi bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-19: de'i sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas yan lag rnams bcad cing gtubs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264a-21: lcags kyis bsgyur ba'i sems can dmyal ba de na ral gri lo ma lta bu'i tshal yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-0: ba tshva lta bu'i tshal de rgyang ring po nas tshal nag @264b po'i phung po lta bu mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-2: skom pas gdungs pa kun tu rgyug cing cho nges 'dbes pa na de gang du zhugs par gyur pa de dag kun nas mtshon gyi char gyis rnam par gsheg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-3: der las kyi rgyu ni phyugs de dag la zas kyis brid nas bslus pa de'i las de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-4: 'bras bu de ni 'di ltar sems ri mo mkhan lta bus sems can dmyal ba'i ri mo'i gzhi la sems can dmyal pa pa'i mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dri ba de lta de ltar sems can dmyal bar 'grub pa'i las so sor myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-5: der sems can dmyal ba de dag ji tsam du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-6: lo 'bum phrag du mar gshegs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-7: gang sems ri mo mkhan lta bu des mngon par 'dri ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-9: dge slong de yang sos kyi 'khor gsum pa snod du gtso ba zhes bya ba de'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-10: las gang zhig gis der skyes par 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-11: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na sems can rnga mo'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-16: dri shya bhu te gson pa dag bza' ba'i don du spu dbyi bar bya ba'i phyir der 'jug cing rab tu bskol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:264b-17: 'jog par byed pa de dag lus dang bral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-1: par ltung bar sa bon dang mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu snod du btso bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-2: de rab tu btso ba lcags kyi snod kyi nang du rab tu bcug nas sran ma mud ka bzhin du 'tshed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-3: lo 'bum phrag du mar sems can dmyal ba pa'i me mi bzad pas 'tshed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-4: sems ri mo mkhan lta bu'i gzhi bcom zhing spangs te zad par byas na de de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-5: sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-6: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-7: skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-9: mi'i bar dag tu skye bar 'gyur la de tshe thung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-10: de 'khor snod du btso ba mthong nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i dge slong de ji ltar na sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor la lta zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-11: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-13: 'di ltar dge slong de ni mchog tu dpa' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-14: bdud kyi sde mngon par 'joms shing 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-15: tshul khrims kyi chus 'dod chags kyi me gsod par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-16: byams pa'i chu'i bum pas zhe sdang gi me gsod par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265a-17: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgron mas gti mug gi rab rib rab tu sel bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-0: zab mo khong du chud pa'i dge slong ni @265b 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-2: dge slong de yang sos kyi 'khor bzhi pa gnod pa rnam par ma zhi ba zhes bya ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-4: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni sa bon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-6: gang gis mir gyur pa'i yang sos gzhan gnod pa rnam par du ma byas par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-8: shing gi bar du bcir ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-12: dbang po'i lam 'dren pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-14: rab tu ltung ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-16: thag pas 'dren pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-17: glang po che'i steng nas ltung ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-18: bye mas 'thor ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-19: gtun shing gi tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-20: lcags gzhus pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-21: klad pa na ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-23: khye'u pang par bcir ba lta bu'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-28: chu blugs pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-29: shing la dbyangs pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-31: g-yang sar rnam par 'jigs pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-32: dgra'i dbang du gyur pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-33: spa ba gcod pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-34: sor mo la rab tu gnod pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-36: mgo 'khor los bskor ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:265b-39: zangs bskol bar 'jug pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-1: rnon po 'jug pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-2: sba ba'i gnas su sprul 'jug pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-3: bong bas 'phen pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-5: lus la me'i phreng ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-7: srog chags mar ko ta ka 'jug pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-8: phags pa btub pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-9: ts'a lb'i na ka'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-11: lus gtub pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-13: bum par btsos pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-14: so phag gi tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-15: lus phyed du ba tshva blugs pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-16: phyag dar gyi phye ma'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-17: rab tu bsregs pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-18: rkang pa'i mthe bo mtshon gyis bcad cing rab tu bsreg pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-19: phyi phyi ling gi tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-20: rgya mtsho sum cu'i dbu ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-23: ring du 'gro ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-26: gser rdung ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-27: tsha bas cher skrangs pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266a-30: tshor ba de dag gis gang sdug bsngal gyi tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs du ma kun tu spyod pa de dag ni lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa rnam par ma zhi ba de ni der rgyu dang mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-0: sems can dmyal ba de'i rnam par @266b smin pa dpe med pa bye ba stong phrag bcur bsgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-1: sngar ji skad bshad pa'i gnod pa de dag thams cad rang gi las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i sa der de dag myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-2: gang sems ri mo mkhan lta bus sreg pa'i pir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-3: mi dge ba kun tu rtog pa sna tshogs kyi tshon rtsi snod kyi gzhi lta bu'i snying la kun tu 'dri ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-5: chung ma'i mtshan ma dam pos de rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-6: rang gis legs par byas pa'i las ni pha mas byas pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-7: ji tsam du sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-8: de nas shi nas gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las gang gi dud 'gro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-9: yi dvags dag tu ma skyes la gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-10: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de rtag tu bcing ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-13: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nas 'tshe ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-15: skye bo kun gyis kyang mngon par gtse ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-16: rtag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-20: bu dag dang yang zhe 'gras par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:266b-22: dge slong de sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi 'khor lnga pa mun pa zhes bya ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-0: sems can dag las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa gang gis skye @267a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-1: bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-2: sems can gang dag log par lta ba las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-3: 'bras bu phyin ci log tu ston pa mchod sbyin dag la phyugs bsubs nas gsod par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-4: rus sbal dag so phag gis mngon par g-yogs shing mun par 'jug par byed pa de dag lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba mun par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-5: der skyes nas kyang mun pa 'byung ba'i mes sreg par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-6: rdo rje lta bu'i ri shugs drag po dag 'ongs shing las kyi rlung gis bdas nas de gnyis kyis dbus su bcug la bye ma snyim pa nas gtor ba bzhin du thal bar rlog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-7: ji ltar skra'i rtse mo bsdus pa phan tshun skyabs med pa de ltar rtag tu gnod pa byed cing spu gri lta bu'i rlung rab tu 'bar ba langs pa gang gis 'di yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-8: nying lag gzhig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-10: bkres pas lus rab tu 'bar ba de dag ni de na dud mo 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-11: ji ltar de dag gis rus sbal me'i nang du bsregs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267a-12: so phag dag gis mnan pa de ltar lo 'bum phrag du mar 'khrul 'khor la khab kyi bu ga tsam gyi snang ba med pa bzhin du snang ba med par byed la rang gi lus las byung ba'i spu rab tu 'bar ba dag gis kun tu sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-0: sems sgre'u lta @267b bus bag la nyal ri lta bu la rnam par rgyu zhing rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-1: ri'i ngos ltar brtan pas rgyas pa ri'i rtse mo lta bu la gnas pa lta ba ngan pa'i ri khrod lta bu la rnam par rgyu zhing nga rgyal las byung ba shing ljon pa thibs po lta bur spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-2: khro ba brag gseb lta bu la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-3: phrag dog yon tan bsags pa lta bu'i 'bras bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-4: sred pa chu bo'i dbang du song ba lta bus gang mi dge ba'i rlabs byas pa de dag ji tsam du rnam par bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du 'chi ba'i dus mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-5: de sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor mun pa de las thar nas gal te yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-6: dud 'gror ma skyes la mi dag dang skal pa mnyam par mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-7: de rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus rtag tu bcing bas bcings par 'gyur zhing tshe thung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-9: dge slong de sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi 'khor drug pa kun tu mi dga' ba zhes bya ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-10: las gang gis sems can dmyal ba kun tu mi dga' bar skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na sems can la mngon par 'khu ba'i bsam pa yod pa ni rtag tu srog gcod pa la mngon par brtson pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:267b-13: bung bu'i skad kyis nags khrod na rnam par rgyu ba'i sems can ri dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-1: bag tsha ba med par rgyu ba dag sgra de dag gis kun tu skrag par byed cing rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-2: blon po phal po cher yid kyis bsam pa yod pa'i rjes su rngon pa gsad pa'i bsam pa yod pa 'gro ba de ni lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-3: bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba kun tu mi dga' bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-4: rgyu dang mthun par 'bras bu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-5: ji ltar sems can de dag gis kun tu mi dga' ba byas pa de ltar sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba'i me'i nang du bcug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-11: wa rnams kyi mchu rno la sgra mchog tu 'jigs pa rnams kyis rna ba drung nas bcad cing za la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-12: mchog tu 'jigs pa mi 'dod cing mi sdug la yid du mi 'ong ba skye bo thams cad skrag par byed pa'i sgra des kun tu mi dga' ba phal cher yid la gcags par 'gyur zhing srog chags mar ko ta ka'i mchu rdo rje lta bus yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-13: yang du rus pa'i gseb dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-14: nang du zhugs pa dag gis rna ba la za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268a-15: sems nya lta bu de sred pa chu bo lta bu la rnam par rgyu zhing khro ba dpa' rlabs lta bur 'khrug pas 'khor ba ri bo'i gseb lta bu la gnas shing 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi phyogs kyis 'dod pa'i ro chung ba mchil ba lta bu'i 'ching ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-0: lta ba ngan pa chu ltar @268b zab pa la rnam par rgyu ba skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-5: dri la rtag tu sred pa gang mi dge ba'i las des dgod cing byas la de'i dud mo 'byin pa ni ma myong gi bar du 'chi ba'i dus mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-7: rang gi sred pa grong gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-8: sems ni nya 'dra rmongs pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-9: las byed tshe na dgar 'dzin la; ;myong ba'i tshe na ngu bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-10: gang tshe mi dge de yi las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-11: lhag ma med par bcom zhing spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-12: med gyur de ni de nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-13: shi nas yi dvags dud 'gror skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-14: lan grangs gzhan la myong ba'i las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-15: gang gis gal te der mi skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-16: gal te der ni mi rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-17: skal mnyam mi ru skye bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-18: de ni rtag tu dman pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-19: zil gyis non cing nam yang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-20: de sems dga' ba skye mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-21: gang dang gang ni byed pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-22: don med dga' ba med byed dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-23: bu dang chung ma nor dang 'bru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-24: gsod dang 'ching bar byed pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-25: de ni mi dge las kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-26: dga' med rgyu mthun 'bras bu yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-27: kun tu mi dga' rtag tu thos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-28: yang dge slong de sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi 'khor bdun pa tshor ba bdo ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:268b-29: sems can da dag pas gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na sems can bag la nyal bdo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:269a-1: bdo ba'i sems can ni srog gcod pa mang po bag med pa la 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:269a-2: de dag lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba bdo bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:269a-9: me 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i rgyan byas pa'i tshor ba la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nyin gcig bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:269a-11: dge slong de las kyi 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid shes pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer tshol ba na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi de kho na nyid shes pa sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi 'khor la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:269a-12: ji ltar thig nag gi 'khor gzhan gang zhig yod snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na sems can dmyal bar sreg pa mi bzad pa'i tshor ba rtag tu 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i sems can dmyal ba mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:269a-13: sems can dag las gang gis sems can dmyal ba der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na gang lta ba ngan pa'i bstan bcos kyi gtan tshigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:269a-14: dpe dag gis tshul khrims spangs pa'i mi ngam grog gam /
