K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-5: bya dang mi bya mi shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-6: mi de phyugs dang mtshungs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-7: de lta bas na chang spongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-8: chang gis g-yengs pa'i mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-9: gson yang shi ba dag dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-10: gang zhig rtag tu gson 'dod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-11: rtag par chang ni rnam par spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-12: chang ni nyes pa kun gyi gzhi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-13: rtag par don kun med par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-14: ngan song gsum gyi them skas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-15: mun nag gnas ni chen po yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-16: chang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-17: de bzhin yi dvags 'jig rten dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-18: chang gi skyon gyis bslus pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-20: dug gi nang du dug ni chang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-21: de bzhin dmyal ba'i nang na dmyal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-22: nad kyi nang na nad mchog ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-23: chang zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-24: blo dang dbang po nyams byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-25: rin chen chos ni zad byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-26: tshangs par spyod pa 'jig byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-27: mi bzad chang ni skyes gnas gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-28: rgyal po dang ni bstan bcos mkhas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-29: chang gis yang bar byed 'gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-30: tha mal mi dag chang 'thung ba; ;bslus par 'gyur ba ci zhig smos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-31: chang la bstan pa'i mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-32: chos rnams kun gyi sta re yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-33: ngo tsha med par byed pa'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316a-34: yang ba dag tu nye bar bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-0: chang @316b gis phrogs par gyur ba'i sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-1: bya ba dang ni mi bya ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-2: mi shes rnam par mi shes shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-3: thams cad mi yis mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-4: gang zhig chang la sten byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-5: skye bo res 'ga' dga' byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-6: res 'ga' yongs su gdung byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-7: res 'ga' sdig pa byed pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-8: blo ni shin tu rmongs skyed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-10: thar pa'i chos la me lta bur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-11: sreg byed kho na chang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-12: mi gang dag ni chang spong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-13: chos kyi ngang tshul mnyam par bzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-14: gang na 'chi ba med pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-16: chang 'thung ba yis bslus pa dag de ni byed pa dman pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-17: mi bzad sems can dmyal bar lhung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-18: don med ci zhig yongs su gdungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-19: 'thung ba'i tshe na chang zhim ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-20: rnam smin tshe na mchog tu che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-21: kim pa ka nang kim pa ka /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-22: chang zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-23: bdag la 'di yis mi gnod ces //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-24: blo ldan chang la yid ma rton //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-25: myong na bsil yang rnam smin tsha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-26: chang ni dmyal bar 'gro bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-27: sdig pa'i chos rnams byed pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-28: sems g-yeng ba dag dga' bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-29: phyi nas rnam smin tsha ba ru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-30: blo ngan yongs su gdung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-31: 'dod pa rnams la blo mi gtang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-32: 'dod pa mchog tu slu ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-34: sems can dmyal ba kun gyi rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-35: gang zhig 'dod pa rnams la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:316b-36: de yi sdug bsngal mtha' med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-1: pa'i sprul gyis zin pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-2: bde ba nam yang ga la yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-3: khyed cag 'dod pa mi bzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-4: drag po sems can dmyal bar 'ongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-5: gnod pa shin tu mi bzad la; ;don med ci zhig yongs su gdung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-6: gang tshe 'dod pas bslus pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-7: khyed cag gis ni sdig byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-8: de tshe ci phyir khro mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-9: de ring ci zhig yongs su gdung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-10: byas la bsags pa brten pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-11: lus ngag gi ni 'bras bu snang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-12: sdig pa'i tshor ba mi bzad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-13: de lta bas na sdig mi bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-14: sdig pa sdig pa'i rnam smin de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-15: rtag tu sdig pa rnams su smin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-16: sdig mi byed la sdig med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-17: de lta bas na sdig pa spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-18: sdig pa yongs su spangs pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-19: sdig pa'i 'jigs pa med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-20: sdig pa rang gis byas pa gnod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-21: gzhan gyis spyod par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-22: de ltar gshin rje'i mi de dag sems can dmyal ba pa de rnams la rjes su ston pa rjes su bstan nas ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag byed du 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-23: phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317a-24: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-0: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun @317b pa'i 'bras bus de mchog tu khro bas khro bar 'gyur zhing bka' blo mi bde bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-2: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la rtog par byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-3: sems can dmyal ba chen po'i 'khor gyi nyen ker la kun tu mi rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-4: las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-6: kye ae ma sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor bcu drug po 'di dag ji ltar yang sos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-9: bye brag tu na sems can dmyal ba der gnod pa gzhan gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-10: gang dag yod pa sems can dmyal ba de la tshor ba de dag thams cad bcur 'gyur du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-11: las byas pa'i rgyu gang brtan pa srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-12: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-13: 'dod par log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-14: sdom pa blangs pas chang ldud pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-15: 'thung ba'i las ngan pa bzhi 'gyur byas pas der skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-16: las de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa bzhi 'gyur gyis tshe shin tu ring por de dag la tshor ba shin tu drag pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-17: dge slong des bzhi 'gyur mthong nas las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:317b-18: 'khor ba la yid 'byung ba'ang bcu 'gyur du yid 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-0: yang dge slong de sems can dmyal ba ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas 'khor ba la shin tu 'jigs @318a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-2: sa gzhan bcu pa la zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-3: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-4: de'ang sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag gis shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-5: bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin dag la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-6: snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-9: tshangs pa chen po'i bar gyis thos nas bdud kyi phyogs ni dma' bar 'gyur zhing dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho bar 'gyur ro zhes tshangs pa chen po'i ris kyi lha dag dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-10: rgya cher snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-12: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba gzhan la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-13: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen po zhes bya ba yod pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-14: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-15: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-16: gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-17: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-18: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-20: rdzun smra ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa rdzogs pa de ni sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen por skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-21: de la srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-22: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318a-23: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-0: chang @318b 'thung ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-1: mchog tu bya bar dka' ba skye bo mkhas pa kun gyis rab tu smad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-2: ngan song kun gyi sgor gyur pa rnam pa du zhig gis brdzun du smra ba rdzogs par 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-6: 'khor gyi nang du 'dug kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-7: gnyis shig chos kyi srang la zhon nas rtsod pa'i tshe dbang po 'di ni tshad ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-8: gang 'dis smras pa de bdag cag gi tshad ma yin no zhes smras pa las de'ang dran bzhin du don gzhan du smra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-9: gal te nor gyi phyir ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-11: gal te 'dod chags kyis bdag la bdag nyid slu ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-12: 'di ltar rdzun 'di las kha na ma tho bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-13: bdag gis rdzun de bya'o snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-14: de ltar de grub pa na nyes pa don med pa byas pa de las de gnyis kyi nang nas gcig la chad pas gcod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-15: gal te bsad du dogs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-18: ji ltar nyes pa'i tshul dang mthun par brdzun du smras na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-19: de'i rgyus sdig pa'i mi de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-20: der shin tu tshe ring bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-21: gang 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi tshe ni lha'i lo brgyad stong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-22: gang mi'i bgrang ba'i tshul gyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:318b-23: mi lo brgyad brgya la nyin zhag gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-1: dga' ba rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-2: de nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-3: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-4: lha de rnams kyi tshe ni lha'i lo brgyad stong yin la de ni sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen po'i nyin zhag gcig yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-5: der rdzun smra ba sdig can rnams gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-7: gzhan la slu ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ma rung bar byed cing mun pa chen por gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-8: skye bo chen po'i yid ches par mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-9: skye bo mkhas pa kun dang lo stong du mi mthun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis smad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-14: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis skyon du bgrang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stegs thams cad la sta re lta bur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-16: rtag tu gnod pas yongs su 'gyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-17: ro myags pa snying po med pa las dug lta bur langs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-18: 'khor ba'i 'gro ba ngan pa'i rgyur gyur cing nyal nyil du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-19: kha nas dri mnam bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-20: rtag tu sdug bsngal gyi dra ba'i rgyur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-21: mi 'dod cing mi sdug la yid du mi 'ong ba sems can dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen po'i pho nya 'chi ba'i tshe rnam par sdangs pa chen por byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-22: gshin rje'i mi'i yul du phyin pa rnams kyi mi mdza' ba chen por gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319a-24: dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dag las g-yang sa lta bur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-0: nyes par @319b byas pa'i las kyi mtha'i rgyur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-2: sems can dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen po byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-3: dud 'gro dag gcig la gcig za ba'i rkyen du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-4: thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-5: 'khor ba'i sa bon du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-6: rdzun smra ba'i 'bras bus der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-7: sems can dmyal ba chen po de'i 'khor ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-9: sgra 'byin cing shin tu sgra 'byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-10: tshor ba dpag tu med dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-11: tshor ba rtsub cing tsha la bzod par dka' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-12: gnod pa dpe med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-14: 'jig rten par gyi du ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-15: phye ma leb ltar rab tu ltung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-16: srog 'chi ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-19: phan tshun gnod pa 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-20: nags tshal mes mched pa'i rgyud lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-23: khva'i mchu rdo rje lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-27: de dag ni sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen po'i 'khor bcu drug yin no; ;sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen po der sems can dag las byas shing bsags pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam na las kyi nyer bsdogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-29: las kyi mjug kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas so sor 'jigs pa chen po sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:319b-30: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-1: lce padma'i 'dab ma ltar shin tu 'jam pa de kha nas drangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-2: rgyang grags gsum du brgyangs pa gshin rje'i mi 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pas de bzung nas gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis lcags kyi thong gshol rab tu 'bar ba dag gis 'bugs shing rmed la yongs su 'dral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-3: zangs dmar po rab tu 'bar bas chag chag 'debs shing lce las byung ba'i srin bu kha rab tu 'bar ba dag skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-4: gang lce dag la za'ang rdzun smra ba de lce de dag phyir kha'i nang du gzhug par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-5: de'i kha'i nang gi so gang yin pa de dag la so srin au lu ka la zhes bya ba byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-6: de dag gis 'byin par byed cing de'i rkang yang las kyis byas pa'i rlung gis phye ma'i phye ma ltar phye mar rlog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-7: de'i mid pa'ang spu gri lta bu'i rlung gis 'jog par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-8: de'i snying yang srin bu'i mchu rab tu 'bar ba dag gis za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-9: rdzun smra ba'i lus can ni sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen po'i gzhir skyes nas sreg ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-10: las byas pas kun nas bslang ba'i lus las byung ba'i srin bu rnams kyis lus rab tu 'bar ba'i rgyu ma dag la za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-11: de'i nang na 'dug pa'i srin bu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-12: nad rnams kyis tshor ba mi bzad cing tsha la drag pa rnams myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320a-13: phyi rol tu'ang sdug bsngal rnam pa gnyis kyis gnod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-0: me las byung ba'i sems @320b can dmyal ba pa dag la gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis tshor ba'i rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis 'jigs pa bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-1: phur bu dag gis kyang yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-5: rus pa'i gseb thams cad 'bugs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-7: tshor ba rnams kyis mngon par gtses par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-9: ste'u yis yan lag nas rus pa la sogs pa'i bar thams cad 'jog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-10: rdzun smra ba smras pa de ni mchog tu don ma yin pa byed cing chos kyi stegs kun las brgal ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-11: rdzun smra ba ni don dam pa thams cad kyi sgor gyur pa; dge ba'i lo tog thams cad la ser ba lta bur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-12: ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgor gyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-13: bya ba ma yin pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-14: sems can thams cad kyi yid ches par 'gyur ba ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-15: 'phags pa'i skye bo kun gyis mi gtsang ba dang 'dra bar smad par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-19: dgra bcom pa dag gis dug bzhin du rnam par spangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-21: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi mun par gyur cing su'ang 'dod pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-22: gcig tu sems can dmyal ba mngon du gyur cing gzhan dang mtshungs pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-23: mun nag tu gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:320b-24: rnam pa de dag tu gyur pa don med pa 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-0: gang dag smra zhing gang dag smras ba ni sems can dmyal @321a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-1: ba du 'bod chen por rgyu de dang mtshungs par 'bras bu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-2: de'i rkang pa mes mar sar bzhin du 'ju zhing de'i bar yang sog le rab tu 'bar bas gsheg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-3: de lus dang yid thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing don med pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'khor de'i mes sems can dmyal ba chen po dag 'tshed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-4: nad thams cad kyis sems can dmyal ba mtshungs par kun tu du skad 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-5: nad mi bzad pa de dag gi ming gzung bar sla ba'ang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-6: de ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du ji srid du sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du lo 'bum phrag du ma brgya stong bye ba bye ba khrag khrig tu sems can dmyal ba pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-7: de phyis sems can dmyal ba las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-8: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-9: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-10: de ltar srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-11: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-12: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321a-14: brdzun du smra ba dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de dbul zhing tshe thung la sems g-yengs pa ma ning skye bo kun gyis smad cing yid brtan pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-0: 'dir tshigs su bcad @321b pa; lus can brdzun du smra ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-1: chos gcig las ni 'gal byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-2: 'jig rten pha rol rnam brgal ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-3: sdig pa don med gang med min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-4: kun la yid ches mi byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-5: rdzun gyi tshig ni ma smra zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-6: 'khor bar gang gis gnod pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-8: rdzun tshig rab tu 'jug pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-9: 'jig rten gnyis la gnod byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-10: kun gyi rnam par ldang byed la; ;chos rnams kun gyi dgon pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-11: gang gis bdag nyid gcod byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-12: nyes smra gang dag smras pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-13: mi dag skyes ma thag tu ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-14: kha nas sta re lta bu 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-15: gang dag rdzun tshig smra ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-16: de ni don med kun gyis brtags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-17: ngan song kun gyis rgyud yin zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-18: de ni mun nag skye gnas gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-19: bden pas dman pa'i mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-20: mkhas pa kun gyis rnam par spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-22: pha rol ngan song rnams su 'tshed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-23: dpa' bo shin tu rdzun mi smra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-24: nyon mongs rdzun tshig smra ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-25: kha nas rul pa'i dri 'byung la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-26: phyi nas lus kyis gdungs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-27: bden pa rin chen rnam spangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-28: de la chos ni med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-29: chos ni rnam par spangs pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-30: sdug bsngal mtha' med gnas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-31: chos rnams kun gyi sgron yin zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-32: mkhas rnams rin chen lta bur dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-33: mtho ris lam gyi dam pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-34: bden pa yin zhes rims bral gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:321b-35: bden pa yis ni mtho ris dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-0: @322a *// bden par smra ba thar par 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-1: bden pas dman pa'i mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-2: khyi dang 'dra bar rab tu bsgrags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-3: gang la bden pa med pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-4: tha shal nang na de tha shal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-5: bden pa chos kyi them skas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-6: snang ba'i 'byung khungs chen po yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-7: thar pa'i chos kyi lam yin zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-8: nor gyi nang na nor mchog la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-9: skyabs kyi nang na skyabs mchog ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-10: bden pa yin zhes mkhas pas bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-11: snang ba'i nang na snang ba mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-12: mig gi nang na'ang mig dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-13: nor rdzas med la nor rdzas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-14: rgyan gyi nang na'ang rgyan bzang yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-15: bden pa mi zad gter yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-16: rgyal po kun gyis dbrog mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-17: mi dag gang gis smra ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-19: ji ltar bden pas skyes bu dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-21: sna tshogs rgyan gyis skyes bu dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-22: brgyan pa de ltar mdzes pa min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-23: ji ltar 'jig rten pha rol tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-24: pha med ma med don med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-25: bshes med gnyen med skyabs med pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-26: de ltar rtag tu bden pa smros //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-27: mi yi nang na mi mchog la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-28: dug gi nang na dug mchog ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-29: ngan 'gro rnams kyi them skas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-30: rdzun pa yin zhes yongs su bsgrags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-31: reg na dug dang me 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-32: rdzun pa rnam par spangs par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-33: rdzun gyis bsregs pa'i mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-34: bsregs pa yin zhes mngon par brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322a-35: de ltar mngon par 'bad kun gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-0: mi @322b dag rdzun ni ma smra zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-1: 'jigs la sogs pa nyon mongs kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-2: rdzun las byung zhes yongs su brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-3: de ltar dge slong de rdzun gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i de kho na lkog tu gyur pa mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-4: bden pa'i yon tan gyi de kho na mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-6: mi dge ba'i de kho na mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-7: sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod chen po'i 'khor la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-8: des sems can dmyal ba sgra 'byin shin tu sgra 'byin zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-9: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-11: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-12: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-13: chang 'thung ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-14: rdzun smra ba ni rtsod pa'i tshe rang gi gnyen 'dab kyi phyir ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-16: phyogs su gyur pas smras la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-17: de smras nas kyang 'chags par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-18: skyon du mi 'dzin la kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-19: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba sgra 'byin shin tu sgra 'byin du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-20: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-22: de'i lce gang gis rdzun smras pa de la chad pas gcod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-23: gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis spu gris mid pa dral nas der 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:322b-24: phyung nas pa tshva'i chu rab tu tsha bas chag chag 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-0: nang na yod pa'i lce la rul ba'i dri rab tu @323a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-1: 'byung zhing srog chags mar ko ta ka'i kha rab tu 'bar bas kyang lce de la za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-2: lus kyi tshor ba'ang gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i bshad pa de thams cad kyi mtha' dag snga ma bzhin du ji srid du de'i rdzun gyi las de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du sems can dmyal ba de la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-3: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-4: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-5: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na de smyon par 'gyur zhing dbul bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-6: sems rnam par g-yengs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-8: dbang po ma tshang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-9: skye bo kun gyis smad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-10: don thams cad med pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-12: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen po'i 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-13: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas ji ltar sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen po'i 'khor tshor ba dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba yod pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-14: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323a-15: 'di ltar gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-0: ma byin @323b par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-1: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-2: chang 'thung ba byas pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-3: rdzun smra ba ni 'dod chags kyi rgyu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-4: zhe sdang gi rgyu mi bzad pas smras shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-5: gzhan la'ang 'di ltar 'di ni bdag cag gi mdza' ba mchog tu sdug pa bdag cag la byams pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-6: phyogs gzung bar bya yi bden par ma smra zhig ces bsgo ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-7: de gzengs bstod cing rab tu bkod de btsud na de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba tshor ba dpag tu med par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-8: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-9: gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i bshad pa de mtha' dag sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen por 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-10: gang las kyi rgyu lci ba'i phyir gnod pa'ang lci ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-11: gnod pa lci ba nyid kyis las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang dag par ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-12: de ltar 'di ni dus mtha' med pa nas 'jigs pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-13: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zo chun gyi rgyun ltar 'khor ba'i 'khor lor rab tu 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-14: sdig pa gzhan thams cad kyi gnod pa gzhan du 'jug pa na brdzun du smra ba ni ches sdig po che yin no zhes brjod do; ;brdzun du smra ba rdzogs pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rton pa gcod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:323b-15: rgyu ji lta ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu'ang de lta de ltar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-0: rgyu 'dis sems can dmyal ba tshor ba @324a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-1: dpag tu med par tshor ba 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag brjod pa mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-2: der gnod pa ni sems can dmyal ba pa gzhan thams cad dang yang mtshungs pa med de; sems can dmyal ba pa sdig po che'i tshor ba 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-4: srin bus bslad pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-8: re thag chad pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-9: so so'i mun nag gi sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-10: phan tshun phog pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-15: dri mi 'dod pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-16: tshe rabs dran pa'i dgra bgegs kyi mtshon chas rab tu gcod pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-17: ba tshva'i chu bo las shin tu sgrol ba'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-18: phur bu rnams kyis 'debs pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-19: rmog thag mes bsregs pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-20: rtsva dar ba ltar gcod cing rdo rjes reg pa'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-22: tshal bsregs pa'i me 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshor ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-23: de la sogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang mthun pa'i tshor ba ji srid du rdzun smra ba nyes par spyad pa bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du g-yang sa chen po lta bu'i rdzun gyi 'bras bu sems can dmyal bar tshor ba dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324a-24: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324b-0: thar nas kyang gal te lan @324b grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324b-1: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324b-2: de rdzun smra ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de rtag tu nad kyis mngon par 'debs shing sker bgegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324b-3: kha nad la sogs pa 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324b-6: sbyin bdag la sman slong ba na de yid mi ches par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324b-7: 'di yang dag log pa smra'o snyam nas mi thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324b-8: de ni nad mi bzad pas thebs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:324b-10: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen po'i 'khor la brtags na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:329b-11: gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:329b-12: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:329b-13: 'dod bas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:329b-14: chang 'thung ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:329b-15: rdzun smra ba'ang de dbye ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:329b-17: pha rol las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir g-yo sgyu smra ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:329b-19: bdag ni rtag tu bden par smra ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-0: bdag bden pa smra'o zhes 'jig rten kun dad pa @330a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-2: de de'i rdzun sna tshogs smras pa gang gis yul 'khor 'joms par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-3: skyes bu dam pa gsod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-4: dgra gzhan gyi nor rdzas 'phrog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-5: sngon bden pa smra'o zhes 'jig rten yid ches pa thob par byas shing dad pa bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-6: de nas rdzun smra ba ni de cha lugs bzang por bsgyur cing rkun ma rdzun smra ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-7: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba gzhan du 'gyur bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-8: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-10: rgyang ring po nas de'i ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-14: sdug pa'i mi de dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-15: sems can dmyal ba des mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-16: de dag gi kha nas tshig snyan pa dag thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-17: de dag gi drung du mgon 'dod pa; skyabs 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-19: dpung gnyen tshol bas rgyug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-20: de ji lta ji ltar de dag gi drung du rgyug pa de lta de ltar ma dag me mtsho lta bu'i nang du nub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-21: ji ltar rdo chur bor ba bzhin du nub po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-22: de nas 'byung la yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-23: nying lag thams cad shin tu bsregs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-24: tshor bas nyam thag nas du skad 'don pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-28: bsten grogs dag mthong ba dang yang rgyug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-29: de nas yang las kyis byas pa'i gshin rje'i mi sog le thogs pa dag lam nas byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330a-30: de gshin rje'i mi de dag gis bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-0: @330b bzung nas shing bzhin du dbus gshog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-1: de res 'ga' de las thar na pags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-2: rus pa tsam lus pa yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-3: nyid lag thams cad phug cing dral ba'i lus rma mtshan can dag gar thar thar du 'bros so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-4: de bros na'ang gshin rje'i mi gzhan dag gis bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-5: bzung nas las las byung ba'i zo chun rgyud ma'i nang rdos bkang ba der de bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-6: de nas zo chun rgyud mo rab tu 'bar ba 'khor lo ltar bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-7: der rdzun smra ba de phye bzhin du 'thag cing phye mar rlog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-8: de zo chun rgyud mo de las byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-12: snying du sdug pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-16: de dag gi drung du brgyugs rjes su brgyugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-17: las kyis byas pa'i lam du phur bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-21: de 'gram so'i bar du bcug nas phur bu rno zhing rab tu 'bar ba rnams kyis gzer nas 'dren to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-22: de sems pa dang ldan nas rgyug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-24: byin pa'ang gcod cing 'thub la sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-26: nying lag thams cad phug cing dral la lus bsregs shing lus nyams la rnam par nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:330b-30: lus kyi lhag ma lus pa dag shin tu rgyug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-1: kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i 'bras bus rgyu dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-2: 'di ltar de bden par smra bar bsgrubs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-3: de nas rdzun smra zhing g-yo thabs smra la shur lung smra ba dag de ltar de ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-6: snying du sdug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-7: rdzun smra ba de 'di ltar tshor ba rtsub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-10: mtha' yas pa dag ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du lo 'bum phrag du mar sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-14: de sems can dmyal ba de dag las thar par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-15: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-16: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-17: las de dang rgyu mthun par de dbul zhing nad bu can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-20: skye bo thams cad la yid mi ches shing zhe 'gras pa dang mi mthun par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-21: de'i bsam pa thams cad mi 'grub cing log par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-22: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331a-23: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba kun dga' la re ba med pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-0: der sems can @331b dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-1: gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-2: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-3: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-4: chang 'thung ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-5: rdzun smra ba ni rnam pa 'di dag smra ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-11: bkres pa dag la nor rdzas sbyin par khas blangs pa las ma byin pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-16: khyim sbyin par khas blangs pa las ma byin pa de ni rgyu des re ba med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-17: de lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba kun dga' la re ba med pa zhes bya bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-18: der gnod pa'i rnam pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-19: gang gis bza' ba sbyin par khas blangs pa las ma byin pa de ni sems can dmyal bar bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-21: rgyan sna tshogs kyis klubs pa dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-22: sems can dmyal ba pa ltogs pas nyen pa de dag rgyang ring po na bza' ba nyams dga' zhing smon pa'i bza' ba de dag mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:331b-23: bza' ba de dag gi phyogs su rgyug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-0: sbas gang zhing lam du sog le rab tu 'bar bas gsheg pa na phyogs der rgyug pa ni @332a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-1: snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-2: nam zas de thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-3: de dag lcags kyi thu lum rab tu 'bar ba lta bur gyur cing dri nga la mdog mi sdug pa las kyis byas pa tshul log par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-4: de nye bar bltas pa dang mig gi 'bras bu ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-5: gang gi tshe bsnams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-6: dri des sna tshig nas byid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-8: nying lag thams cad rab tu tshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-9: de'i lus srin bu me khyer lta bur byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-10: ro bro ba lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa lta bus lce sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-11: de bsregs nas yang mid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-17: long ka nas ro smad kyi bar du bsregs nas 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-18: yang gang gis mal cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-19: khyim sbyin par khas blangs pa las rdzun smras pa de grang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-20: tsha bas gdungs shing re ba med par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-21: sems can dmyal ba de gzhi zangs kyi glegs ma rab tu bzhus par bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-23: nying lag thams cad rnam par 'ju zhing bsreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-24: des khyim sbyin par byas pa las ma byin pa de'ang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-25: khyim gyi rdzun smra ba de lcags kyi khyim dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-26: nye bar dga' ba tshad dpag tshad lnga bcu par lcags khu rab tu bskol ba'i nang du 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332a-28: steng nas 'og tu bskol ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-0: 'og nas 'og tu 'byung bar @332b bskol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-1: rab tu chos te yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-2: nying lag thams cad rnam par zhigs shing sha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-6: tshigs lhag ma lus pa thams cad kyang rnam par zhigs nas rab tu bskol bas gang ba'i rdzam mun pa mun nag de gnyis kyi nang du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-7: gdungs shing rnam par khro la smre sngags 'den to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-8: gang rdza ma gong ma der btsos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-9: de'i 'og tu lcags kyi rdza ma 'og ma der rab tu 'tshed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-10: 'di ltar 'og tu 'byung zhing de dag gi shugs kyis gcig la gcig phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-12: gal te stong du gyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-14: sems can dmyal ba pa gzhan dag la phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-15: ji srid du rdzun smra ba de'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas ba de srid du las kyi zhags pas bcings pa dag yang lan 'bum snyed du rnam par zhigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-16: de de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-17: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-18: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-19: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de bran gyi rigs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-20: de dang mthun par de nyid du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:332b-21: gang khas blangs pa las brdzun du smras pa de ni de dang mthun par las gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-0: de la 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas gnod pa gang zhugs pa @333a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-1: thog ma med pa nas dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-2: mi dge ba'i las kyis byas pa'i rgyud kyi 'khor ba'i mtha' kun tu zhugs pa las kyi rgyud kyis dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod la sred pa gang byung ba'i gnod pa des gzhan dag gi bran du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-6: nad kyi rkyen gsos sman med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-7: jo bo des rtag tu spyo bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-9: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-10: sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-11: gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-12: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-13: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-14: chang 'thung ba ni des snga ma bzhin du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-15: rdzun smra pa ni bzo bo tshogs shing 'dus pa'i nang du song nas rgyags pa bdo ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-17: phan tshun mi mthun pas gang du tshogs shing 'du pa'i khrims bcas te chad pas bcad par bya ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-18: de nyes pa med pa bzhin du bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-19: gzhan bslus nas chad pas gcod par byed cing de'ang goms par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333a-20: lan mang du byed la las kyi mjug bsags pa de ni lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba phan tshun gnod pa 'jug par skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-0: gang gi tshe tshogs shing 'dus pa de dag gi nang du song nas gnod pa byas @333b pa'i rgyu de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-1: rkyen des lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba phan tshun gnod pa 'jug par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-6: du 'bod la sogs par bshad pa snga ma bzhin du 'byung ba'i steng du bye brag tu 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-8: las byas pa'i sems can dmyal ba der seng ge mche ba rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-9: de sems can dmyal ba pa rdzun smra ba de la sngon smras pa'i tshor ba dang ldan pas yang nas yang du za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-10: de 'gram pa phye ba dang 'tsho bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-11: btsums pa dang yang lus thams cad za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-13: de sos pa dang za bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-14: de'i las kyis byas pa'i seng ge'i so gtams pa'i bar du chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-15: de'i kha mdag me rab tu 'bar bas gang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-16: de sos ni za la mes ni gcig car bsreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-17: de ltar rdzun zer ba de srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du lo 'bum phrag du mar gnod pa dpe med pa rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-18: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-19: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-20: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:333b-21: las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de sprul lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-2: dom gyis gsod par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-4: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-5: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-6: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-7: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-10: de skyes pa'i rigs gcig pa'i spun gyi nor gyi phyir ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-12: mes po gcig pa'i spun de gnyis nor gyi phyir rtsod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-15: de dang rigs gcig pa'i ched du g-yo thabs kyi blo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-16: brgyad pa'i blos rdzun mngon du zer zhing shes par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-17: rig par byas la las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-19: nyer bsdogs dang ldan par gyur na de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba phan tshun gnod pa 'jug par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-20: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-21: gang yang sos la sogs pa'i snga ma bzhin du 'byung ba'i steng du khyad par du 'byung ba ni las byas pas shan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334a-22: gang rang gi gnyen 'od kha de la bslus shing rdzun byas pas sha de bcad cing bcad cing bdag gi kha der 'jug ste sems can dmyal ba pa la de zar 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-0: sems can dmyal ba pa nyes @334b par byas pa'i las des rang gi sha de'ang lcags ltar rab tu 'bar zhing ro bro ba med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-1: de la gnod pa gnyis 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-2: shan pa byas pas lus la tshor ba 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-3: bkres shing skom pa byas pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-5: de ltar byung ba'i srin bu dag skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-6: gang rus pa gzhan dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-8: de ltar nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du lo 'bum phrag du mar sems can dmyal ba phan tshun gnod pa 'jug par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-9: de sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-10: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-11: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-12: mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de nam yang pha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-13: mes po'i nor 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-14: yid ches pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur zhing dbul por 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-16: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:334b-17: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba nags tshal me mched pa'i rgyud lta bu zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-0: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des brtags @335a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-1: na; gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-2: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-3: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-5: sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba blud pas 'gyur ro; ;rdzun smra bar 'gyur ba ni gyad tshogs shing 'du ba'i nang du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-6: nyes pa byas nas chad pas 'jigs pa'i phyir bdag gis nyes pa ma byas zhes smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-7: de lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba nags tshal mes mched pa'i rgyud lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-8: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-10: sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i gnod pa bsdus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-11: khyad par du 'byung ba ni lcags kyi glegs ma rab tu 'bar bas 'khrigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-13: sha 'dam lta bur gyur cing shing ljon pa keng shu ka ltar mtshon 'bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-14: de'i tshe de'i lus de la lcags kyi glegs ma de 'byar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-15: gang gi tshe du skad 'don na de'i sha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-17: khrag lcags kyi glegs ma de la 'khris pa gshin rje'i mi dag gi shugs kyis de'i lus las 'chu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-18: de sems can dmyal ba de las thar pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335a-21: kun nas gtses pa gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis 'jigs shing skrag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-0: lus shig shig por gyur pa @335b des ba tshva'i chu bo gnod skyes zhes bya ba mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-2: de ltar gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis 'jigs pa'i zil gyis gnon pa de dag zhugs ma thag tu yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-4: lus chu rgyus mang pos brgyus shing sbrel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-6: rus pa kun rnam par nyams shing lus kyi sha snyil ba'i lus de mar sar gyi gong bu bzhin rab tu 'ju'ang de'i nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mthus de 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-7: ji ltar 'od ma'i lo mas khengs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-8: bar med pa'i nags tshal mes mched pa'i rgyud kun nas rtag tu 'bar bar byas pas gang la mes ma mched pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-9: gang du sems can mi sreg pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-10: mi 'tshed pa med pa de ltar sems can dmyal ba nags tshal mes mched pa'i rgyud lta bu la khab kyi bu ga tsam gyi phyogs kyang mi dmigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-11: gang du sems can dmyal ba mgon 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-12: skyabs 'dod pa dag mi sreg pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-16: de dag ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du sdug bsngal de dag las re zhig thar bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-17: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te; thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:335b-18: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-1: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de'i kha nas tshig 'khums pa 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-2: smra mi nus shing 'phral skad kyang smra bar mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-3: legs par sbyar te smra ba lta zhig nus par lta ga la 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-5: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-6: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba tshor ba ring ba zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-7: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-8: mi dge ba srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-9: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-10: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-11: chang 'thung ba byas shing bsags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-12: rdzun smra ba'ang rnam pa 'di dag smras par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-13: sngar dran bzhin du cung zad khas blangs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-14: dge 'dun la dngos po cung zad khas blangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-15: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-16: chos la gsal bar khas blangs la des phyis mi bzod pa byung nas bdag gis khas blangs pa med do zhes smra la dge 'dun la'ang de'i khas blangs pa gang yin pa des gnod par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-17: de'i brdzun du smra ba de byas shing bsags la 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bus sems can dmyal ba tshor ba ring ba zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336a-18: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-0: sems @336b can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs par bshad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du 'byung ba'i steng du khyad par 'byung ba ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-2: gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis khab kyi rtse mo rab tu ring ba rno zhing phra la rab tu 'bar bdag gis 'bigs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-3: de tshor bas nyam thag cing du skad 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-6: dong pa'i nang mdas bkang ba de ltar de'i kha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-7: lce la khab de dag nyid kyis rtag tu 'gengs te de tshor bas nyam thag par gyur kyang du skad 'don pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-8: smre sngags 'don par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-9: rang gi sems la rdzun smra bas bslang zhing bdag gzhan slu bar byed pa rtag tu tshor ba gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-10: sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba las thar nas kyang yan lag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-11: nying lag thams cad ba spu'i khung bu 'dra zhing lus thams cad nyams pa dag der gar bab bab tu tshor ba ring bas nyam thag par ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-12: de ji lta ji ltar ltung ba de lta de ltar khab shin tu rno bas de'i lus la 'dzugs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-13: de khab de dag gis yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-14: yang du nyam thag par byed cing tshos shin tu sgra 'byin par byed la kha bkab pas zil gyis non pa ni 'khun zhing nang du 'khun par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:336b-15: gal te khab de dag res 'ga' kha nas byung na de du skad 'byin par nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-0: gzhan du na kha bkag pas zil gyis non pa dag 'khun par byed @337a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-1: do; ;lcags kyis gzhi rab tu 'bar ba dag la gred cing 'gre ldog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-2: rab tu 'bying zhing rab tu 'jug la g-yo bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-3: gshin rje'i mis nyam thag pa sta re dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-7: mtshon chas lus thams cad shig shig por byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-8: de ltar rdzun smras pa de ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du lo 'bum phrag bye ba du mar tshor ba de dag myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-9: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-10: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-11: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-12: mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de dbul zhing tshig yid mi ches par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-14: gang la don bcol ba'i de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-15: de khas len pa tsam du'ang mi btub cing de shin tu dbul bar byas pas yid re ba med par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-17: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-18: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-19: sems can dmyal ba tshor ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-20: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337a-21: gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-0: ma byin par len @337b pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-1: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-3: rdzun smra bar 'gyur ba ni 'di ltar tshong pa rgya mtshor zhugs pa dag gis mnyan pa gdos pa 'dzin pa la chom rkun pa rnam kyis snying brkam bcug gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-4: nor rdzas kyis dbyen byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-5: chom rkun pa de dag nyid kyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-6: tshong pa de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis dbyen byas pas tshong pa de dag la gdos 'dzin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-7: 'di ltar khyed cag rin po che'i gling du bkri'o zhes smras la de dag la de ltar dam bcas nas rdzun byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-8: thang gi gling la khrid pa las der gal te ba dan sngon po mthong bzhin du chom rkun pa 'ong ngo zhes tshong pa de dag la ma sbran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-9: de dag kyang gdos pa 'dzin pa bden pa smra ba de bdag cag la slu ba mi byed do zhes yid brtan cing 'dug 'dug pa las gdos pa 'dzin pa des chom rkun pa dag tshong pa de dag gi nor med par byed du 'jug cing bdag kyang nor rdzas de 'phrog par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-10: rdzun smras pa de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba tshor ba mtha' yas par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-11: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:337b-13: sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs par sngar bshad pa bzhin de dag thams cad der 'byung ba'i steng du khyad par du 'byung ba ni sems can dmyal ba pa der skyes pa de dag gi mig phra skam 'dren pa rab tu 'bar ba dag gis 'dren to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-1: pa dag gis drangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-2: de nas yang shin tu gzhon sha can sdug par skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-3: gnod pa ches mang ba dag gis de 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-4: de dag gi rna ba'ang ro nye rab tu bskol bas bkang la gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-5: nying lag thams cad spu gri dag gis 'jog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-6: srin bu t'a la la lva la ka zhes bya bas de'i gnye ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-7: rgyu ma'i nang du zhugs nas rab tu za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-8: phyi rol tu ni mun pa kun nas shin tu gnag pa der 'jug la phyi nang de dag thams cad du'ang las kyis byas pa'i chu srin rab tu 'bar ba dag 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-9: de dag gis za bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-12: so rdo rje ltar rno zhing 'bar ba dag gis yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-13: nying lag thams cad 'byed par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-14: phye mar rlog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-15: bye ma chang pa nas gtor ba bzhin byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-16: de so'i bar de nas thar nas chu srin rab tu 'bar ba de dag gi lto'i nang du 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-17: de ltar de dag chu srin gyi lto der lo 'bum phrag du mar lo bye ba phrag du mar chu srin de dag gi lto rab tu 'bar bar dbugs med pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-18: dbugs chung bar sreg cing 'tshed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-19: rdzun smras pa dag tshor ba dag pa tsha ba rtsub pa myong zhing las kyi rgyu rdzun smra ba rang gi lces kun nas bslang bas sreg la phyis sems can dmyal ba pa'i mes kun tu sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338a-20: 'di ltar chu srin de dag gis yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-0: nying lag thams cad dkris nas lus phye mar byas pa kha nas @338b 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-1: de nas yang phyi rol du me mdag sngon pos sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-2: bsreg pa na gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-3: sems can dmyal ba'i rgyur gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-4: rdzun du smra ba ston pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-5: sngon chad rgyu ni bsten byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-6: don med smre sngags yongs su 'don //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-7: me yi nang na me mchog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-8: rgya mtsho dag kyang sreg byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-9: gang dag rdzun smra shing dang rdo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-10: rang bzhin 'dra ba smos ci dgos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-11: mi gang bden pa spangs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-12: brdzun du smra ba sgrub byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-13: de ni rin chen spangs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-14: sdig pa'i bdag nyid rdo 'dra sgrub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-15: bdag la sdug par mi byed gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-16: de ni sems can dmyal la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-17: rdzun gyis rang lus me 'byung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-18: blo dang mi ldan de bsten to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-19: bden tshig legs par rnyed yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-20: lus can kun gyi rgyan yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-21: bden pa spangs nas rdzun smra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-22: blo med ci phyir chags par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-23: bden pa yon tan bdag nyid mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-24: rdzun smra dran pa skyon yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-25: rmongs pa yon tan btang nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-26: ci phyir skyon la yongs su rgyug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-27: sems can dmyal bar rtag 'gro ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-28: skyon gyi 'bras bu nyes pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-29: khyed cag yon tan de dang 'gras //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-30: mi bzad dmyal bar kun tu gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-31: sdug bsngal kun gyi sa bon ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-32: brdzun du smra bar rab tu grags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-33: de bzhin bde ba bden yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-34: de bas su zhig brdzun du smra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-35: bden par smra ba'i mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-36: lus can kun gyi dga' ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-37: rdzun smra mi dang 'gras pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:338b-38: de bas su zhig brdzun du smra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-2: lha ltar rtag tu dga' ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-3: dmyal bar de ltar rmongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-4: de bzhin sems kyis brdzun du smra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-5: legs pa'i lam ni ma byas la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-6: sdig pa du ma byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-7: sdug bsngal mtha' yas skyes pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-8: ci zhig sdig pas yongs su gdung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-9: dge ba'i 'bras bu legs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-10: sdig pas nyon mongs 'tshed par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-11: blo ldan mi yis sdig byas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-12: dge ba rjes su sten par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-13: dge ba'i nang na bden pa mchog //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-14: skyon gyi nang na de bzhin rdzun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-15: skyon spangs yon tan tshol byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-16: mi yi nang na mi mchog yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-23: sdug bsngal kun mtha' rdzun yin na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-24: mi yis ci phyir spang mi bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-25: bden pa don gyis 'thob min te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-26: nyon mongs pas kyang 'thob med na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-27: ci phyir bden pa yongs spangs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-28: rdzun smra ba la dga' bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-29: yul gzhan dag nas bden mi 'ongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-30: de ni gzhan du btsal ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-31: chu la stegs btags stegs min te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-32: bden pa stegs kun mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-33: sgron ma'i nang na sgron ma mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-34: bden pa yin zhes sangs rgyas gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-35: sman gyi nang na sman mchog ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339a-36: de yis rtag tu sdug bsngal sel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-0: nged kyis @339b sdig pa bzung ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-1: khyed cag rmongs pa'i sems kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-2: ngan pa khyed kyis byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-3: khyed cag yongs su gdungs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-4: sems can dmyal bar skyes pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-5: sdig pa byang bas rnam par 'grol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-6: kun tu du skad 'don pa'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-7: nam yang thar bar ga la 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-8: rang gi las kyis rnam bslus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-9: rmongs pa khyed cag ci zhig du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-10: byis pa rang gi sems kyis bslus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-11: blo med khyed cag du skad 'don //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-12: de ltar sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma de dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-13: sems can dmyal ba ba de dag la so sor rjes su bstan nas ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de sred du gnod pa mi bzad pa'i rnam pa brgya phrag du ma ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-14: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-15: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-16: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-17: las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu de rtag tu gzhan du zhugs nas slu bar byed cing nor rdzas thams cad kyang 'phrog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-18: de'i bya ba gzhan gang yin pa dag kyang tshogs chen por 'gyur zhing de'i tshig kyang 'jig rten pa yid ches par mi 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-20: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:339b-21: sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-0: des thos pa las byung ba'i @340a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-1: shes pas sems can dmyal ba khva mchu rdo rje lta bu zhas bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-2: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-3: gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-4: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-5: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-7: rdzun du smra ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas pas 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-8: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba khva mchu rdo rje lta bu'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-9: der gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa gnod pa de dag thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-10: rdzun ni gang zhig dge 'dun gyi 'khor gyi nang du song nas nad kyi rkyen gyis gsos sman sbyar bar khas blangs pa las ma byin na de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba khva mchu rdo rje lta bu'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-11: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-12: 'das pa'i dus su las byas pa de dag khva mchu rdo rje lta bus sha bcad cing bcad cing za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-13: gang gi tshe sha bcad par gyur pa'i skad cig de nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-14: gnas de nyid du'ang ches shin tu gzhon sha can padma ltar 'jam pa skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-15: de ci nas kyang tshor ba ches drag par bya ba'i phyir de nyid phyung zhing btogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340a-16: de nas yang ches shin tu gzhon sha can sar pa gzhan dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-0: de ltar @340b sems can dmyal ba pa de dag lo 'bum phrag du mar khva'i mchu rdo rje lta bus za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-2: bye ma'i nang nas lcags rab tu 'bar ba 'byung la de bye ma de dag la rkang pas 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-3: de ji ltar thal ba'ang mi mngon pa de ltar des sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-4: de nas langs pa dang yang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-5: gang gis rdzun de smras shing sdig pa'i rjes su smras pa rdzun smra bas brdzun zer ba smras pa de yang 'byung zhing 'byung zhing bdag nyid kyi lce'ang bdag nyid za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-7: bdud rtsi dang ni dug nyid dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-8: mi rnams kyi ni lce la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-9: bden pa smra ba bdud rtsi yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-10: rdzun gyi tshig ni dug dang 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-11: gang zhig bdud rtsi mngon 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-12: de ni rtag tu bden la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-13: gang zhig dug la mngon dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-14: de ni rdzun gyi tshig la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-15: dug gis gnod par nges med kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-16: rdzun du smra bas nges par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-17: gang zhig rdzun ni mngon smra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-19: rdzun gyis bdag la mi phan na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-20: gzhan la phan par ga la 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-21: bdag dang gzhan gang sdug bsngal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-22: de ni mi yis ci phyir bsten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-23: de ltar rdzun la bsten pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-25: mtshon dang me dang ngam grog las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-26: mi yi sdug bsngal de 'dra med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-27: lus gcig 'phrog pa mthong ba ni; ;'chi ba dug las 'byung 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-28: tshe rabs snga phyi stong dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-29: rdzun gyi tshig gis chud gzon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-30: btsun pa'i rigs la mthor byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:340b-31: dma' ba'i rigs la rgyan du byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-2: bden pa yin zhes mngon par brtags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-3: sems can rnams kyi rang gi las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-4: sred pas khyer bar gyur pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-5: gzings 'dra bden smra mchog yin zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-6: bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-7: 'jig rten thog ma tha ma med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-8: srid pa'i zhags pa'i dbang du song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-9: 'di ltar skyabs gzhan bden pa las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-10: med ces chos la mkhas pas rig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-11: gcer bu mtshon gyis gcod pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-12: bden pas rtag tu nyon mongs gcod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-13: mtshon gyis btab pas ngu bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-14: bden pas nam yang ngu ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-15: 'jig rten gnyis la phan byed pa; ;bden pa mi zad gter zhes bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-16: chos so cog gi khrims yin zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-17: nor gyi gzhi yi mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-18: bdun pa'i yon tan rab bsgrubs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-20: blo ldan ngan g-yo rnams spongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-21: de nyid mthong bas spangs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-22: bden pa spangs pa'i mi dag khva mchu rdo rje lta bus ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du lo 'bum phrag du mar 'tshed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-23: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-24: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341a-25: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-0: las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu tsha ba sems can dmyal @341b bar 'gro ba bden pa de dang mi mthun par gyur pa rdzun smras pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-2: rtsod pa mang zhing rtag tu gzhan rgyal bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-3: tshig gis 'jig rten pas yid mi ches par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-5: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-6: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba khrag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-7: rkang za ba zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-8: sems can dmyal ba khrag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-9: rkang za ba der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-10: des thos pa las byung ba'i she pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-11: gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-12: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-13: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-15: rdzun smra ba byas shing bsags pas 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-19: rje dpon du gyur pas dpya thang las lhag par phab la 'di ltar ngas lhag par phab pa med do zhes smra zhing dpya 'bebs na de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba khrag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-20: zhag za bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-21: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-23: gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-24: thig nag la sogs par 'byung ba rnams 'byung ba'i steng du khyad par du 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-26: shing rab tu 'bar ba lo ma spu gri lta bu yod par rdzun smra ba de gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis lcags kyi thag pa rab tu 'bar bdag gis bcings nas kha spub tu dbyangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:341b-27: kha spu ba tu dbyangs pa de'i rkang pa dag la mchu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-1: ltar rno ba dag gis za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-2: kha spub tu dbyangs pa de dag khrag 'byung ba gang yin pa de la za ba des gnas par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-3: tshor ba thams cad kyi nang nas kha zas kyi tshor ba mi bzad par bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-4: de rang gi khrag la 'thung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-5: de tshor ba gnyis dag gis yongs su gnod de me'i tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-9: ji ltar bkres shing skom pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-10: las kyis shin tu g-yengs pas gdungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-11: de ltar sreg pas sreg min zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-12: rlung drag po yis khyer mi byed; ;de ltar lo brgya stong phrag du mar de rang gi khrag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-14: 'di ltar ro smad me mchog tu tsha bas bsregs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-15: de ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-16: sems can dmyal ba der sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-17: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-18: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-19: dud 'gro dag tu ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-20: mi rnam dang skal pa mnyam pa mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-21: las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de dbul bar 'gyur zhig gang yid mi ches pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342a-22: rtag tu de'i sna nas khrag 'dzag cing so shing 'cha' ba na khrag 'byung bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-0: dge @342b slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-1: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba me lce bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-2: der sems can dmyal ba dag las gang gi skye bar 'gyur snyam nas de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-3: gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-4: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-5: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-7: rdzun smra ba ni gnyis shig rtsod pa na rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-9: gzhan yid ches pa'i gnas su bya bas nor blangs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-12: zhe sdang gis phyogs bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-13: zhal ce de yon por bcad na lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba me lce bcu gcig pa der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-15: brdzun smra ba de la gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i tshor ba gnod pa 'di dag thams cad bcu 'gyur du 'byung ba'i steng du khyad par du 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-17: rang gi lus las phyogs bcur me lce'i phung po bcu gcig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-18: rdzun smra ba'i lce'i kha las bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:342b-20: zhal ce yon por gcod pa ni skad cig skad cig la skye zhing sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:343a-0: sreg pa na tshor ba'i rnam pa de @343a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:343a-2: gang me lce'i phung po de dag ni bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:343a-3: las kyis byas pa'i tshor ba de dag ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du 'di ltar de sems can dmyal ba me lce bcu gcig par lo 'bum phrag du mar sreg go /
