K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-0: yang na stong gcig gi steng du gcig phung por byas pa ni ji ltar skra'i rtse mo la skabs med pa de ltar gcig gi steng @404a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-1: du gcig bsdus nas sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-2: de ltar de dag gcig gi steng du gcig bcer bas gnod pa na ji ltar de dag gcig gi steng du gcig shin tu thags dam par bcer ba'i bar mi mngon pa de ltar bsdu bar byas nas gshin rje'i mi rnams tho ba thogs te kun tu 'tshog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-3: de ltar ji srid du sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du lo 'bum phrag du mar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-4: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-5: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus tshe rabs dgu brgyar yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-6: dud 'gro dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-7: de las thar nas gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-8: de dbul zhing nad bu can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-10: yul ngan par chu 'gram gyi mi kla klor skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-11: der yang thams cad kyi tha mar 'gyur zhing tshe thung bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-13: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha ba'i 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404a-14: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba shing skam bsdus pa lta bu zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-0: der @404b sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-1: gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-2: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-3: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-6: log par lta ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-7: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa byin pa'i chung ma nyes pa med par 'phrog pa ni de gsod pa'i sar khrid cing bsad du dogs pa ni gang gis srog phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-8: mi de btang ba las des kyang drin med par byas nas de'i chung ma 'phrog par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-9: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba shing skam bsdus pa lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-10: der skyes nas gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i gnod pa bsdus pa de dag thams cad 'byung ba'i steng du khyad par du 'byung ba ni 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba de chu bo sgra chen zhes bya ba de'i nang du 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-11: des sems can dmyal ba pa brgya stong du ma dag kyang 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-12: sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gi nang du 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:404b-13: de de ltar de dag gi nang du zhugs shing shugs drag pos bdas pa rnams kyi 'og tu bcug nas de ji ltar skra'i rtse mo tsam yang mi omngon pa de ltar de dag gis steng nas steng du 'dus nas gnod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-0: de'i steng na sems can dmyal ba pa rnams @405a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-2: 'og tu ni zha nye rab tu bskol bas 'tshed cing sreg la gsod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-3: chos [?] nges 'debs shing rtag tu sdug bsngal bas nyam thag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-4: de ltar sdug bsngal bas nyam thag pa phyir zhing las kyis byas pa'i chu srin dag nye bar 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-5: gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa de yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-6: nying lag thams cad za zhing 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-7: de shing skam ltar bsdus pa'i sdug bsngal myong ba na ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du yun ring por las kyis byas pa'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-8: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-9: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus tshe rabs lnga brgyar yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-10: dud 'gro dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-11: de de las thar nas kyang gal te mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-12: de bud med kun gyi yid chags par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-13: de ji ltar bu'i de ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-15: ming po'i ngo bo lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-16: tshe rabs lnga brgyar pho mtshan dang bral bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405a-17: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-0: des 'khor bcu drug pa dag las bcu @405b bdun pa ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-1: sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu che ba ni 'khor bcu drug dag gis yongs su bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-2: sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i mi bzad pa chen po ni de dag yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-4: mtha' ni de dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-5: de rang gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i sa la spyod pa'i mi dag 'tshed cing sreg ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-6: 'di ltar gzhan gyis byas pa 'thob pa ma yin pa las dang mthun par gnod pa myong ngo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-7: de rang gis byas pa chud za bar mi 'gyur la gzhan gyis byas pa dang phrad pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-8: byas pa chud za bar mi 'gyur zhing rang gis byas pa dang mthun par 'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-9: rang gis byas pa'i skye gnas las skyes pa'i sems can dag ni rang gi las la spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-11: sdig pa'i las su 'gyur ba de'i las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-12: de ltar dge slong de sems can dmyal ba rnams la sems can dmyal bar gtogs pa'i las rjes su sems pa srid pa mngon par grub pa la cung zad kyang bde ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-13: rtag pa med la ther zug pa med cing bdag dang bcas pa ma yin par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-14: 'khor ba thams cad mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-18: de de ltar mthong ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:405b-20: 'dod pa kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-2: 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-3: 'dod pa'i gzhi dag la rab tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-4: de phyir zhing yang 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs dag la ches shin tu 'jigs par yang 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-7: yid kyi g-yo ba shin tu bsdams pa de la bdud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-8: bdud kyi 'khor gyis rab tu mi tshugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-9: de lta de ltar goms par byed pa de 'khor ba'i tshe rabs mang po'i rgyud zhigs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-13: de nas yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i dge slong 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-14: kye ma spro ba ma bri ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-15: sa gzhan bcu gcig pa la zhugs pa yin no snyam mo; ;de ltar spro ba ma bri ba de la sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag dga' nas bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin dag la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-16: de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi pa dag la mngon par bsnyad pa nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-17: tshangs ris kyi lha'i bar dag la 'di ltar dzambu'i gling du rigs che ge mo zhig las rigs kyi bu zhig grong che ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-18: grong rdal mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406a-19: ming ga ge mo zhig ces bya ba skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-0: dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bdud @406b kyi yul gyi dngos po mi 'dod cing 'dod chags kyi dga' ba'i mod las skyes pa'i sred pa'i dngos po dang lhan cig gnas par mi 'dod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-1: nyon mongs pa sprul lta bu dang lhan cig dga' bar mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-2: gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa dag mthong nas 'khor ba thams cad las yid byung ngo zhes mngon par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-3: de thos nas tshangs chen gyi ris kyi lha rnams bdud kyi phyogs ni dma' bar gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-4: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho'o zhes dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-5: de ltar sa gzhan bcu gcig pa la zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-6: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lha'i mthong ba dang yang dag pa'i lam mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-7: las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-10: yid kyi chad pa'i de kho na nyid mthong ba de 'di snyam du sems te; 'di ltar lus gyi chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-12: yid kyi chad pa shin tu zhib mor rab tu rnam par 'byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-13: dge slong dag lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-15: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-19: lha dang mir bcas pa dag gis de ltar rab tu rnam par 'byed pa mi shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-20: gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba pa dag gis shes pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-21: gnas med cing skabs med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:406b-23: gang nga las thos pa ni ma gtogs so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-1: chad pa gsum shin tu phra ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa de ni de ltar shin tu phra ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-3: gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba dag gis dris na lan de ltar gdab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-4: gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba dag ni dris pa'i lan la shin tu rmongs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-7: 'di ltar 'khor bar gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-8: de dag gi lus kyi chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-10: yid kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum po de ni rigs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-13: khyad du gsod pa dang bcas pa la sems pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-21: yid mi bde ba rnam par gcod pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-22: 'phags pa rnams kyi chos mngon sum du byed pa'ang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-23: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-24: gtan zad par byed pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-27: lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed pa'ang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-28: de dag lus kyi chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407a-30: yid kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum po la sems par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-0: gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba dag ni rang gi lus kyis mgu nas nga rgyal 'ba' zhig byed par @407b zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-2: yon tan dpyod par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-3: de ltar lus kyi chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-5: yid kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum po de dag ni mi bzad pa chen po yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-8: cung zad kyang 'dra ba med pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-11: 'khor ba gnyis cung zad kyang mi 'dra ba bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-12: de ltar de dag gi chad pa rnam pa gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-15: de de ltar lan gdab par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-16: phas kyi rgol ba dag gi ni stong pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-17: nga'i lam ni bde ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-18: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-19: 'dus byas thams cad ni g-yo ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-20: 'khor ba thams cad na bde ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-24: mi 'gyur ba'i chos can de dag la de ltar bsam par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-26: de ltar lus kyi chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-28: yid kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba'i dge slong de ni che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-29: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong thar pa'i grong khyer gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba de'ang rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-30: dge slong de ji ltar na sa gzhan bcu gnyis pa la zhugs zhig gu snyam nas rnal 'byor spyod pa des brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-31: dge slong 'di ni brtson pa ma bri ba yin la da dung du las ngan pa byas pa rnams kyi rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:407b-32: 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-0: sems can dmyal ba chen po bdud kyi 'khor dmyal ba @408a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-1: mnar med pa zhes bya ba stong 'gyur du 'byung ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-2: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-3: gang gis bsam bzhin du ma bsad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-5: bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas par 'gyur ba ni gang bskal pa'i tha mar nyes par byas pa'i las byas pa mnar med par 'grub par 'gyur ba de bskal pa'i lhag ma der smin to /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-6: gnod pa gang 'gags pa'i dus ni yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-7: de lta bas na byas pas bskal pa'i lhag mar smin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-8: las khyad par can byas pas gnod pa drag pa rtsub pa tsha ba khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-9: gang mnar med pa'i las gcig byas pas ni sems la gnod par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-11: 'di ltar mnar med pa 'di'i las gcig cig byas na gal te yang sems rtsub cing sems kyi bsam pa rtsub na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-12: de'i sdug bsngal drag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-14: de'i gnod pa rnam pa de lta bur ni mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-15: las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thams cad ni sems la rag las te sems kyi dbang du song zhing sems kyi kun tu sbyor ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408a-16: sems kyi kun tu sbyor bas 'ching ba'i sems can dag ni bcings pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-0: sems rnam par byang bas ni @408b grol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-1: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mnar med pa rnams kyi gnod pa'i rim pa'ang de ltar 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-2: de'i sdug bsngal ba'ang lus sbom zhing gzhon sha can du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-3: de la mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sa ni lus dpag tshad lngar 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-5: las gsum gyis ni gsum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-6: las gnyis kyis ni gnyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-7: las gcig gis ni lus dpag tshad gcig 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-8: de nas yang dge slong des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i 'khor la brtags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-9: sems can dmyal ba chen po'i 'khor 'di ni spu zing zhes byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-10: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor bcu drug pa ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-11: gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba chen po de yongs su bskor ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-13: bya rog kha zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-15: tshor ba mtha' med ring dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-22: me tog kha ma bye ba lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:408b-30: 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i 'khor bcu drug yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-1: slong des 'chi ba'i dus la sogs pa nas srid pa bar mar skye ba'i bar la rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-2: ji ltar na sems can dmyal ba pa mnar med par 'gro ba sdug bsngal las sdug bsngal nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur snyam nas des brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-5: gti mug gis zil gyis non pa'i srog chags ngan pa byed pa byas pa dag ni mnar med par 'gro'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-6: de la mnar med par ni kha cig 'di ltar de lha'i 'jig rten 'dod pa'i phyir mer 'jug par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-7: gang dag ri ngos g-yang sa las 'dor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-9: gang dag zas mi sbyin pas gsod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-10: lam ngan pas rnam par rmongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-11: thos pa ngan pas rnam par bslus shing gti mug pa dag ma gsod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-12: kha cig mtho ris 'dod pas 'di ltar zas mi sbyin pas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-13: ri la g-yang du gtong bas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-15: chur 'jug pas ma bsad na mtho ris 'thob bo snyam nas de mtho ris la sred pas srog dang bral bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409a-16: kha cig ni zhe sdang ba sems mi brtan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rkyen gyis te; de ltar nyes pa gsum gyis zil gyis non pa'i srog chags dag gis srog gcod par byed pa ni mnar med par 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-0: de la mnar med pa ni kha cig zhing chen por @409b gyur pa de ma shes nas khrag 'byin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-1: de bzhin du dge 'dun dbyen byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-2: dgra bcom pa'ang srog dang bral bar byed pa ni phyir zhing zhe sdang gis zil gyis non pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-3: de ltar don thams cad med cing rab tu gcod pa byed pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-4: de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe kha cig rang gi lus nyid la mnar med pa'i me gnas shing 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-5: kha cig 'chi ba'i dus byas ma thag tu srid pa bar mar 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-6: de'i 'og tu mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-7: gang gi tshe mnar med pa'i las byas pa de'i tshe de phan chad rab tu 'byung ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi bskal pa nges par bsregs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-8: de'i sdom pa so sor skye bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-9: dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa bsregs pa myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-10: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-11: skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba de nges par sems can dmyal bar 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-13: gang gis lo brgya thub par 'gyur ba de lo nyi shu zhig thub par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-14: gang yid kyis rtog cing sems par byed pa de dag thams cad kyang ji ltar tshva sgo la sa bon btab pa bzhin 'bras bu med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:409b-15: de phan chad lha gang phyi bzhin du 'brang ba des de yongs su spong bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-1: las kyi mtha' 'bras bu med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-2: de'i dbang po yul rnams la zhan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-3: rtag tu rmi lam ngan pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-4: don med pa kun la'ang sbyor bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-8: bran mo dag yod na de thams cad kyis yongs su spong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-11: gal te zas zhim po zhig sbyar na de'ang ji lta ba bzhin du mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-13: rtag tu bzhin gyi mdog ngan cing rtsub pa dang; rtag tu sems 'khrul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-15: gnyen 'dab kyi tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yongs su brnyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-16: de'i sems la glo bur du skrag pa 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-17: 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad dud pas 'khrigs par mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-18: de'i khams sngon ltar nam yang mnyam par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-19: rgyang ring po na gzugs mi sdug pa med bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-21: rtag tu bdag nyid tsha bas gdungs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-22: rtag tu mkhris pa'i nad kyis nyam thag par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-23: de'i kha rtag tu kha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410a-25: mal gyi gzhi thams cad 'jam pa yin yang rtsub par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-0: pi wang gi sgra dag kyang 'jigs shing bag @410b tsha bar thos par 'gyur na sgra gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-1: de'i sna'ang rtag tu nyams par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-2: des rdzas dri zhim po dag kyang mi tshor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-3: de'i lus thams cad las kyang dri nga pa 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-5: spu thams cad 'byi zhing de'i so dag mdog ngan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-7: lag pa rab tu rdol bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-8: bde ba thams cad las yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-9: rmi lam na lha dag gis rtag tu gtse bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-10: de rtag tu snying nad kyis 'dabs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-12: lus rnams kyang sdug par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-13: gal te brgya la me tog dag btags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-14: de dag myur du rnyis par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-15: de'i gos dag kyang myur du zad par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-17: gos dag bkrus kyang dri ma can du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-18: glo bur du lam gol bar 'gro na 'gyel bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-19: de'i lus 'gyel bas nyams shing de'i lus la rma mang po 'byung bar 'gyur la yun ring pos 'tsho bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-20: gnyid log na mgul bskams shing sad nas kyang chu 'thung ba nyid du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-21: sbyin byed ma'i bus gnod par gyur pa na grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-22: grong khyer dag stong pa nyid du mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-25: rgyu skar dag gi gzugs log par mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-26: rlung chung ngu langs pa kun dang phrad na'ang mtshon gyis btab pa lta bur drag par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:410b-27: me chung ngu dag gis reg na'ang sreg par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-0: @411a *// nyi ma'ang nyis gyur gyis tsha bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-2: zla ba shin tu dro ba myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-3: chu bsil ba thams cad kyang dro bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-5: nags tshal bde ba dag la 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-6: bya'i skad snyan pa dag wa skad 'jigs pa lta bur thos par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-7: 'jig rten thams cad dur khrod lta bur rig cing rtag tu dga' ba med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-8: de chang gis mchog tu dga' bar skye bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-9: ngo tsha med cing tshul med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-11: bzhi mdo dag tu skye bo'i mngon sum du bshang gci byed par 'gyur ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-12: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-14: lha thams cad kyis kyang yongs su spangs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-15: don thams cad med pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-16: mdog tshal shing bsregs pa lta bur 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-18: yul mi kun dang zhe 'gras par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-19: de dag ni mnar med pa de'i mtshan ma tshe 'di la sngar 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-20: de'i 'og tu de 'chi ba'i mtshan ma 'byung ba ni nyin par zla ba mthong zhing mtshan mo nyi ma mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-21: rang gi grib ma mi mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411a-22: glo bur du sgra mi snyan pa thos par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-0: thog mar rims kyis 'debs shing 'chi ba'i @411b bar du nad kyis 'debs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-1: de kun nas me mdag rab tu 'bar ba lta bu'i rims kyis shin tu gdungs shing nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi lta bu ma yin pa dag gis nyam thag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-2: kun nas me mdag gi klung dag tu 'tshed pa na srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu dag lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-8: tshil dag tu zhugs nas gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-9: 'di lta ste; srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu dag la rlung brgyad cu dag gis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-10: srin bu spu can la rlung spu sun 'byin gyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-11: srin bu kha gang la rlung dag gi rjes su mthun pas gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-12: srin bu sbre med la rlung mi lam 'khrul ston gyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-13: srin bu ra ba phye byed la rlung bzod med kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-14: srin bu rnam par rmongs byed la rlung lces brjed pa mi bzod kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-15: srin bu med mdog byed la rlung ro bro khrid byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-16: srin bu 'gred byed la rlung mchin pa 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-17: srin bu 'og 'gro la rlung bshang ba steng 'gros gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-18: srin bu aud tid ga la rlung gzhan rgyus gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-19: srin bu kun rtog mthong la rlung dran pa nyams byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:411b-20: srin bu dri nga la rlung pags pa 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-0: srin bu rus pa legs skyes la rlung ro bro ba 'jig byed kyis gnod @412a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-2: srin bu kha dmar la rlung sha 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-3: srin bu brtson bcas la rlung rgyags pa 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-4: srin bu gnad rgyu za la rlung rus pa 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-5: srin bu mtshon cha kha la rlung rus khu 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-6: srin bu spu gri kha la rlung gnyer mar song gis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-7: srin bu spu med la rlung mgo skya byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-8: srin bu khab gdong la rlung rdul 'jig gis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-9: srin bu spi spi dza la rlung gci ba shin tu 'jug byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-10: srin bu rkang med la rlung zas ldan gyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-11: srin bu bshang ba g-yeng byed la rlung so 'gas byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-12: srin bu gsum byed la rlung rtse'i chu la sogs kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-13: srin bu rgyu ma 'jig byed la rlung 'og tu 'gros gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-14: srin bu dbos byed la rlung gyen du 'gros gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-15: srin bu mdog bzang la rlung ngos ldang gis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-16: srin bu gzhang rkang la rlung mid par 'gros gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-17: srin pu lpags byed la rlung sems sun 'byin gyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412a-18: srin bu tshil gnon la rlung 'khrug byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-0: srin bu bsags byung la rlung mig 'dzums @412b 'byed byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-1: srin bu dri mi zhim la rlung phan tshun phrad pa lngas gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-2: srin bu sa ha tsu ra ba la rlung snying po 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-3: srin bu gnod byed la rlung snying po 'chags byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-4: srin bu snying po me tog skyed la rlung 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-7: rgyug par byed pas gnod par byed do; ;srin bu ku ha ka chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-11: srin bu rkang dro dag la rlung mig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-14: lce 'jig gis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-15: srin bu rus pa 'jig byed la rlung mkhris pa 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-16: srin bu rkang gang la rlung bad kan 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-17: srin bu tshigs gcod la rlung gzhungs pa 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-18: srin bu klad par rgyu la rlung sen mo gnas kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-19: srin bu klad rgyas za la rlung rkang pa ngos gnas kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-20: srin bu thod par rgyu la rlung sems med byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-21: srin bu skra za la rlung 'byed byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-22: srin bu rna rgyu la rlung 'gro ba nyams byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-23: srin bu snabs 'khril rlung long bu 'jig gis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:412b-24: srin bu tshil nad rgyu la rlung 'byin pa 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-1: la rlung tshigs 'byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-2: srin bu so drung za la rlung 'byin pa 'jig pa tshor med byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-3: srin bu kha chu za la rlung spro ba 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-4: srin bu bad kan rlan byed la rlung sna 'phul rengs byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-5: srin bu rab tu skyug byed la rlung ro bro ba bcu khyer ba nang du rgyu zhing du shya ga ta ldog byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-6: srin bu sbrang rtsi myos la rlung tshigs 'khrugs byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-7: srin bu ro drug sred la rlung spu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-9: bshang ba 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-10: srin bu bar bur la rlung kha chu 'khrul byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-11: srin bu ro yid 'byung la rlung shig shig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-12: srin bu rmi lam srid la rlung 'doms rengs kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-13: srin bu spu za la rlung bshang ba skams byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-14: srin bu so su ra la rlung rtsib logs 'ching byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-15: srin bu skye ba'i ma la rlung khva bu ga drug gis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-16: srin bu au ma pa ra la rlung yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-17: nying lag 'thung byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-18: srin bu ra ba zag la rlung me 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413a-19: srin bu spu gling la rlung yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-0: nying lag kun byed kyis gnod par byed @413b do; ;srin bu spu zan la rlung brtan 'gems kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-1: srin bu si mi si ma la rlung yan lag kun khyab kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-2: srin bu au ma bu ga la rlung sreg byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-3: srin bu rmas bslang la rlung 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-4: srin bu btsun tsu skra la rlung steng 'og gis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-5: srin bu rgyus pa gcod la rlung mi'i srog gang la song ba 'chi byed kyis gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-6: srin bu rtsa gcod la rlung mig 'byed kyis gnod par byed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-7: ji ltar srog chags thams cad 'chi ba'i dus su srin bu dag la rlung dag gis so so nges par gnod pa byed pa de ltar mnar med pa'i ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-8: de'i las ngan pa byas pas 'og dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-9: steng du mi mthun pa'i las kyis byas pa'i rlung rab tu drag pa dag so sor ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-10: de ltar rlung brgyad cu dag gis srin bu brgyad cu dag la gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-11: rlung dag gis ji lta ji ltar srin bu dag la gnod par byed pa bzlog pa de lta bu mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-12: dang por rlung bib pa la ka dri zhim pa dang gis de'i lus thams cad ji ltar bu ram shing dbang shing gis btsir ba de ltar skams par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-13: khrag thams cad skams par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-14: gnad thams cad du gnod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-15: rgyus pa thams cad gcod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:413b-16: sdug bsngal gyis rkang thams cad rab tu 'ju bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-0: las kyi mthar spyad pa 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mnar @414a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-1: med pa de'i khar srin bu gsal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-2: sems can dmyal ba pa de'i khyim ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-4: ko ba nag pos g-yogs shing phyogs gcig tu rab tu 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-5: yang ko ba nag po de'i phyogs gcig nas me 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-6: khang pa'i nang thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-7: des khyim rab tu 'bar par mthong nas bzhin mog mog por 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-8: du zhing skad 'byin la lag pa g-yob par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-11: so dag gis so dag la 'debs par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-12: mchus mchu la reg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-13: snang ba gnyis pa mthong ba ni mun pa mun nag thibs por gyur cing ri brag chen po la so sor 'jigs pa chen po seng ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-17: sbrul 'jigs pas gang ba steng du 'ong ba mthong nas bshang ba 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-18: de'i steng du ri de 'ong ba'i 'jigs pas lag pa rkyong bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-19: de nye du dag gis mthong nas nam mkha' la reg bar 'dod do zhes smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-20: de'i 'og tu de bzhin du ri brag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-23: lcug tshal mang po 'bar ba'i phreng ba steng du 'ong bar mthong ste; shin tu 'khrul pa du skad 'byin cing sgra ngar ngar po 'thon la bshang ba 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414a-24: mig 'gyur bar byed cing 'jigs bzhin mog mog por mchi ma 'byin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-1: de'i rlig pa'ang gyen du 'greng la khu chu gtong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-2: de'i 'og tu'ang de 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag kun tu 'khrug pa 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-7: de la sa'i khams 'khrugs pas yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-8: nying lag thams cad sra ba'i ngo bos rdung par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-10: rdo gnyis dag gi dbus su dbu ba'i gong bu bzhin gnod par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-12: bye ma chang pa nas gtor ba bzhin lus kyi dbyibs thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-14: nyid lag thams cad kun nas gnod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-16: rnam par gcod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-17: de'i sa'i khams 'khrugs pas de sdug bsngal shin tu tsha ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-18: de'i 'og tu de'i las nyes par byas pas chu'i khams kyang rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-19: de 'khrugs pas de ngu skad 'byin cing sgra ngar ngar po 'don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-20: de'i rgyus pa dang shar bcas pa [?] cing lhod lhod por 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-23: mig nas kyang chu'i rgyun mang po byung ba nub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-24: de'i 'og tu me'i khams kyang 'khrug par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-25: de me mdag gi tshogs mang po'i nang du bcug nas sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:414b-26: de'i sdug bsngal ni yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-0: nying lag thams cad sdug bsngal drag cing tsha la rtsub cing gdung ba skye bar @415a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-2: 'jigs pas nyam thag pa de ngu skad 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-5: lag pa g-yob par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-6: mgo skad cig kyang 'jog mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-7: de'i 'og tu rlung gi khams kyang 'khrugs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-8: de'i rlung gi khams sra ba rtsub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-12: nying lag thams cad mkhrang ba nyid kyis rdung bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-13: mang ba nyid kyis gleb par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-14: yang ba nyid kyis nam mkha' la 'deg pa ltar byed cing g-yang sa chen por 'dor ba ltar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-15: grang ba nyid kyis rgyus pa dag skum par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-16: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sbrul rab tu gdug pa lta bur 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rab tu 'khrugs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-17: gang dpe bya ba'ang sla ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-18: de'i lus thams cad dbu ba'i gong bu bzhin du myur du 'gyes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-22: kun nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi zad pas nyam thag pa mal gyi mtha' ma nam mkha' la nyug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-23: de'i srid pa tha ma pa'i sems nye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-24: de ri brag che zhing mtho ba'i khar bteg bteg nas 'dor bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415a-25: bor nas de rten med pa nam mkha' la kun tu 'khyam zhing yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-0: de nas @415b rgya'i 'bur lta bur de srid pa tha ma'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-1: des gshin rje'i mi byad bzhin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-2: rkang lag mi sdug par bsgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-3: kha gdod glang po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-12: skyugs pa za ba lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa dag gis sems can dmyal ba ba de la bsdigs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-13: de gcig pus mthong gi gzhan gang gis kyang de mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-14: de 'jigs pa mi bzad pas mig 'gyur zhing mar me'i snum zad nas 'chi ba bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur te; srid pa bar mar de'i gzugs bltar snang la thogs pa med pa byas pa byis pa lo brgyad lon pa lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-15: 'chi ba'i dus byas ma thag tu gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis 'dzin pa byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-16: bzung nas kyang lcags kyi thag pa rab tu 'bar bas mgul nas 'ching zhing lag pa gnyis ka phyin ci log tu bcings so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-22: kun tu rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-23: me'i nang de dag na gshin rje'i mi byad bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur ba du ma dag kyang mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-24: me'i nang de dag tu 'dor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:415b-25: 'dor zhing sems can dmyal ba pa de dag la bsdigs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-0: lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa de dag mthong nas thag pa'i bcing @416a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-1: bas bcings te gshin rje'i mi mchog tu 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa de dag gis spyo zhing lho phyogs dag tu khrid pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-2: 'di ltar snying rje rje skad yongs su smre sngags 'don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-3: ded dpon mi mkhas 'khrul pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-4: g-yon pa'i sa nas bdag nyams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-5: byad bzhin bsgyur bas yongs bskor cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-6: dbang med 'jigs pa dag tu khrid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-7: rtag tu bar snang phyogs dag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-8: phyogs mtshams nyid dang sa rnams dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-9: thams cad bar chad med par ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-11: sdug bsngal dbang med gang du khrid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-12: bdag gis gnas ni mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-13: 'brog dgon dag tu bdas pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-14: kun nas grogs ni byed pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-15: sdug bsngal 'di las rnam grol bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-16: mgon skyabs byed pa gang yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-17: nus pa med cing dbang med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-18: sdug bsngal me yis yongs gdungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-19: bcings bas lag pa bcings nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-20: dbang med bdag ni gang du khrid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-21: don rnams dang ni mdza' ba shes dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-22: bu dag dang ni chung ma la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-23: kyi hud bdag drin chud zos te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-24: sdug bsngal 'di las skyob mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-25: dga' ba med cing nyams gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-26: sems ni sdug bsngal dag gis nyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-27: 'chi ba'i zhags pas gzung ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-28: skyabs ni nye bar mi mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416a-29: bdag la khros ltar tshig smra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-0: kun nas spyo @416b ba brgyad par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-1: 'di gang yin zhig kun nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-3: bdag gis gang dang gang mthong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-4: yul dang de bzhin dgon pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-5: de dang de dag kun gyi nang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-6: thams cad me yis yongs su bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-7: phyogs rnams kun na dga' med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-8: 'khrug pa dag gis yongs su bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-9: skyabs su 'gyur ba yong med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-10: bdag la kun nas grogs med do; ;mun gang mi bzad nang du 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-11: me mdag phung por bcas pas bsgribs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-12: nam mkha' rgyu skar gza' dag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-13: skar ma dag kyang mi mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-14: 'di dag thams cad log pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-15: mun gang dag gis yongs su bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-16: dbang po lnga ni thams cad dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-17: kun nas phyin ci log tu gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-18: bdag gi lus ni thams cad dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-19: sog les yongs su gsheg par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-20: skyabs su 'gyur pa yong med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-21: bdag gi gnas ni gar 'gyur zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-23: bdag ni kun nas yongs su bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-24: lus dang sems las skyes pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-25: sdug bsngal yang dang yang du 'phel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-26: sdug bsngal gyis ni non pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-27: de la kun nas grogs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-28: rang gi las kyi 'bras bus dkrugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-29: las kyis bskyed pa'i gshin rje dag //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-31: bltas te de nas tshig smras pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-32: sngon chad bya ba gang byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:416b-33: de ni phyi nas yongs su sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-2: phyi nas ci zhig yongs su gdung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-3: gnod las gnod pa gang che ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-4: sdig pa las ni sdig pa che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-5: khyod kyis ngan byas gang byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-6: sdug bsngal las ni sdug bsngal che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-7: bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag ma ru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-8: khyod ni me yis sreg par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-9: ngan byas mang po ci byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-10: gti mug yongs su bsam par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-11: las kyi zhags pas bcings pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-12: lha dang lha min dri za dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-13: sha za lto 'phye srin po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-14: khyod la yongs su skyob mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-15: las kyi zhags pas gang bcings pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-16: mi de sems can dmyal bar bcings /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-17: rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-18: thams cad dbang med khrid par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-19: las byas nges par 'gro ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-20: ma ni gsod par byed pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-21: sdig pa 'di ni shin tu sdig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-22: sdig las sdig pa chen po yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-23: gang gis khyod ni sngon bskyed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-24: pha yi khu chu las bskyed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-25: de la khyod kyis gnod byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-26: dbang med mtshon gyis srog bcad byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-27: gang zhig khams gsum khyad par 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-28: nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-29: 'ching ba kun las nges grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-30: de la khyod kyis sdig pa byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-31: chos rnams kun gyi gter yin zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-32: thar pa'i sgo ni rnam 'byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-33: khyod kyis dge 'dun dbyen byas sdig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-35: sbyor ba thams cad las 'das shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417a-36: bag la nyal ba kun spangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-0: @417b rmongs pas dgra bcom gnod bskyed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-1: de yi 'bras su nye bar spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-2: chos rnams kun la me lta bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-3: bden pa rin chen rnam 'jig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-4: rtag tu khyod kyis rdzun smras pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-5: de yi gnod pa spyad par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-6: phan tshun dbyen ni bya ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-7: bsam bzhin du ni yang dang yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-8: phra ma de ni mngon smras pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-10: gang gi rgyud la gdung byed mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-11: mtshan dang me dang dug lta bu'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-12: khyod kyis rtag tu tshig rtsub smras //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-13: de yi 'bras bu nye bar spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-14: snga phyi 'brel pa med pa'i tshig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-15: don med rigs pa med pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-16: 'brel med mang du smras pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-18: srog ni rtag tu lhur len pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-19: srog chags dbang med 'jigs byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-20: khyod kyis mang du rnam par gtses //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-21: de yi 'bras bu mang po thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-22: chags pas non pa'i yid kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-23: khyod kyis gzhan gyi nor rdzas phrogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-24: gang dag 'dod pa'i dbang song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-26: rnam rtog bud shing byung gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-27: me ni gnyis pa 'dra ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-28: 'dod pa dag la log par spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-29: don med ci zhig yongs su gdung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-30: gzhan gyi nor la chags sems pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-31: rang nyid kyi ni bsam pas bsams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-32: de la bya bar nus pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-33: de yi 'bras bu de ring spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-34: gang la gnod sems mang yod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-35: de yis gnod sems yongs su bsams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:417b-36: dmyal dang nye ste de lta bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-0: @418a *// nged cag gis ni yongs su 'dren //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-1: log par ston pa mi zad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-2: las gnyis rnam par 'jig byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-3: khyod kyis log par lta ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-4: gzhan gyi yid dag mngon par bcug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-5: lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-6: sdig pa'i chos ni 'di dag ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-7: gti mug rjes su zhugs khyod kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-8: byas shing gzhan dag rab tu sbyar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-9: byas pas nges par 'gro ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-10: dmyal ba drag po 'di thob ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-11: nged cag gis ni yongs bskor ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-12: gti mug ci zhig yongs su gdung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-13: rgya mtsho'i khyad par gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-14: gang gi khyad par chu thigs tsam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-15: gang dag mi bzod thob pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-16: sdug bsngal 'di ni de tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-17: mi ni gang zhig sdig byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-18: de bdag nges par phangs mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-19: bdag gi yid la sdig pa byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-20: sdig pas sems can dmyal bar 'tshed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-21: sdig pas sdig pa'i rjes su 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-22: de bzhin dge bas dge bar mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-23: sdig byed dge la sdang ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-24: sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-25: mi dge'i blo yis dge ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-26: btang nas ci phyir sdig par 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-27: rmongs pas rin chen por nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-28: ci phyir rdo yi rjes su rgyug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-29: sangs rgyas rin chen la sogs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-30: sna tshogs chos kyis mtshungs par gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-31: mi yi chos ni thob pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-32: ci phyir mang du spyad mi bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-33: sdig pa yongs su spangs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418a-34: sems ni rtag tu dge ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-0: mya ngan 'das pa @418b lag na yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-1: rtog pa rnams kyis mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-2: thog ma dbus dang mtha' dge ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-3: bde ba'i chos ni rtag tu 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-4: thog ma dbus dang mthar mi dge /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-5: sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-6: de ltar rtag tu sdig spangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-7: rtag tu dge la dmigs par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-8: sdig pa yongs su spangs pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-9: rtag tu bde la gnas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-10: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-11: yang dang yang du sdig pas gdungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-12: byis pa gti mug dbang song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-13: ci yi phyir na skyo mi bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-14: sdig pa yis ni sngon bsregs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-15: phyi nas me yis sreg par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-16: sdig pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i dmyal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-17: sdig pa rnams su yongs su 'tshed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-18: sdig pa don med smra ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-19: sems ni yang bas smra bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-20: tsha ba gang gis yongs sreg pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-21: ci yi phyir na sdig par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-22: khyod ni sgo dag du mar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-23: de lta bas na sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-24: de ltar de ni bsdigs pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-25: gshin rje'i pho nya du ma yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-26: las kyis zhags pa'i dbang song la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-27: mi bzad dmyal bar 'khrid par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-29: nying lag thams cad shing khong stong gi nang na me 'bar ba lta bus bsregs shing thag nye ba na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sgo gang dpe bya bar yang mi nus pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-30: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa; gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-31: dpag med sbrul gyis rnam par phye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-32: sems can dmyal ba du ma dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:418b-33: dbang med der ni 'tshed par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-0: de ltar de sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi sgra @419a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-1: chen po shin tu mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba mi snyan pa tha dad pa 'jigs su rung zhing gzhan dang mtshungs pa med pa thos nas mi mthun pa dag dpag tshad nyi khri lnga stong nas de mngon par thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-2: thos nas gang sems can dmyal ba gzhan du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de thams cad brjed nas sems 'khrugs par gyur cing de las gzhan pa sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyang byas pa'i sdug bsngal brjed nas 'chi ba'i dus byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-3: gang gis sngon gyi sgra de dag rnams kyang ma thos pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-4: sems can dmyal ba pa'i snang ba byas pa'i srid pa bar ma la sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis nyan pa de'i sems rnam par rmongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-5: yang phyir zhing sgra des bcu 'gyur du rnam par rmongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-6: de'i sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-8: yid la sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa'i sems de phyir zhing rmi lam gyi gzugs brnyan lta bur rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-10: nye bar gnas pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-11: las kyis bskyed pa las kyis byas pa'i rlung grang ba ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419a-12: khyad par grang sa'i 'og na chu yod cing sa'i 'og gi bar na chu gnas pa bar gyi bskal pa'i nyi ma thams cad kyis kyang sngon ma reg pa de lta bu bas kyang de grang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-0: gang mi'i chab rum shin tu @419b gang ba dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-1: chu de dag pas shin tu grang ba las kyis byas pa'i spu gri lta bu'i rlung de ri dpag tshad bcu pa'ang skyes nus par ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-2: phal cher rlung de'i nang du bcug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-3: srid pa bar ma'i gang ba rnam pa de lta bus gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po bdas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-4: 'di ltar de dang mthun pa'i nyi ma bdun shar ba'i tsha ba stong pas lhag par tsha ba'i me mngon par 'bar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-5: srid pa'i yan lag ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-7: nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid par 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-8: de 'dod pa bskyed ma thag nyid du srid pa bar ma'i phung po 'gag par 'gyur la srid pa gzhan du skye ba'i tshor ba'i phung po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-10: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi mig lnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-12: gsum 'byung ba de bzhin du las kyi dbang gis mi 'dra ba'i lus dpag tshad gcig pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-13: de mgo thur du bstan cing rkang pa gyen du bsgreng ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-14: ltung ba na mnar med pa'i me lce rab tu 'bar ba'i shugs kyis brdabs shing rab tu nyams pa lo nyis stong 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-15: de ltar spyi'u tshugs su de mnar med pa'i sar song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-16: de'i 'og na de las gzhan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:419b-19: 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i mtha' ni mnar med pa yin la gzugs kyi khams kyi mtha' ni gyen du drangs te 'og min gyi lha'i bar yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-0: de ltar de ltung ba na skye ba'i srid pa thob nas de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis rtag tu gnod cing sdug bsngal shugs rab tu @420a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-2: de'i drung na rab tu tsha bar skyes pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa dag gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang 'dra bar mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-3: de 'bar ba 'khrugs shing mi bzad pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i nang du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-4: skyes ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba pa'i mes yud tsam zhig gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-5: de'i tshe lus yongs su bsregs shing tsha bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-6: de'i gnas de yongs su tshol bar byed de; gal te ri'i rgyal po ri rab la 'khyud cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-7: de ltar de stong phrag drug cur yongs su bskor la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-11: nags tshal du bcas pa bskor ba tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba pa'i me du mas sreg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-12: de sems can dmyal ba pa gzhan yun ring du skyes pa dag ni ma gtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-13: de ltar sred pa 'di cung zad 'dra ba bstan pa ni 'di ltar me shin tu tsha bas dog le yongs su bsregs pa'i nang du snum gyi thigs pa gcig bsregs pa de bzhin du las kyi rgyu gcig gis mnar med par skyes pa'i lus la 'byung po'i tshogs gnas dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-20: tshal du bcas shing rgya mtsho dang bcas pa sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-21: gang gis las gnyis byas na des rgya mtsho gnyis snga ma bzhin sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-22: gang gis gsum byas na rgya mtsho gsum sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-23: de ltar bzhis rgya mtsho bzhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420a-24: lus la dog le bsregs pa bzhin lhung ma thag tu sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-0: rgya mtshor gtogs pa dag ni @420b klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-2: dud 'gror skyes pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-4: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug dag gi skyabs yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-6: mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa dag gi lus dri nga ba des de dag thams cad ma rung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-7: de ltar sems can dmyal ba pa dag dri nga ba'i lus las dri 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-8: ri mthon po dag gis dri de yong mi tshor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-9: sems can dmyal ba pa de las byas shing bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-11: rnam par phye ba'i dri nga ba de dri gzhan gyis dpe bya bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-12: de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi bya'i rigs dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-13: mchu rab tu 'bar ba mkhrad zhing rno la shugs ser ba myur du 'bab pa lta bu'i shugs kyis sems can dmyal ba pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-19: me las me 'byung ba de bzhin du 'byung zhing der gnas der 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-21: sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi sha zos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-23: sha drangs nas khrag la 'thung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-24: de dag kyang zol nas rkang dag la za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-25: de nas ngu zhing cho nges 'debs la yongs su smre sngags 'don cing rmongs pa na bya'i rigs gzhan dag 'byung bar 'gyur te; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-26: bya me lce spyod pa zhes bya bas gang me lce'i nang du zhugs nas sreg ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:420b-27: mthong ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyis klad pa phug nas khrag 'thung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-0: bya klad pa'i bar na rgyu zhes bya bas @421a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-1: klad pa phug nas mchu rab tu 'bar bas klad rgyas 'thung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-2: bya zas su lce za zhes bya bas lce kha gnyis su drangs nas rab tu za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-3: de'ang zos shing yang padma'i 'dab ma ltar shin tu 'jam pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-4: bya so 'byin zhes bya bas mchu gnyi ga phra skad ltar 'dzin cing rab tu 'bar bas so thams cad 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-5: bya mid pa la sogs pa 'dren pa zhes bya bas mid pa'i sha dag zhib mor 'brub cing za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-6: bya glo ba za ba zhes bya bas gang glo ba dag za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-7: bya snying za ba zhes bya bas gang snying dag gsheg nas za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-8: bya pho ba za ba zhes bya bas phe ba gsheg nas der zhugs te ro bro ba za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-9: bya mchin pa 'jig byed ces bya bas gang mchin pa dag za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-10: bya bu gar za ba zhes bya bas gang sems can dag gi bu ga za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-11: bya sgal tshigs za zhes bya bas gang sgal tshigs dag phug nas gzhungs pa dag zos te phyir 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-12: bya gnad gsang zhes bya bas gang gnad kyi bar thams cad phug cing gnad dag phye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-13: bar du zhugs nas du bzhin du rkang gi bcud 'thung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-14: bya khab ltar 'bigs zhes bya bas gang mchu khab lta bus khrag 'thung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421a-15: de bzhin du bya 'gram rus kyi bar du zhugs shing rus pa gzhan dag phug nas rus pa'i bar na gnas zhes bya bas phyi rol na'ang za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-0: bya pags pa rnam drug za zhes bya bas gang pags pa rnam pa drug za bar byed @421b do; ;bya sen mo 'byin zhes bya bas gang sen mo thams cad 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-1: bya tshil za zhes bya bas gang pags pa dag phug nas tshil za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-2: bya rgyus pa 'byin zhes bya bas gang rgyus pa thams cad phyung nas za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-3: bya skra shad 'dzings zhes bya bas skra drung nas 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-4: de ltar de mnar med pa'i phyogs dpag tshad sum stong na bya 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa zhes bya ba des sems can dmyal ba pa de las gzhan pa rnams kyis de ma thag tu lo 'bum phrag du mar za bar byed cing yang slar 'byung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-5: de gal te yang mnar med pa na bya 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa'i phyogs de dag las thar na sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad kyis yongs su dkris pa ngam grog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-6: g-yang sa zhes bya ba'i phyogs gnyis yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-10: kun nas me lce'i phung po bcu gcig gis khebs shing grogs med la las kyi zhags pa'i bcing bas bcings nas phyi nang kun tu dgras gang ba'i dgon par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-11: sems can dmyal ba'i tshogs thams cad pas ches shin tu nyon mongs par zhugs la ngam grog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-12: g-yang sa zhes bya ba'i phyogs su rgyug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-13: der lhung nas rkang pa rab tu sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-15: shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon sha can du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-16: sdug bsngal tsha zhing mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mngon par gdungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:421b-17: de ltar de 'jigs shing bzhin mdog mog mog por gyur ba'i rkang lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-0: @422a *// yan lag thams cad rab tu zhum pa na ngam grog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-1: g-yang sa zhes bya ba'i yul de 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-3: g-yang sa dpag tshad sum stong yod pa'i yul der de ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-4: yang las kyis byas pa'i rlung gis 'deg cing de 'dor ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-8: 'ug pa rnams kyis za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-9: de nas yang rlung spu gri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-10: me lta bus gyen du 'deg cing 'dor ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-11: de dag nyid kyis za bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-12: de ltar de 'deg cing 'dor ba lo 'bum phrag du mar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-13: de la gal te yang de las thar na 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor ba mtshan ma'i bar zhes bya ba'i phyogs su rgyug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-14: phyogs der yang 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong yod la lte ba rdo rje las byas pa shin tu 'bar zhing myur bar 'khor ba 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-15: de dang lhan cig 'gro ba nyid kyis 'khor lo de lus la bab nas 'khor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-16: mgo'i 'khor lo gcig gis klad pa 'thag par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-17: de nas klad rgyas rab tu 'bar ba dag 'byung ba nas mig gi bar du 'byung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-18: phrag pa gnyis ka la 'khor lo gnyis 'khor te des rus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-19: rkang dag phye mar rlog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-21: des gtsub shing bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka la me 'byung la; de me nyis gyur gyis sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-22: de bzhin du de'i brang la 'khor lo rab tu 'bar ba yongs su 'khor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422a-23: des de'i rus pa thams cad bcom bcom nas 'thag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-0: bye ma'i phye ma bzhin du @422b byed do; ;de'i rgyab la'ang lcags kyi me mdag gis reg cing 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa 'khor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-2: rgyab kyi rus par gtogs pa la sogs pa thams cad 'joms so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-3: de nas de'i 'doms su lcags kyi mtshon brang kol li ka 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-4: des 'doms thams cad gtsub shing bzhin du gtsubs nas 'dren par byed cing de'i long ga thams cad 'bigs par byed do; ;phug nas kyang rgyu ma dag la'ang 'bigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-5: pus mo'i lha nga la'ang 'khor lo 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-6: des pus mo'i lha nga de 'bigs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-7: de bzhin du long bu la'ang 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-8: des de'i rus pa dag phug nas rkang dag za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-9: de'i rkang mthil la'ang phur bu rnams kyis 'bigs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-10: des kyang gdung ba cher byas shing sdug bsngal skyed par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-11: de ltar las kyi mtha' nyes par byas pa spyod pa mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rang gi las kyis byas pa thun mong ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-13: tsha ba rtsub pa'i gnod pa dag lo 'bum phrag du mar 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;de gal te yang de las thar na gnod pa myong bzhin du 'bros par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-16: dpung gnyen 'dod pa de bros pa na ri chen po zhig yod par mthong nas de la rgyug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-17: ri de'ang srin bu ma ko ta ka yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-18: nying lag rab tu 'bar ba rnams kyis gang la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:422b-19: de ltar de srin bu ma ko ta ka reg na rtag tu me ltar tsha ba rnams kyi nang du skya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-1: kyis de kun nas yongs su bskor nas rdul phran tsam du za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-2: cho nges 'debs pa na srin bu ma ko ta ka kha'i nang du'ang zhugs nas mid par song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-4: long ga'i nang du zhugs nas za bar byed cing de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha brtsub pa dag myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-5: gang sngon shin tu nyes par spyad pa byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-6: gang mnar med pa byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-7: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa de ni rgyu de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu nye bar spyod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-8: de ltar de srin bu ma ko ta ka'i ri der lo 'bum phrag du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-9: gal te'ang de las thar na sha za ba seng ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-13: dom gyis gang ba'i tshal du rgyug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-15: bzung nas kyang yan lag rab tu za bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-16: la la ni klad pa brtol nas klad rgyas za bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-17: la la ni brla'i ngos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-18: la la ni rgyu ma la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-19: la la ni gnye ma la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-20: la la ni leng ka la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-21: la la ni pho ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-22: la la ni byin pa'i spu gu la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-23: la la ni pus mo la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-24: la la ni rkang pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-25: la la ni rkang pa mthil la za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-26: de ltar de bza' bza' nas yang shin tu gzhon sha can du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-27: shin tu gzhon sha can de la yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-28: yang du lhag par sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la yang zos na yang de'i sha rdzogs par skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423a-29: des srog gcod pa byas shing bsags pa'i 'bras bu ni de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-0: de ltar de rang gis byas pa gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i sdig pa'i @423b las de lo 'bum phrag du mar myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-1: de nas yang dge slong de ma byin par yang len pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i 'bras bu so so yang dag par myong ba la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-3: 'di ltar de nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la spyod pa mgal me'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-5: ri dvags skom pa lta bu dag la don gyi rnam pa chen po dbyig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-10: de ltar de chags pas zil gyis non la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-11: las kyi rmongs pa dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-12: 'di dag ni bdag gi yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-13: de ltar rmongs pa sdig pa byed pa de me mdag rab tu 'bar ba'i chu bo dag las brgal nas rdzas kyi rnam pa de dag gi drung du rgyug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-14: las kyis byas pa'i gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-15: de mtshon cha'i dra ba'i nang du bcug nas yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-16: nying lag thams cad gsheg cing gcod la sreg ste rus pa'i lhag ma ma lus par byed kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-17: de thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa de gnas skabs de dag tu'ang 'dod pa de spong bar mi byed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-19: bud shing lta bu'i rtogs byung bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-20: nga rgyal phrag dog me ltar 'bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-21: shing gi mes ni mi sreg gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-23: 'dod pa'i dug gis zin pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:423b-24: de dag la ni bde ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-1: byas na; ;phyir yang de bzhin rab tu 'phel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-2: ji lta ji ltar 'dod gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-4: me las 'bros par nus srid kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-5: 'dod pa'i me las mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-6: 'dod pas yongs su bslus pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-8: thog ma med pa'i 'jig rten la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-9: 'dod pa lta bu'i dgra med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-10: 'dod pas yongs su bslus pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-11: rgya mtsho'i chu nang 'jug par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-12: mtshon cha thibs po 'bab pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-13: g-yul du yang dag rab tu 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-14: 'dod pa'i rgyu yis sa bdag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-15: phan tshun dag tu 'jig par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-16: nor la sred pas ma bu yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-18: sred pa'i dug las rnam grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-19: 'dod pa'i me ma dag rnam par spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-20: bong ba gser ltar mnyam pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-22: nor gyi nang na tshul khrims mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-23: nyi ma 'od dang ldan pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-25: tshul khrims 'di ni mdun na gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-26: tshul khrims kyis ni sum cu gsum //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-27: de bzhin bsam gtan spyod yul 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-29: tshul khrims gzi dang mtshungs pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-30: mnar med par ni skyes pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-31: nor la 'dod pas bsregs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424a-34: mkhas pa'i ye shes chu yis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-0: @424b bsgrims te 'dod pa'i me mdag sod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-1: 'dod pa med par ma byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-2: mya ngan 'das pa thag ring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-3: de ltar sems can dmyal ba pa de 'dod pa'i me des sreg pa na'ang mnar med pa'i me gnyis pa mtshon 'bab pa dang bcas pas sum 'gyur du sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-4: der yang mgal me bskor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-6: ri dvags skom pa lta bu'i nor dag la 'phrog par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-7: log par bsgyur ba'i rmi lam gyi me lta bu sems can dmyal ba pa gshin rje'i mi de dag gis ma byin par blangs pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa de lo 'bum phrag du mar sdug bsngal myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-8: de nas yang dge slong de 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i mnar med pa de'i 'bras bu la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-10: 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa de mtshon cha nyam nga ba de las thar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-11: ji ltar yang las kyis 'khrul pa me mdag gi chu bo las brgal nas log par rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i phyogs gzhan du zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-12: des las kyis byas pa'i bud med dag gang sngon gyi dran pa nyams pa des mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-13: de dag mthong nas de thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i 'dod chags kyi me 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-14: de der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-15: gang na; bud med 'khor ba de dag las kyis byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-16: lcags kyi bud med dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-17: de dag gis de bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:424b-18: bzung nas kyang lce la sogs pa la za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-0: ji ltar de'i lus de la @425a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-1: yungs 'bru tsam gyi lhag ma yang ma lus par de ltar za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-4: de sdug bsngal tsha ba rtsub par myong bzhin du 'dod chags kyi me de dag las ldog par mi byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-5: gang na bud med de dag gnas pa der yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-6: yang shin tu rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-7: de ji ltar 'dod chags kyi mes gnod pa de ltar sdug bsngal gnod par mi rtsi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-8: de nas bud med de dag yang lus rdo rje dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-9: lcags rab tu 'bar ba'i lus kyi mi de bzung nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i lus kun gyis sems can dmyal ba de bye ma chang pa nas gtor ba bzhin du gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-10: lus thams cad phye mar byas pa de slar yang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-11: de nas shin tu rgyug kyang de'i 'dod chags zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-12: de'i gnas de lta bu mthong nas dge slong des bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-13: thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-14: bud med ngan song gzhi yin zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-15: kun nas nor ni zad par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-16: mi gang bud med tshig nyan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-17: de la bde ba ga la yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-18: don med chos la dga' ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-19: bud med g-yo dang phrag dog mang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-21: skyes pa rnams kyi mdun na gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-22: de tshig shin tu mi brtan te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425a-23: rtag tu 'dod chags skyed la mkhas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-0: de yi snying ni @425b gzhan sems la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-1: gzhan gyi tshul gyis smra bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-2: dang por mnyen zhing srun byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-3: phyi nas sems ni rdo rje 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-4: sems ni yang la phan pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-5: bkur sti dag ni dran mi byed; ;legs pa brgya ni chud gzon la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-6: ma legs gcig pu dran par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-7: sdig pa'i sa gzhi bud med yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-8: snying ni glog gi ngo bo bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-9: skyes pa chags pa'i sems yod pa; ;'jig pa'i rgyu ni bud med byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-12: gal te bde ba'i mchog 'dod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-13: de ltar bud med rnam par spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-14: bud med rtag tu spangs pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-16: gang zhig dbul ba spong 'dod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-19: mi des bud med spang bar byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-20: de ltar phyin ci log tu mthong ba snying rnam par rmongs pa de lo 'bum phrag du mar sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-23: de nas yang slar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:425b-24: de gal te de las thar nas de nas yang me mdag gi chu bo'i nang du bying zhing 'tshed pa na bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-0: de nas yang dge slong de mnar med pa'i mi dge ba byed pas gang brdzun du smra ba de kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa'i 'bras bu la brtags na des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas @426a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-2: 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba lus bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-3: skom pas 'khrugs shing gdungs pa de gshin rje'i mi stobs po che rnams kyis gzung ngo; ;bzung nas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-6: las kyi dbang gis bskul ba de dag bdag cag bkres so zhes smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-7: de nas de dag gshin rje'i mi de rnams kyis gzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-8: bzung nas kyang de'i kha gsheg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-9: de nas lce 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-10: lce de'ang las kyi dbang gis dpag tshad lnga brgya tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-11: brdzun du smra ba de'i 'bras bus de phyung ma thag tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-12: de gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis bzung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi rab tu 'bar ba la ldag tu 'jug cing las kyis byas pa'i thong gshol rtse mo rab tu 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i rmon glang stobs dang ldan pa stong byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-13: lce de'i steng du song nas rmed par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-16: srin bu 'dzag pa chu bo ltar 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-18: srin bur 'dres pa'i lce de'ang ji ltar lha rnams kyi mig bzhin du gzhon sha can du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-19: de'i lce'i phyogs la rmos pa de dag slar yang tha mal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-20: de nas yang lo 'bum phrag du ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426a-22: lce de la sdug bsngal mi bzad par 'byung ngo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426b-0: tsha zhing rtsub la rab @426b tu rtsub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426b-1: drag pas kyang shin tu drag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426b-2: sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dag gis nyam thag pa de kun co 'don /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426b-4: du skad 'byin kyang de'i sdug bsngal de sus kyang sel bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:426b-5: gang bdag gis byas pa de dag ni pha mas ma byas /
