K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:458b-16: gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:458b-17: yang du zangs dmar po bskol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:458b-18: lcags kyi thu lum rab tu 'bar bas sems can dmyal ba lus rnam par zhum pa de padma chen po kha btsums pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:458b-23: de nas yang slar skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-0: gnod pa khyad par du 'byung ba ni ji ltar las byas pa bzhin d @459a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-1: de'i lcags glebs pa chu zheng dpag tshad lnga yod pa kun nas rab tu 'bar la kun nas me lce gcig tu gyur pa khyer te des slu bar byed pa de yongs su bkres shing du mar bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-2: lus kun nas rab tu 'bar ba ku co 'don pa nas so sor nyams shing thams cad nas bde ba khab kyi bu ga tsam yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-4: lcags glebs pa des rtag tu khyab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-5: de ltar de sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa shin tu mi zad pa dag myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-7: skom par gyur cing lcags glebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-8: me 'byung bas de ltar de ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du gnod pa de dag myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-9: de de las thar na las de dag dang rgyu mthun par tshe rabs bdun stong du yi dvags klad rgyas za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-10: de las thar nas kyang tshe rabs bdun stong du dud 'gro kha zas med pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-11: me za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro; ;de las thar nas kyang gal te so sor myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-12: de rtag tu rgyal pos btson rar bcug cing tshe rabs lnga brgyar bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459a-13: skom pa dag gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-0: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po @459b mnar med pa'i 'khor la brtags na des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba 'gro ba mes sreg ces bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-1: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-3: 'phags pa'i gang zag mi gnas par bya'o snyam nas sangs rgyas kyi gtsug lag khang 'jig par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-4: de sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab yi ger bris pa 'byid dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-5: klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mkhas pa dag la mi mkhas pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab nyan par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-6: thos nas kyang chos 'dul ba de la 'jug par mi byed cing yongs su mi snyan par brjod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-7: brjod nas kyang kun tu bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byed na de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba 'gro ba mes sreg tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-8: der skyes nas kyang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i gnod pa bsdus pa de dag thams cad brgya 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-9: khyad par du 'byung ba ni 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba de la khyad par thams cad stong 'gyur du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-10: sprul rnams kyis 'khris shing kun nas dra bar gang ba der sems can dmyal ba der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:459b-11: 'gro ba na gshin rje'i mi lag na tho ba thogs pa de dag thams cad kyis sreg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-1: gi me tshan po ches kyang sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-3: sems can dmyal ba'i me gnyis kyi nang du sreg pa na snying rje rje skad du skad 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-6: de de ltar cho nges 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-7: 'di ltar gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-8: glen pa dam pa'i chos yul la; ;rmongs pa'i shugs kyis thams cad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-9: sred pa'i dug gis myos pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-10: don med ci zhig yongs su smre //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-11: sdig byed dga' bar mthong ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-12: bzlog na mthong ba med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-13: sdig pa byed tshe bde ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-14: bzlog na me dang 'dra ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-15: sdig pa byed pa'i mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-16: 'jig rten kun gyis rnam par smad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-17: dge ba byed pa rtag tu bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-18: de bas sdig pa rnam par spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-19: mi 'dod mi phan sdang ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-20: rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal tsha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-21: sdig pa sdig pa'i rnam smin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-22: de ltar blo ldan de spongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-23: sdig la rtag tu sdig pa yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-24: sdig pa med la sdig med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-25: byed la ltos la sdig yod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-26: byed pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-27: sdig pa sems la rag las shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-28: 'bras bu sems la rag las te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-29: sems ni rkyen las skyes par mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-30: rgyu dang rkyen las shin tu 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-31: sems can sems kyis bslus nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-32: sdig pa'i dbang gis 'ongs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460a-33: gnod pa'i mchog ste stobs po che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-0: sems @460b can dmyal ba drag por 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-1: sems dbang gyur pa mi 'gro ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-3: chos spyod pa ni rtag tu bde //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-4: sdig spyod pa ni mi bde'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-5: chos ma yin pas legs med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-6: log par 'tshed par mi byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-7: rgyu dang 'dra bar de mthong zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-10: nam yang log par 'byung med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-13: rgyu med 'bras bu yod ma mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-14: sems can dmyal bar rnam par phye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-15: rgyu sbyor las ni 'bras bur sbyor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-16: sems can dmyal bar rnam par 'tshed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-17: byas shing bsags pa drag pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-20: sems can dmyal bar rnam par 'tshed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-21: so sor bshags pa'i rnam pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-22: las gang rnam par bzlog bya ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-23: de mi 'dod pa lam de nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-24: rnam par mthong bas 'bras bu mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-25: 'od gang sgron la rag las te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-26: de bzhin 'bras bu las la thogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-29: gzhan dang gzhan las de mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-30: gzhan dang gzhan du dbang sbyor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-31: mthun par rjes su 'brel ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-32: de nyid mthong ba dag gis mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-33: rgyud la rgyu 'bras med min te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:460b-34: dbang phyug la sogs gnas pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-2: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-3: rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-4: las rnams dang ni mthun par mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-5: log par brtag par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-6: gang 'dod las kyi dbang song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-7: srog chags las kyi rgyu las skyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-8: las 'bras de nyid shes pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-9: dag pa yin zhes mngon par rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-10: gti mug zhags pa'i dbang song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-11: khyod kyis sdig de rtag tu byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-12: sdig dang bcas pa'i las byas pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-13: byis pa don med ci zhig gdung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-14: sdig la sdig pa rtag tu gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-15: de bzhin chos la chos gnas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-16: de nyid las ni ston byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-17: brtan pa dag gis gnyig spong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-18: sangs rgyas bstan la rmongs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-19: lam dang lam min rmongs pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-20: de dag la ni zhi med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-21: mun pa la ni nyi ma bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-22: rtag tu chos dang chos min dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-23: rgyu dang rkyen la rmongs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-24: gnod mchog shin tu mi zad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-25: sems can dmyal ba drag po thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-26: gtan tshigs ldan pa'i tshigs rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-27: de la bsgo nas gshin rje'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-28: mdung thung gtun shing thogs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-29: de nas khro zhing rngam par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461a-30: de nas yang mtshon cha rnam pa du ma dag thogs nas ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lo 'bum phrag du ma'i dus nas bskyed pa rang gi las kyis byas pa la spyod pa'i sems can dmyal ba de dag la gsod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-0: de phyis @461b sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-1: thar nas kyang las de'i mthus tshe rabs bdun brgyar yi dvags gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-2: de de las thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par tshe rabs lnga brgyar dud 'gro si mi si mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-3: de las thar nas kyang mi rnams kyi nang du bya rog ltar dman par skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-4: der rtag tu kha zas snying po med pa za zhing skom yang rnyog pa can 'thung bar 'gyur la skom de'ang lan 'ga' zhig 'thung bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-5: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-7: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i 'khor la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-11: rjes su zhugs pa'i 'khor gang bcu bdun pa gcig kyang mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-12: de de ltar sems pa na lam mthong ba'i dge slong de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-14: bdag gis sems can dmyal ba brgyad po dag gi 'khor bcu drug rnams kyi mtha' mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-15: nyes par byas pa'i las kyis 'di de tsam zhig pa lta snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:461b-16: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis byas shing bsags pa gnod pa'i sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-0: las ngan pa byas shing mngon du gyur pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad kyi 'khor las @462a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-2: de bzhin du ches shin tu lci ba'i rnam pa mnar med pa gang du sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa ma gtogs par srog chags dag sreg pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po gzhan dgu pa ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-3: gang du 'di'i phyogs gcig las stong gi cha gcig cig bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-6: dpe bya bar yang sla ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-7: de ltar sems can dmyal ba pa'i sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba de ltar gzhan dang mtshungs pa med pa sdug bsngal dpe med pa de rgyu gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-9: gang de nyid khong du chud cing shes par byas na gang khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-10: de ltar sems can dmyal ba de'i gnod pa sdug bsngal bas ches sdug bsngal ba mi 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-12: yid du mi 'ong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-13: de nas dge slong des sems can dmyal ba de mthong nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad la yid byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-14: 'dus byas thams cad la mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-18: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di la rnam par dpyad pas 'khor ba la sems shin tu 'dod chags dang bral bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-20: mi dga' bar byed cing 'khor ba la smod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462a-21: rnam pa de dag gis 'khor ba mi zad pa shin tu 'jigs par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-2: sems can 'di dag ni lha'i lta ba dang shin tu bral zhing mig dang bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-4: yang du sems can dmyal ba shin tu mi bzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-6: shin tu 'jigs par skyes kyang skyo bar mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-7: byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas sred pa'i zhags pas bcings pa yin snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-8: de nas yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa 'di ltar dge slong rgyun mi 'chad par spro ba de mi zad pa bas kyang shin tu mi zad pa sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa mnar med pa'i bar gyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thams cad kyis sa gzhan bcu gsum pa la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-9: bdud kyi yul la mi dga' zhing bdud kyi dbang du mi 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-10: bdud kyi 'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod cing bdud kyi yul la gnas par mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-11: rtag tu brtson pa'i dge slong des bag la nyal gyi spyod pa ma lus par bcad nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-12: de'i spro ba sa bla ba'i gnod sbyin dag gis mthong nas bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams la bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-13: 'di ltar gang rigs che ge mo zhig las rigs kyi bu de grong mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-14: grong rdal ga ge mo zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:462b-15: yul ga ge mo zhig nas skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-0: gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim @463a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-1: med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-2: rtsol zhing 'bad pa na yang dag pa'i lam gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i lta ba thun mong ma yin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-3: sa gzhan bcu gcig pa bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-4: sems can dmyal bar zhugs pa rnams kyi thog ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-5: tha ma'i sdug bsngal shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-6: de ltar sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag gis bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin dag la bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-7: de dag gis kyang de ltar snga ma bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi la bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-8: de dag gis kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-9: de dag gis kyang 'thab bral rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-10: 'thab bral ba rnams kyis kyang dga' ldan pa rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-11: dga' ldan pa rnams kyis kyang 'phrul dga' rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-12: 'phrul dga' rnams kyis kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-13: de ltar rim gyis snga ma bzhin du 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi bar la bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-14: 'di ltar lha khyed cag sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-15: 'di ltar dzambu'i gling na rigs che ge mo zhig las rigs kyi bu mang ge mo zhig yul go mo zhig nas skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463a-17: gos ngur smrig ba gos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-0: de rtsol zhing 'bad la sgrim pa na spro ba mi 'dri zhing bdud kyi dngos po mi 'dod la dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi @463b mod las byung ba'i sred pa dang lhan cig shin tu chags par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-1: kun nas nyon mongs shing mi sdug pa gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-5: reg bya rnams kyis shin tu chags par mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-6: de sa gzhan bcu gsum pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-7: sems can dmyal ba brgyad po kun gyi las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa'i dge slong gis 'khor ba ma rig pa'i mun pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad shes nas ji lta ba bzhin du yid byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-8: bdud kyi phyogs kyi dngos po ni dmas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-9: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho'o zhes de thos nas 'od chung gi lha rnams mchog tu dga' zhing 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-10: 'di ltar bdud kyi phyogs ni dmas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-11: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-12: de ltar lha rnams dga' ba'i yid kyis dam pa'i chos nyan par 'gyur na gang dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-13: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing de kho na nyid mthong ba'i skyes bu dam pa de dag las de dang rgyu mthun par dam pa'i chos 'phel zhing rgyas pa yid dga' bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-14: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa rgya mtsho'i chu lta bu kun tu sred pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:463b-15: klong lta bur g-yo ba sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos la sogs pa nas mnar med pa'i bar rgya che ba'i nang sa'i 'og 'jigs par rdzogs byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-2: chu srin chen po ltar zin cing sems can dmyal ba pa'i lhag ma nya mid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-5: chu srin kum bhi ra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-6: chu srin byis pa gsod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-8: sram 'khrugs pa lta bu dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rlung gi shugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-9: klong 'khyil ba lta bus sems g-yo ba'i rlabs klong lta bur 'khyil ba de'i dus kyi mtha'i shugs dbu ba lta bus sems can dmyal ba pa gnod pa rab tu mang ba mchi ma ltar gang bar du zhing smre sngags 'don la cho nges 'debs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-10: ha ha'i sgra skad kyi shugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-11: sems kyi shugs rlabs ltar mang ba nyes par byas pa'i las klu'i shugs lta bus sdug bsngal char ltar 'bebs shing mnar med pa zab mor bskal pa'i mtha'i me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis khor yug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-12: chu bcos pa lta bu'i sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho lta bur mtha' med la mi zad pa mthong nas dge slong de yid byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-13: 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-14: sred pas yongs su bslus byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-15: rmongs pa rmongs pa'i sems can dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-16: skyes shing 'chi ba nyam nga ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-18: mi yul las ni dmyal bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464a-19: dmyal ba las ni lha yul du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-1: sems can 'dod chags dbang song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-3: gti mug zhags pas bcings pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-4: srid pa'i mtshor ni rnam par 'khyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-6: rnam pa sna tshogs goms byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-7: der ni rgyu de goms pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-8: ji ltar mchog tu skye mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-9: lha dag bag med pa yis nyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-10: mi dag yongs su tshol bas nyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-11: yi dvags bkres dang skom pas nyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-13: sems can dmyal ba dmyal ba'i mes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-14: yi dvags rmongs pas rtag tu nyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-15: 'khor ba khab kyi rtse tsam yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-16: bde ba nyid ni cung zad med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-17: rmongs pa'i sems kyis skye bo dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-18: sdug bsngal las ni bde la chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-19: sdug bsngal 'di las thar ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-20: gang dag lam ni ston pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-21: gang dag rtag tu chos mi bsgrub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-22: gang dag rtag tu bden mi bsgrub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-23: bsam gtan rtag tu mi bsgrub gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-24: de dag sdug bsngal bral mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-28: sangs rgyas kyis ni chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-29: rtag tu nyes gsum dbang song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-30: phung po gsum nas sems can dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-31: rtag tu khams gsum dag tu 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-32: de ni sdug bsngal gsum dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-33: las gsum dbang song 'khrul pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:464b-34: de ni ngan song gsum na rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-0: @465a *// srid gsum chags pa'i 'gro ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-1: rim pa gsum du rnam par rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-2: gang zhig dkon mchog mchog gsum dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-3: gang zhig byang chub gsum dbang song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-4: gang zhig lta ba gsum spangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-5: de dag la ni sdug bsngal med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-6: dus skabs gsum la rtag gnas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-7: dga' ba gsum gyi de nyid mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-8: gsum gyi cha yis lto 'grangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-9: de ni mya ngan bral bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-10: phung po gsum la sems mnyam zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-11: las gsum rnam par dpyod pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-12: de ni 'khor bar mya ngan gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-13: rnam pa bral zhing rims med 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-14: lam dang lam min rnam pa shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-15: dngos dang dngos med rnam sems pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-16: byams pa'i sems ni bsgoms pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-18: kun nas rab tu rnam gsal zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-19: dba' bo rnyog pa med pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-20: yid ni sdig dang ma 'dres pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-21: mi de rnam par rab tu grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-22: gang zhig yang dag lam zhugs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-23: dran dang ldan pa stobs che la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-24: srid pa dag la 'dod bral ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-25: de ni nges par gol bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-26: srid pa 'dod cing dga' ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-27: mi gang mngon par mi dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-28: de la srid las skyes pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-29: sdug bsngal shin tu chung ba'ang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-30: ma bzad las ni mi bzad 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-31: mi bzad pa yis yongs bsgyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-32: 'dod pa dug dang me lta bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465a-33: rab tu bsgrims te spang bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-0: 'dod pa yongs su @465b spang byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-1: rtag tu thar la dga' ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-2: nyi ma shar bas mun med ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-4: de ltar rtag tu dge bsten zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-5: mi dge ba nyid spang bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-6: mdor na nges par bstan pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-7: dge dang mi dge yongs su rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-8: de ltar dge slong de 'jig rten 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-9: 'jig rten pha rol de la phan par 'dod pa'i blos sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mngon par brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-10: sems can rnams la snying brtse ba rjes su 'jug par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-11: byams pa bsgoms pa'i sems kyis de sems can dmyal ba 'jigs shing nyam nga ba thams cad la mngon par brtags shing las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes nas mchog tu yid byung ba'i sems kyis rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-13: sems can 'di dag ji ltar srid pa'i dgon par 'jigs shing sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi nang du bying zhig gu snyam nas de snying rje'i blo 'di ltar nye bar 'jog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-14: 'di ltar mi dag de ma thag tu ngan song du 'gro ba ni las ngan pa byas pa rang gi ser snas bslus shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-16: rnyed pa ngan pas zil gyis non pa rnams sbyin pa dag ma byin par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:465b-17: de dag gis dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-0: bkren pa slong mo pa rnams la ser sna'i dri mas spags pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa dag ma byin @466a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-1: zhing bsod nams dag ma byas la 'jig rten 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-2: pha rol tu tshul khrims mtsho lta bur gyur pa ma bsrungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-6: bran mo dag la'ang sbyin pa ma byin la ser snas 'jig rten pha rol la bslus pa de yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-7: yi dvags kyi rgyud du skyes pa'ang phal cher yi dvags mor skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-9: phrag dog gi dri ma gang gis nang gi sems nyams par byas pa 'dis na yi dvags mo rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-10: de nas yang las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi yul la rtog par byed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-11: yi dvags kyi yul 'di gang zhig snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-12: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na yi dvags ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-14: yi dvags kyi yul na gnas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-15: de la 'jig rten na rgyu ba ni mtshan mo dag gal te mi rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro; ;yi dvags kyi yul na gnas pa ni gang du sa'i 'og dpag tshad lnga brgya na gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-16: yi dvags kyi yul gyi rkyen ma gtogs par dzambu'i gling gi mtha' nas dpag tshad sum stong [?] yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-17: de dag dzambu'i gling dang thag nye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466a-18: ring ba ni nges pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-0: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'gro ba la @466b rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-1: yi dvags kyi yul ci tsam yod snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-2: yi dvags rnam pa mang ste mdor bsdu na rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-3: de dag thams cad phrag dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-4: ser sna'i rgyus der skye bar 'gyur la bsam pa sna tshogs bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-7: bza' ba sna tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-11: skom pas gdungs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-12: de dag thams cad mdor bsdu na rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-15: yi dvags kha khab ltar phra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-16: yi dvags bshang ba za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-18: yi dvags dri za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-19: yi dvags chos kyi sbyin pa za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-20: yi dvags sbyin pa za dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-31: yi dvags mthu bo che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-32: mtshan mo lus rab tu 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-33: mi rnams la glags lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-35: gling gi bar na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-37: byis pa la za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-39: 'bru drus pa'i shun pa za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:466b-40: mi gtsang ba za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-0: lam po che na gnas pa @467a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-5: dgon pa na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-6: dur khrod na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-8: lam gyi bzhi mdo na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-9: bdud kyi sde de ltar mdor bsdu na yi dvags kyi rigs sum cu rtsa drug yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-10: rgya cher ni sems kyi bsam pa'i las kyi cha'i bye brag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-11: bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bye brag gis dpag tu med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-12: de de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags shin tu bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-13: skom pas gdungs pa'i lus can rnams phal cher phrag dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-14: ser snas nyams pa dag yin zhing rgya cher ni lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-16: yid kyi las gsum gyis skye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-17: bye brag tu dbye na mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnam pa bcu dang yang dag par ldan pas yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-18: de mdor bsdu na mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnam pa bcu'i mi dge ba'i rgyu gang yin pa la srog chags kyi sdug bsngal thams cad de la rag las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-23: rgyu de las byung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467a-24: ngan song gis kun tu 'khor yang 'khor ba la yid 'byung bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-0: sems sbre'u lta bu thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'khor bar zhugs shing sdug bsngal gzing gzing ba'i bag @467b na gnas pa la goms pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-2: nying lag gi dra ba sna tshogs can gyi nang na sdom zhing 'khor ba'i ri la myur du gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-3: sems gzing gzing ba'i bag chags kyi rtog pa'ang gcig tu shes par sla ba ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-4: de ltar 'gro ba myur du 'gro ba 'di sems spre'u lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-5: de lta bas na sems 'di re zhig thog ma nyid du shin tu dul bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-6: de ltar ma byas na ngan song gis mi bzad pa rnams su sems can dag shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing de ltar ma byas na 'khor bar sems kyi dgras zin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-7: bde ba 'thob par mi 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-8: de ltar dge slong de so sor rab tu rnam par 'byed pa na yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-9: yang du 'khor ba 'di la yid byung zhing mi dga' la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-10: 'khor bar gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad la rnam par smod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-11: dge slong de de ltar sems par byed cing yi dvags rnam pa du ma dag la sems pa ni 'di ltar rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ni las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-12: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i byed rgyu gang yin pa'i cha gcig cig rab tu rnam par 'byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-13: skye ba rgyu med pa ma yin zhing bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-20: rigs ngan par skye ba ni srog chags thams cad kyi tshe 'chi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:467b-21: skye ba 'dod rgyal gyis cung zad kyang byas pa med do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-1: kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa'i dge slong des yi dvags rnams kyi las kyi chos rnam par dbye ba dag rnam par 'byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na yi dvags lto gug ces bya ba rang gi lus nyis 'gyur gyis che zhing kha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-4: rkang pa nyams pa thams cad du lto gug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-5: bu ga'i gseb dag tu me mdag gis rab tu bkang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-8: lus tshal shing bsregs pa lta bu 'gro ba'i dus mtha' med pa nas bcings pa dag dga' ba med cing grogs med la mgon med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-9: de dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-10: gla mi nor 'dod pa gang gis 'di ltar bdag gis gla dag khyim du bsag go snyam nas srog gcod pa byed cing phyugs la 'tshe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-11: de snying rje med pa chags pa'i dbang gis srog gcod pa byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-12: sgom zhing sten te mang du byed na de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sa'i 'og dpag tshad lnga brgya na yi dvags lto gug gi rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-13: de sa'i phyogs mun pa'i nang der skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468a-14: steng gi phyogs nas ri rnams kyis btsir cing 'og gi phyogs nas ri gnyis pas bteg ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-0: de ri gnyis kyi bar du rang gi ngo bo'i lus kyi tshad @468b dpag tshad tsam la leb leb por byas shing bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-1: skom pas shin tu gdungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-2: tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni tshe rabs lnga brgya yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-3: mi'i lo bcu la yi dvags kyi bgrang ba'i tshul gyis nyin zhag gcig ste bar du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa ni yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-4: mi dge ba'i las gzhan gnyis pa byas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-7: bud med la nor rdzas bcol ba bcabs nas 'di ltar bdag la bdag med do zhes smra na las de'i rnam par smin pas der skye bar 'gyur la zang zing gi sbyin pa'ang ma byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-8: chos kyi sbyin pa'ang ma byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-9: mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa'ang ma byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-10: sbyin pa gsum po de dag dang bral la ser sna dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-11: phrag dog gis sems rtag tu zil gyis non pa ni der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-12: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags rnams la brtags nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags kha khab ltar phra ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-13: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-14: nor rdzas kyi phyir mi rnams gsod pa'i gshed ma gang pha rol la phrag dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-15: ser sna yang dag par blangs shing rtag tu mngon par brtson la bkren pa bkren pa'i rang bzhin can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:468b-17: zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-0: @469a *// sbyin pa rnams spangs pa ni de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags kha khab ltar phra ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-1: rang gi las kyi 'bras bus bslus pa der skyes pa de dag gi kha'i sgo khab ltar phra zhing lto ri tsam du che bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-3: skom pa'i nyon mongs pas gdungs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-4: lus kyi mes kyang bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-5: skom pas dkrugs la phyi rol du'ang tshal shing gi me mched pas dkrugs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-10: srog chags mar ko ta kas za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-11: rims la sogs pas de ltar skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-12: bud med der skyes pa'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-13: yid las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis mi'i lo bcu la yi dvags kyi bgrang ba'i tshul gyis nyin zhag gcig pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar mngon par gdungs te tshe bar chad du 'gyur ba ni yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-14: der skye bar 'gyur ba'i las gnyis pas kyang yang der skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-16: bram ze dag bdag cag gi der zan sbyin no zhes byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-18: bca' ba dag kyang yod bzhin du bud med ser snas mngon par zin pa de khyim thab la bslu ba'i bsam pas 'di ltar ci'ang med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469a-20: bram ze dag la sbyin du ga la yod ces smras na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-0: de yang lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par @469b ltung ba yi dvags kha khab ltar phra ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-1: ser sna de kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas bud med phal cher yi dvags rnams kyi nang du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar mi'i nang du skye bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-3: ser snas nyams pa'i rgyu gang gis yi dvags mor 'gyur ba de ltar mi'i nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-4: bud med ni sems chung zhing sems yang ba yin la de ltar rgyu de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-5: rkyen des yi dvags mo rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-6: de ji srid du ser sna dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-7: phrag dog byas pa'i sdig pa de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de sring du der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-8: de phyis yi dvags kyi 'jig rten de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-9: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-10: bya khug rta rnams kyi nang du skyes nas de rtag tu bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-12: de las thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las mir 'grub pa'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-14: bud med de rtag tu bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-16: rtag tu sdug bsngal zhing zas gzhan du tshol la lam po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:469b-17: bzhi mdor 'tsho bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-0: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam @470a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-1: par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags skyugs pa za ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-4: bud med dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-5: bud med gang bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-7: ro myang bas khyim thab la mngon par gnod par byed cing bdag nyid ni de dag la za bar byed la phrag dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-8: ser snas kyang rtag tu zil gyis non /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-10: bu mo gzhan dang mi 'dra bar mi dga' ba ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-13: mi slu ba la mngon par gnod pa byas na de'ang lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags skyugs pa za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-14: der skyes nas kyang de rtag tu de'i lus kyi bdag nyid dpag tshad phyed tsam yod pa bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-15: skom pas gdungs te dgon pa chen por gcig pu chu btsal ba'i phyir rgyug cing thams cad du cho nges 'debs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-16: smre sngags 'don pa na de chos sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-18: mi 'jigs pa sbyin par ma byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-19: sbyin pa gsum dang bral ba dag der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-20: tshe'i mtha' ni snga ma bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470a-21: de ji srid du ser sna byas pa'i sdig pa de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-1: de phyis sdig pa de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-2: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de skyugs pa za bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-3: ji ltar yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyugs pa za bas srog cung zad kyang 'tsho bar gyur pa de ltar dud 'gro rnams su'ang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-4: de las thar nas kyang gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na de mchod ston gyi tshe dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-5: bram ze bkad pa rnams kyi gral du slong mos de'i srog 'tsho ba thub par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-6: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-7: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags bshad pa za ba zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-8: der skyes ba'am bud med dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-9: gang gis ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-10: snga ma bzhin du sbyin pa dang bral la dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-11: bram ze dag la'ang kha zas lhag mar byas pa byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-12: de dag kyang gtsang ma zhig yin no snyam nas zos na skyes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-13: bud med de lus dang bral nas yi dvags bshang ba za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:470b-14: de'i las kyi mthus de'i tshe'ang snga ma bzhin la de'i lus bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-1: rtag tu mi rnyed la de'ang chung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-3: gal te'ang yi dvags rnams kyi nang du bshang ba rnyed na srin bu zhugs shing zos la bu gar byas pa ngan ngon zhig rnyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-4: rgyang ring zhing tshegs chen pos rnyed pa de'ang chog par mi rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-5: de ltar de'i tshe'i mtha' sdug bsngal ba 'thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-6: de ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las yi dvags kyi 'jig rten 'grub pa ser sna byas pa bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-7: skom pa de byas pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-8: de phyis yi dvags kyi 'jig rten bshang ba za ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-9: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par ji ltar las nye bar 'gro bas 'khor ba na yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-10: de gal te yang mi rnams kyi nang du gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-11: de dbul zhing nad bu can la bza' ba nyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-12: srog gi 'tsho ba rtag tu gzhan la rag las shing tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba 'thob la de na du ma med pa'i snod du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-14: mi shes pa phal pa yin zhing lus rma mtshan dang dri ma can mi sdug pa skye bo kun gyis smad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471a-15: de'i kha nas kyang dri mnam po 'byung zhing glo bur du so nag por 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-0: de nas yang dge slong las @471b kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des ser sna'i gnas su gyur pa'i yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-1: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas ser sna thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yi dvags kha zas med pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-2: der las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-4: bud med ser snas zil gyis non cing phrag dog gi zil gyis non pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-6: slu bar byed pa stobs dang ldan pa gang gis sems can dag bcing bas bcings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-7: kha zas ma byin pas srog dang phral la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-8: srog dang phral nas kyang snying nas 'chags par mi byed la 'gyod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-9: yang las de nyid byas nas rjes su dga' bar byed cing gzhan dag kyang de nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-12: las kyi mjug dag byas nas yang de nyid byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-13: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags kha zas med pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-15: bud med de der skyes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-16: kha zas med par byas nas bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-17: skom par byas pa me des sreg pa na yang dang yang du ri las chu 'bab pa'i shugs ltar bkras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:471b-18: skom pa'i sdug bsngal mang du 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-0: de'i kha zas med par byas pa'i mthu des ji ltar thal ba'ang mi mngon pa de ltar @472a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-3: nying lag thams cad sreg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-4: de nas yang yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-5: nying lag de dag slar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-10: sdug bsngal gnyis kyis sreg pa na rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyes par byas pas bslus pa de sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas shin tu ngu skad 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-14: de ni de'i nang du 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-15: phyi rol tu 'byung ba'ang las kyis byas pa'i mes yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-16: nying lag thams cad sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-17: me nang du song bslar byung nas phyi rol gyi lus kyang sreg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-19: shing khong stong gi nang du me zhugs pa shing gi nang bsregs nas phyi rol sreg pa de bzhin du me des yi dvags de'i nang du bsregs nas phyi rol yang sreg par byed do; ;de nang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-20: phyi rol thams cad tshal shing bsregs pa lta bur rab tu bsregs te me lce gcig tu gyur pas ngu skad 'byin cing cho nges 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-21: de des cho nges 'debs pa na khar me 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-23: yang du de'i lus thams cad 'bar ba nyis 'gyur gyis ches rab tu 'bar bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472a-25: gang du 'gro ba'i lam de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-0: der rtsva dar bha rab tu 'bar ba khab @472b lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur la gang de'i rkang pa gnyis bor ba ma rung bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-1: rkang pa ma rung ba de ngu skad 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-4: de yongs su smre sngags 'don pa na de'i lce mar sar gyi gong bu ltar zhu bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-5: de nas yang nyes par byas pa'i las des slar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-7: gang du rgyug pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-8: der de'i nyes par byas pa'i las des chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-14: khron pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-18: ne'u gsing gi sa gzhi dang bral bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-20: nags tshal dag kyang log par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-23: ri sul gyi sa phyogs thams cad kyang rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-24: kun nas yi dvags kyi chang pa lag na ral gri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-25: gtun shing khyer ba rnams kyis gtse bar byed cing spyo bar byed pas mchog tu sdug bsngal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-27: ser snas bslus shing sems kyi dgra dang lhan cig ldan pas tshe'ang snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-28: de ltar de nyes pa byas pa'i las byas pas ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du yi dvags kha zas med pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:472b-29: de phyis yi dvags kyi yul de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-0: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par rang gis @473a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-1: las byas pa'i las spyad pa ji ltar las nye bar 'gro bas 'khor bar yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-2: de gal te mi rnams kyi nang du gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-3: de mngal na gnas pa na ma de zas 'dod pa med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-4: gang gis ma de'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-5: bzhin kha dog mchog tu mi sdug par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-6: de gal te mngal de nyid du gnas pa na las rab tu mthu che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-7: srog bcad pa rab tu mthu che ba des 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-8: gal te yang brgya la btsa' bar gyur na de ltar ngan pa byas pa 'dus byas de'i ma rtag tu dri nga zhing mdog mi sdug la mdangs med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-9: de srog gi 'tsho ba dus thung zhing tshegs chen pos thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-10: yul gyi bdag po rgya pos kyang de ltar btson rar bcug nas bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-11: skom pa dag gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-12: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-13: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags dri za ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-14: der las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473a-16: btung ba mang po shin tu bsdus nas bdag 'ba' zhig za la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-0: bu dang @473b chung ma dag la yang dag par 'ged par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-1: de dag ro bro ba 'dod na dri tsam zhig la snom du 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-3: chung ma de'i mdun du rang 'ba' zhig za bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-5: ser snas zin pas yang dag par 'ged par mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-7: chung ma ris mthun pa lhan cig 'khod pa la brnyas par byed cing gzhan dag kyang de nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed pa la rjes su dga' zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-8: de nas yang bdag gcig pu za bar byed la de byas nas kyang skyon du mi 'gyur zhing ngo tsha bar mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-9: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags dri za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-10: der skyes nas lus rtag tu bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-11: skom pas gdungs shing gar bab tu rgyug ste ngu skad 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-14: de gal te yang lha khang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-16: khyim gzhan du yon bdag dad pas bdug spos dri zhim po dag bdug pa dang de des dga' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-17: de bzhin du dri gzhan gyis kyang dga' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-18: de ltar 'di ni yi dvags dri za ba'i phyogs gcig yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-19: dri za ba'i phyogs gzhan yang 'di ltar mi dag la nad byung ba na nad pa gang yin pa de dag gi phyir lha khang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-20: kun dga' rab dag tu bdug spos gang bdugs pa'i dri des de tshim par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:473b-21: des srog 'tsho ba 'thob cing de'i phyi bzhin 'brang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-0: gzhi des lus kyi srog 'tsho ba 'thob @474a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-1: ste; de ltar de'i las kyi mthus yi dvags de dri za bar 'gyur zhing srog gi tshegs chen pos za ba de 'thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-2: der skyes nas kyang ji srid du sdig pa'i las de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-3: skom pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-4: de phyis yi dvags kyi 'jig rten de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-5: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa 'khor ba na yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-6: gal te mis byas pa'i myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis brgya la mi rnams kyi nang du gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-7: de dbul zhing nad bu can la lus thams cad las dri de 'byung bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-8: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-9: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags chos kyi sbyin pa za ba zhes bya ba der 'jug pa thob pa des srog 'tsho ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-10: der las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na gang rang bzhin gyi ser sna dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-11: phrag dog gis zil gyis nan pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474a-12: srog gso ba kho na'i thabs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-0: rgyu des dad pa med cing dad pa med la pha @474b rol phan gdags pa'i bsam pa med pa'i rgyus skyon du bgrang ba'i chos ston par byed cing de tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-2: srog gcod pa'i chos kyi gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-4: nor rdzas nan gyis 'phrog pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-5: khyu mchog bag yangs su gtang ba'i chos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-6: des skyon du bgrang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de dag pha rol dag la bstan nas de las rnyed pa gang yin pa de sbyin par mi byed cing gsog pa 'ba' zhig byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-7: phrag dog gi zil gyis non pa mi ngan pa de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags chos kyi sbyin pa za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-8: de'i tshe ni snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-9: de ri'i yul nas ri'i yul du yongs su rgyug cing lus bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-10: skom pas gdungs la thams cad du ngu skad 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-11: shing skam 'dra zhing skra ring la ngom zum gnag pa lus thams cad spu zing pos khebs shing rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-12: rgyus pa'i dra bas dkris la pags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-14: lus ring zhing sen mo mi sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-15: rang gi nyes par byas pas yongs su bslus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-16: mig gi khung ring zhing bskums la gdong mchi mas yog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-17: lus sprin nag po 'dra zhing mi sdug pas mngon par khebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:474b-20: spu rnams kyi nang du sbrang bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-1: srog chags mar ko ta ka rnams zhugs nas za ba na thams cad du yongs su rgyug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-2: gal te brgya la dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi nang du song nas yongs su rgyug pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-4: dge 'dun gyi gtsug la khang du tshes gcig la gnod sbyin la byin pa'i rnyed pa 'thob cing dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-5: gzhan gyis chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas mngon par mgu bar 'gyur la de des shin tu tshim par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-7: des 'tsho ba rnyed par 'gyur te; ji srid du sdig pa'i las de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du yi dvags kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-8: de de las thar nas las de dang rgyu mthun par rang gi las la spyod pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-9: rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa 'khor ba na tshe sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-10: de gal te brgya la gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-11: de gzugs bram ze lta bu yin zhing lha rten gyi drung du phyugs gsod pa byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-13: srog 'tsho ba gzhan la rtag tu rag las shing des srog 'tsho ba thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475a-14: de nas yang de nyes par byas pa rjes su 'brel bas sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-0: de nas @475b yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-1: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags kyi 'jig rten na yi dvags chu 'thung ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-2: de dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las 'byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-3: 'di ltar mi rigs par chags pa'i zil gyis non pa'i sems can chang 'tshong ba gang gis khyim na chang yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-5: bu ram gyi chang 'tshong bar byed pa ser sna dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-6: phrag dog gis mngon par nyams pa de chang de dag chus bslad de chang btung ba pha rol po de dag la 'drid par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-7: rnam par 'tshe bar byed cing des sbyin pa dag ma byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-9: tshul khrims mngon par mi srung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-12: gzhan dag kyang mi rigs par chags pa de la 'jog cing rjes su dga' bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-15: las kyi mjug dang bcas pas byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-16: de nyes par byas pa de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags chu 'thung ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-17: lus rtag tu bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-18: skom pas gdungs pa de yul chu med pa'i ri brags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:475b-20: dgon pa chen po rnams su yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-2: sol ba 'dra zhing yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-3: nying lag thams cad sra la rtsu ba ste shin tu rdol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-4: de'i lus 'bar bas 'khrigs shing kha gdong skra ring po rnams kyi mun par khebs te rtag tu bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-5: skom pa las byung ba'i mes gdungs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-6: gal te res 'ga' brgya la chu dang nye bar gyur pa de'i tshe chu rgal ba gang 'bog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-7: rkang pa'i chu'i gzer ma 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-8: chos spyod pa gang dag chu 'gram du lag pa dag gis chu 'thor zhing gang skom pa de dag la sbyin no zhes smra ba de dag gis de srog 'tsho ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-9: gal te ma byin par 'dod nas de chu 'gram du 'dug ste btung ba 'thung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-10: chu'i rgyun de srung ba'i yi dvags rnams kyis mngon par 'tshe bar byed cing lus kyang kun nas gze gze btog btog pa lta bur byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-11: sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de de nas yang ngu skad 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-12: smre sngags 'don cing yongs su rgyug go ;nyes par byas pa'i las kyis bslus pa de srid du de'i sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du der sdug bsngal de myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476a-13: de phyis yi dvags kyi 'jig rten de nas thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-0: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par rang gi las rlung lta bur 'khyam pa na 'khor ba na yongs su @476b 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-1: de gal te brgya la mi rnams kyi nang du gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na de chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-3: nags tshal dang bral ba ri brags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-6: rtag tu khron pa'i chu la 'thung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-8: nyin mtshan du skom med pas gnod par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-9: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-10: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags kyi 'jig rten na yi dvags kun ston ces bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-11: de dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-12: mi ngan pa phrag dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-13: ser snas zil gyis non cing mi rigs par chags pa la brkam pa la brkam pa gang gis mkhas pa dbul po'i 'tsho ba tshegs chen pos bsgrub pa dag la rin thang steng du ma bab pa'i rin mi 'dra ba zang zing zhig byin la de rtag tu de la dga' zhing slu bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-14: gzhan dag kyang las ngan par byed pa de nyid la 'god par byed cing 'jog par byed la sbyin pa dag ni mi gtong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-17: dad pas nye bar 'gro bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:476b-18: chos dang mthun pa'i chos mi spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngang tshul can du mi byed cing yang dang yang phrag dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-3: ser snas zil gyis non par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-4: de lus dan bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung pa'i yi dvags kun ston rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-5: de la 'jig rten pa de dag pha zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-6: de rtag tu lus bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-7: skom pas gdungs shing lus tshal shing bsregs pa 'dra la dga' ba med pas nyams par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-8: mchi mas gdong yog cing rkang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-9: lag pa shin tu rdol la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-10: skras kha gdong mun pa ltar khebs pa; lto'i mdog sprin nag po 'dra zhing du skad 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-11: smre sngags 'don pa na 'di ltar smre sngags yongs su 'don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-12: ma byin pas lta ga la 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-14: sgron ma med na 'od med ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-15: ma byin bde ba ga la yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-16: ji ltar lus can long ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-17: mig gis lta bar nus med ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-18: sbyin dang bral ba de 'dra ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-19: yi dvags bde ba mi rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-20: yi dvags 'jig rten yi dvags gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-21: de bzhin nor med 'jigs gsum du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-22: shin tu mi dga' 'khyam byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-23: de ni ser sna'i 'bras bu yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-24: rang gi las 'bras za ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-25: srog chags las la longs spyod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-26: ma byin ci yang mi 'thob ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-27: byas pa chud ni za ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477a-28: yi dvags 'jig rten gnas pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-0: ngan byas rnams kyis bdag @477b cag bsregs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-1: bkres dang skom las byung ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-2: me yis 'dir ni yongs su spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-3: bdag cag rnams ni skom pa las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-5: yongs su gdung las bdag cag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-6: nam na yongs su thar bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-7: lam dang lam min mi shes shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-8: las kyi 'bras bu dag mi shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-9: bkres dang skom las byung ba'i me //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-10: tsha ba 'byung ba ma shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-11: bzhin ni skra yis mun ltar khebs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-12: re ba med cing srog rnams btang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-13: pags pa rgyus pa'i dra bas sbrel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-14: bdag 'tsho kyi hud sdug bsngal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-15: dgon par chud pa'i lus can rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-16: thams cad du yang sdug bsngal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-17: 'dir ni skyob pa gang yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-18: bdag cag sdug bsngal zhugs par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-19: de ltar yi dvags kun ston par byed pa de de dag ngu skad 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-20: smre sngags 'don cing thams cad yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-21: de dag gal te yang yongs su rgyug pa na dge slong des mthong nas sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-23: khyad par du 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'khor ba rab tu 'bar ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-24: de ltar yongs su rgyug pa de dag la gal te dad pa can zhig gis kyang byin la de la de rigs der skyes pa zhig kyang yin na de 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-25: de de las srog gi 'tsho ba 'thob par 'gyur zhing skyob pa de yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:477b-26: skyabs de yin te de la rten to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-0: de ltar de srid du sdig pa'i las de bcom zhing @478a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-1: spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-2: de phyis yi dvags kyi 'jig rten de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-3: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa rang gi las rlung lta bus ded par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-4: de dag gal te yang mi rnams kyi nang du gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na de rdza rnga rdung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-6: gtsug lag khang gi srung mar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-7: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la rnam par brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-8: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags kyi 'jig rten na yi dvags mchil ma za ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-9: de dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-10: 'di ltar mi ngan pa skyes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-12: ser snas zil gyis non pa dge 'dun nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-13: gzhan mkhas pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag gi kha zas lhag mar byas la de 'di ltar lhag mar ma byas so zhes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478a-14: de dag kyang yid ches pa'i dbang gis kha zas mi 'dra ba de za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-0: mi ngan pa de yang dang yang du de ltar de nyid la dga' bar byed cing gzhan dag kyang de nyid la @478b rab tu 'jog par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-1: sbyin pa dag gtong bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-4: chos dang mthun par mi spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-5: yang dang yang du kha zas lhag mar byed pa'i las de nyid la mngon par dga' bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-6: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags mchil ma za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-7: der skyes nas lus bskres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-8: skom pas gdungs pa'i mchil ma bor ba ljan ljin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-10: sa la bor ba de kham gyis za bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-11: des srog 'tsho ba 'thob par 'gyur zhing de'i phyi bzhin 'brang la skyabs de yin zas de yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-12: ji srid du sdig pa'i las de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du der 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-13: de phyis yi dvags kyi 'jig rten de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-14: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa 'khor ba na yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-15: de gal te brgya la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-16: de dbul zhing nad bu can la sna rul bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-17: rtag tu dge 'dun gyi nang na ljan ljin 'phyag par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-19: lhag ma za bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:478b-20: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-0: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu @479a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-1: rnam par smin par shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags kyi 'jig rten na nye bar byas pa spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-3: bkres skom chung zhing lus gos med pa ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-4: de las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-5: des gnod sems kyi phyir ni ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-6: gtsang ba 'dod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas la phreng ba phul ba brku ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-7: de bzhin du bla ma dag gi phreng ba'ang rku bar byed na; de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags phreng ba za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-9: gnod sbyin gyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur zhing de mthu che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-11: de legs par byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-12: nyes par byas pa'i rmi lam dag ston par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-13: gal te mi gang la rang bzhin gyi mi dge ba zhig byung la yi dvags de la kha zer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-14: de gzhi des mi de la 'tsho bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-15: 'jig rten pa de dag gnod sbyin 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba zhig go zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-16: de phreng ba mang po thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-17: de des shin tu tshim par 'gyur zhing lus bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479a-18: skom pas gdungs par yang mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-0: 'jig rten gyis kyang mngon par bstod par @479b 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-1: de des rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-2: der yi dvags phreng ba za ba de srid du sdig pa'i las sdig pa chung ba de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-3: de phyis yi dvags kyi 'jig rten de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-4: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par byas pa nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin de la spyod cing 'khor ba na yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-5: de gal te brgya la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na de phreng ba mkhan du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-8: mjug des de'i 'tsho ba nye bar 'grub pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-9: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-10: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags kyi 'jig rten na yi dvags khrag za ba zhes bya ba khrag gis srog 'tsho bar byed pa ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-11: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-12: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-13: mi gang la la de'i lus brten par bya ba'i phyir sha'i khrag 'thung la de la dga' zhing gtum pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-15: ser snas mngon par nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-17: chung ma la slu bar byed cing srog gcod par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:479b-18: khrag la 'chums pa'i ngang tshul can te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-0: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba @480a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-1: yi dvags khrag za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-2: der skyes nas kyang de las nyid kyis bskyed pa'i yul du skye bar 'gyur la de la mi dag 'di ni gnod sbyin zhig yin no zhes brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-3: de la mchod pa'ang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-4: de la kun nas bskor nas khrag gi gtor mas kyang mchod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-5: de phyir zhing khrag 'thung bas myos nas mi dag la gnod pa byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-6: de la mi dag yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-7: yang gnod sbyin 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig yin no zhes brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-8: de ltar de gcig nas gcig tu rjod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-10: de ltar de ji srid du sdig pa'i las de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du de ltar yi dvags rdzu 'phrul che ba de nyid byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-11: de de las thar na las de dang rgyu mthun par rang gi las la spyod pa las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor ba na yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-12: de gal te brgya la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-13: bud med du skyes na mi de mkha' 'gro ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480a-15: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-0: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags kyi 'jig rten na yi dvags sha za ba zhes bya ba ji ltar @480b 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-1: de las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-2: ser sna la chags pa'i zil gyis non pa gang gis ba lang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-6: lug shi ba'i sha rin thang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-7: srang la g-yo byas nas rin chen por btsongs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-8: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags sha za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-15: gtsug lag khang gi gnas rnams kyi gnod sbyin du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-16: ngo bo nyid gtum la gyur pa shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-17: yi dvags rdzu 'phrul che ba mi dge ba'i las shin tu mi zad pa'ang ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-18: de sbyin pa tsher ma lta bu'ang byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-19: rgyu des rdzu 'phrul che ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-20: de la mi phal pa dag ma he dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-23: lug la sogs pa dag srog bcad nas shas shin tu tshim par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-24: de ltar de nyes par byas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis ji srid du mi dge ba'i las phrag dog byas pa de bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du der 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-25: de phyis yi dvags kyi 'jig rten de [?] las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:480b-26: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par las nye bar 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-0: las so sor 'brang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor ba na yongs @481a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-2: gal te brgya la las legs par byas pa des gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-3: sha za bshan pa phal pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-4: dum bur byed pa'i mir 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-5: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-6: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags bdug pa za ba zhes bya ba de thob pas des srog 'tsho ba 'thob pa ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-7: de las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-8: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-9: 'di ltar lhus cher ser snas zil gyis non cing las kyi 'bras bu mngon par mi shes pa; sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di zhing ma yin no snyam nas zhing du mngon par ma shes pa gang gis bdug spos bzang po bzhag la bdug spos ngan pa khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-10: sems dang ba med cing dad pa med par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-11: las kyi 'bras bu yang dag par myong bar 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481a-12: gzhan gyi ngor 'di ltar bdug spos phul bas bdag gi las kyi 'bras bur 'gyur snyam na; de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags rdzu 'phrul che ba me tog phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-0: rol mo'i sgra la rab tu dga' zhing bdug @481b pa za ba'i gnod sbyin du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-1: gnod sbyin gyi gnas sum mdo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-10: pu shu dag tu aa ga ru nag po'i bdug spos kyis myos par 'gyur zhing skye bo kun gyis phyag byas par 'gyur ba ni sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-11: rdzas kyi yon tan gyis ma yin gyi zhing bzang po'i yon tan yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-14: dge 'dun la chung ngu zhig phul na'ang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-16: gang gi tshe shing n+ya gro dha'i sa bon chung ngu zhing gshin pa la btab pa de'i tshe shing ljon pa yal ga bzang zhing lo ma'i tshogs chen por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-17: de bzhin du de zhing bzang po sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-19: dge 'dun la phul ba'i 'bras bu'ang zhing gi yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-21: de ltar yi dvags rdzu 'phrul che ba de bde ba nyams su myong ste las zad pas yi dvags kyi 'jig rten de las thar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-22: thar nas kyang las de dang rgyu mthun par nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor ba na yongs su 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-23: de gal te mi'i nang du gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:481b-24: de rtag tu de dbul ba'i rigs su skye zhing rtag tu me tog phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-0: byug pas lus byugs te lus @482a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-1: shin tu dri zhim par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-2: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des yi dvags kyi 'jig rten la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-3: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yi dvags drag shul spyod pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-4: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-5: mi ngan pa ser snas zil gyis gnon cing dge sbyong gi tshul 'dzin pa tshul khrims 'chal ba gang gis dge sbyong gzhan la tha snyad btags nas 'di ltar dge sbyong zhig shin tu nad mi bzad pas thebs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-6: de sbyin bdag khyod kyis na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad dag byin cig ces smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-7: de blangs te bdag nyid za bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-8: zla des ngan g-yo byed par gyur nas tshul sna tshogs bzung ste yul nas yul du rgyug cing sbyin bdag rnams la slu bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-9: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba yi dvags drag shul spyod pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-10: der skyes nas kha zas ljan ljin mi gtsang ba za bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-11: rtag tu lus bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482a-13: mi gang mi gtsang ba de la brnyes par byed cing de ltar nga rgyal med par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482b-0: glags mthong ba nyid kyis gzhan dag gi rmi lam du @482b 'jigs pa ston par byed cing dur khrod rnams su dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482b-1: lus dang spu thams cad rab tu 'bar la yul 'jig pa'i tshe rab tu dga' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482b-2: drag shul du spyod pa'i rig sngags dag gis gzhan dag drangs nas rnam par 'tshe bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482b-3: yud tsam zhig gis dpag tshad brgya phrag stong nas kyang drangs te 'ong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482b-4: de ltar drag shul spyod pa'i yi dvags de gnod sbyin gyi ming thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482b-5: de la skye bo phal pa dag gnod sbyin 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing gnod sbyin mthu che ba yin no snyam nas mchod pa byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482b-6: de ltar de skye bo rnam pa sna tshogs la gnod pa byed cing rnam par 'tshe ba na ji srid du tshe ma zad pa de srid du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-022:482b-7: de phyis de las 'chi bar 'gyur te /
